GSP33brssgo1u:2527: atha tathā tvacā nirmuktasarpavadevāyaṃ dehastho 'śarīraḥ viduṣo dehe sarpasya tvacīvābhimānābhāvādaśarīratvādamṛtaḥ prāṇitīti prāṇo jīvannapi brahmaiva, kiṃ tadbrahma tejaḥ svayañjyotirānanda evetyarthaḥ vastuto 'cakṣurapi bādhitacakṣurādyanivṛtyā sacakṣurivetyādi yojyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2531: brahmajñānamuddiśya śravaṇavanmanananididhyāsanayorapyavāntaravākyabhedena vidhyaṅgīkārānna brahmaṇo vidhiśeṣatvaṃ uddeśyajñānalabhyatayā prādhānyādityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2535: tarhi jñāne vidhiḥ kimiti tyaktaḥ, tatrāha-yadi hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2536: yadi jñāne vidhimaṅgīkṛtya vedānatairavagataṃ brahma vidheyajñāne karmakārakatvena viniyujyeta tadā vidhiśeṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2537: na tvavagatasya viniyuktatvamasti, prāptāvagatyā phalalābhe vidhyayogādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2544: uktarītyā brahmaṇaḥ svātantrye satyeva bhagavato vyāsasya
GSP33brssgo1u:2550: ato bāhyadharmasya śuddhidvārā mānasopāsanādharmahetutvātpariśiṣṭo mānasadharmo jijñāsya iti sūtraṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2552: tṛtīyādhyāye śrutyādibhiḥśeṣaśeṣitvanirṇayānantaraṃ śeṣiṇāśeṣasya prayogasaṃbhavāt kaḥ kratuśeṣaḥ ko vā puruṣaśeṣaḥ iti vijñāsyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2556: jaimininā brahma na vicāritamiti tajjijñāsyatvasūtraṇaṃ yuktamityarathaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2557: vedāntārthaścedadvaitaṃ tarhi dvaitasāpekṣavidhyādīnāṃ kā gatirityāśaṅkya jñānātprāgeva teṣāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na paścādityāha-tasmāditi
GSP33brssgo1u:2559: brahma na kāryaśeṣaḥ, tadbodhātprāgeva sarvavyavahāra ityatra
GSP33brssgo1u:2561: sadabādhitaṃ brahma pūrvamātmā viṣayānādatta iti sarvasākṣyahamityevaṃbodhe jāte sati putradehādeḥ sattābādhanāt māyāmātratvaniśyayāt putradārādibhirahamiti svīyaduḥkhasukhabhāvatvaguṇayogādgauṇātmābhimānasya naro 'haṃ kartā mūḍha iti mithyātmābhimānasya ca sarvavyavahārahetorasatve kāryaṃ vidhiniṣedhādivyavahāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet hetvabhāvānna kathañcidbhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2562: nanvahaṃ brahmeti bodho bādhitaḥ, ahamarthasya pramātuḥ brahmatvāyoghādityāśaṅkyā pramātṛtvasyājñānavilasitāntaḥkaraṇatādātmyakṛtatvānna
GSP33brssgo1u:2565: pramātaiva jñātaḥ san pāpmarāgadveṣamaraṇavivarjitaḥ paramātmā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2566: pramātṛtvasya kalpitatve tadāśritānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ prāmāṇya kathamityata
GSP33brssgo1u:2568: dehātmatvapratyayaḥ kalpito bhramo 'pi vyavahārāṅgatayā mānatveneṣyate vaidikaiḥ, tadvallaukikamadhyakṣādikamātmabodhāvadhi vyavahārakāle bādhābhāvāt vyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyamiṣyatāṃ, vedāntānāṃ tu kālatrayābādhyabodhitvāt tatvāvedakaṃ prāmāṇyamiti tu śabdārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2579: evaṃ tāvadvedāntavākyānāṃ brahmātmāvagatiprayojanānāṃ brahmātmani tātparyeṇa samanvitānāmantareṇāpi kāryānupraveśaṃ, brahmaṇi paryavasānamuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2581: sāṃkhyādayastu pariniṣṭhitaṃ vastu pramāṇāntaragamyameveti manyamānāḥ pradhānādīni kāraṇāntarāṇyanumimānāstatparatayaiva vedāntavākyāni yojayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2582: sarveṣveva vedāntavākyeṣu sṛṣṭiviṣayeṣvanumānenaiva kāryeṇa kāraṇaṃ lilakṣayiṣitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2584: kāṇādāstvetebhya eva vākyebhya īśvaraṃ nimittakāraṇamanumimate aṇūṃśca samavāyikāraṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2587: tatra padavākyapramāṇajñenācāryeṇa vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmāvagatiparatvadarśanāya vākyābhāsayuktābhāsavipratipattayaḥ pūrvapakṣīkṛtya nirākriyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:2588: tatra sāṃkhyāḥ pradhānaṃ triguṇamacetanaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti manyamānā
GSP33brssgo1u:2589: āhuḥ- yāni vedāntavākyāni sarvajñasya sarvaśakterbrahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatvaṃ darśayantītyavocastāni pradhānakāraṇapakṣe 'pi yojayituṃ śakyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:2593: yattu jñānaṃ manyase sa sattvadharmaḥ , 'sattvātsaṃjāyate jñānam' (gī.
GSP33brssgo1u:2595: tena ca sattvadharmeṇa jñānena kāryakāraṇavantaḥ puruṣāḥ sarvajñā yoginaḥ prasiddhāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2597: na kevalasyākāryakāraṇasya puruṣopalabdhimātrasya sarvajñatvaṃ kiñcijjñatvaṃ vā kalpayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2598: triguṇatvāttu pradhānasya sarvajñānakāraṇabhūtaṃ sattvaṃ pradhānāvasthāyāmapi vidyata iti pradhānasyācetanasyaiva sataḥ sarvajñatvamupacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2599: vedāntavākyeṣvavaśyaṃ ca tvayāpi sarvajñaṃ brahmābhyupagacchatā sarvajñānāktimattvenaiva sarvajñatvamupagantavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:2600: nahi sarvaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ kurvadeva brahma vartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2601: tathāhi- jñānasya nityatve jñānakriyāṃ prati svātantryaṃ brahmaṇo hīyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:2602: athānityaṃ taditi jñānakriyāyā uparametāpi brahma, tadā sarvajñānāktimattvenaiva sarvajñatvamāpatati
GSP33brssgo1u:2606: nāsaṃhatasyaikātmakasya brahmaṇa ityevaṃ prāptaṃ idaṃ sūtramārabhyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:2608: buddhau yaḥ pratibimbaḥ sa tādṛśabimbapūrvakaḥ pratibimbatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2617: na sāṃkhyaparikalpitamacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ vedānteṣvāśrayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:2624: tatredaṃśabdavācyaṃ nāmarūpavyākṛtaṃ jagatprāgutpatteḥ sadātmanāvadhārya tasyaiva prakṛtasya sacchabdavācyasyekṣaṇapūrvakaṃ tejaḥprabhṛteḥ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:2634: tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ na jāyate' (muṇḍa. 1.1.9) ityevamādīnyapi sarvajñeśvarakāraṇaparāṇi vākyānudāhartavyāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:2635: yattūktaṃ sattvadharmeṇa jñānena sarvajñaṃ pradhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP33brssgo1u:2640: yadi guṇasāmye sati sattvavyapāśrayāṃ jñānāktimāśritya sarvajñaṃ pradhānamucyeta kāmaṃ rajastamovyapāśrayāmapi jñānapratibandhakaśaktimāśritya kiñcijjñamucyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:2647: tathāsati yannimittamīkṣitṛtvaṃ pradhānasya tadeva sarvajñaṃ mukhyaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇamiti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2650: atrocyate- idaṃ tāvadbhavānpraṣṭavyaḥ, kathaṃ nityajñānakriyatve sarvajñatvahāniriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2651: yasya hi sarvaviṣayāvabhāsanakṣamaṃ jñānaṃ nityamasti so 'sarvajña iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:2652: anityatve hi jñānasya kadācijjānāti kadācinnajānātītyasarvajñatvamapi syāt
GSP33brssgo1u:2653: nāsau jñānanityatve doṣo 'sti jñānanityatve jñānaviṣayaḥ svātantryavyapadeśo nopapadyata iti cenna, pratatauṣṇyaprakāśe 'pi
GSP33brssgo1u:2655: nanu saviturdāhyaprakāśasaṃyoge sati dahati prakāśayatīti vyapadeśaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:2658: asatyapi karmaṇi savitā prakāśata iti kartṛtvavyapadeśadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2659: evamasatyapi jñānakarmaṇi brahmaṇaḥ 'tadaikṣata' iti kartṛtvavyapadeśopapatterna vaiṣamyam
GSP33brssgo1u:2662: tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīye nāmarūpe avyākṛte vyācikīrṣite iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2664: yogaśāstravidaḥ, kimu vaktavyaṃ tasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasya sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhṛtiviṣayaṃ nityajñānaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2667: apicāvidyādimataḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ śarīrādyapekṣā jñānotpattiḥ syānna jñānapratibandhakāraṇarahitasyeśvarasya
GSP33brssgo1u:2669: 'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2670: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca' (śvetā.
GSP33brssgo1u:2673: sa vetti vedyaṃ na ca tasyāsti vettā tamāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam'
GSP33brssgo1u:2681: tatkṛtaśca śabdapratyayavyavahāro lokasya dṛṣṭo ghaṭacchidraṃ karakādicchidramityādirākāśāvyatireke 'pi tatkṛtā cākāśe ghaṭākāśādibhedamithyābuddhirdṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2687: yathā tu tarkeṇāpi brahmaṇa eva kāraṇatvaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyate na pradhānādīnāṃ tathā prapañcayiṣyati- 'na vilakṣaṇatvādasya'- (bra. 2.1.4)
GSP33brssgo1u:2690: bhavatu siddhe vedāntānāṃ samanvayaḥ tathāpi mānāntarāyoge brahmaṇi
GSP33brssgo1u:2692: kintu sargādyaṃ kāryaṃ jaḍaprakṛtikaṃ, kāryatvāt, ghaṭavat ityanumānagamye triguṇe pradhāne samanvaya ityākṣipantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2694: ata eva pradhānādavanumānopasthite śaktigrahasaṃbhavāt tatparatayā vākyāni yojayantītyuktam
GSP33brssgo1u:2696: śuṅgena liṅgena kāraṇasya svato 'nveṣaṇaṃ darśayanto mānāntarasiddhameva jagatkāraṇaṃ vadantītyāha-sarveṣviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2700: yajjaḍaṃ taccetanasaṃyuktaṃ, yathā rathādiriti sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānagamyāḥ pradhānapuruṣa saṃyogā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2702: sṛṣṭivākyebhya eva parārthānumānarūpebhyo yatkāryaṃ tadbuddhimatkartṛkamitīśvaraṃ kartāraṃ, paramāṇūṃśca yatkāryadravyaṃ tatsvanyūnaparimāṇadravyārabdamityanumimata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2705: yadvastu tacchūnyāvasānaṃ, yathā dīpa iti yuktyābhāsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2709: yajjagatkāraṇaṃ taccetanamacetanaṃ veti īkṣaṇasyamukhyatvagauṇatvābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha--tatra sāṃkhyā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2713: acetanasatvasyaiva sarvajñatvaṃ, na cetanasyetyāha-tena ca satvadharmeṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2718: trayo guṇā eva pradhānaṃ tasyasāmyavasthā tadabhedapradhānamityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2720: nanu mayā kimiti śaktimatvarūpaṃ gauṇaṃ sarvajñatvamaṅgīkāryamiti,
GSP33brssgo1u:2734: evaṃ tatsadīkṣitvā ākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā tejaḥ sṛṣṭavadityāha-taditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2737: prāṇācchraddhāṃ khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano annamannādvīryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ karmalokālokeṣu nāma ca'ityuktāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2739: nanu 'ikśitapo dhātunirdeśe'iti kātyāyanasmaraṇādīkṣateriti padena śtibantena dhāturucyate
GSP33brssgo1u:2740: tena dhātvarthaṃ īkṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ vyākhyāyata ityaśaṅkya
GSP33brssgo1u:2742: 'itikartavyatāvidheryajateḥ pūrvavatvaṃ'iti jaiminisūtre yathā yajatipadena lakṣaṇayā dhātvartho yāga ucyate tadvidihāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2750: saṃprati na kevalajaḍavṛttirjñānaśabdārthaḥ kintu sākṣibodhaviśiṣṭā vṛttirvṛttivyaktabodho vā jñānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2756: sarvajñatvaṃ nāma sarvaghocarajñānatvaṃ, na jñānakartṛtvaṃ, jñānasya kṛtyasādhyatvāditi hṛdikṛtvā pṛcchati-idaṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:2762: nanu prakāśaterakarmakatvātsavitā prakāśata iti prayoge 'pi jānāteḥ sakarmakatvātkarmābhāve 'tadaikṣata'ityayuktamiti, tatrāha-karmāpekṣāyāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2764: karmāvivakṣāyāmapi prakāśarūpe savitari prakāśata iti kathañcitprakāśakriyāśrayatvena kartṛtvopacāravaccidātmanyapi cidrūpekṣaṇakartṛtvopacārānna vaiṣamyamityuktaṃ pūrvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2765: adhunā tu kumbhakārasya svopādhyantaḥkaraṇavṛttirūpekṣaṇavadīśvarasyāpi svopādhyavidyāyāḥ vividhasṛṣṭisaṃskārāyāḥ pralayāvasānenodbuddhasaṃskārāyāḥ sargonmukhaḥ kaścitpariṇāmaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2766: saṃbhavati, ataḥ tasyāṃ sūkṣmarūpeṇa nilīna sarvakāryaviṣayakamīkṣaṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2769: nanu māyopādhikabimbacinmātrasyeśvarasya kathamīkṣaṇaṃ prati mukhyaṃ kartṛtvaṃ, kṛtyabhāvāditi cenna, kāryānukūlajñānavata eva kartṛtvādīśvarasyāpi īkṣaṇānukūlanityajñānavattvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2770: na ca nityajñānenaiva kartṛtvanirvāhātkimīkṣaṇeneti vācyam, vāyvādereva śabdavattvasaṃbhavātkimākāśenetyatiprasaṅgāt
GSP33brssgo1u:2772: avyākṛte sūkṣmātmanā sthite vyākartuṃ sthūlīkartumiṣṭe ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2784: jñānarūpeṇa balena yā sṛṣṭikriyā sā svābhāvikī /
GSP33brssgo1u:2786: jñānasya caitanyasya balaṃ māyāvṛttipratibimbitattvena sphuṭatvaṃ tasya kriyānāma bimbatvena brahmaṇo janakatā jñātṛtāpi svābhāvikīti vārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2801: avidyāyāṃ hi pratibimbo jīvaḥ, bimbacaitanyamīśvara iti bhedo
GSP33brssgo1u:2807: sa ca mithyābuddhyā mīyata iti mithyābuddhimātreṇa bhrāntisiddhājñānena kalpita iti cakārārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2811: pūrvapūrvabhrāntimātreṇa dṛśyate na ca prameyatayeti vārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2819: yathā pratyāsannapatanatāṃ nadyāḥ kūlasyālakṣya kūlaṃ pipātiṣatītyacetane
GSP33brssgo1u:2820: 'pi kūle cetanavadupacāro dṛṣṭaḥ, tadvadacetano 'pi pradhāne pratyāsannasarge cetanavadupacāro bhaviṣyati 'tadaikṣata' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2821: yathā loke kaściccetanaḥ snātvā bhuktvā cāparāhne grāmaṃ rathena gamiṣyāmītīkṣitvānantaraṃ tathaiva niyamena pravartate, tathā pradhānamapi mahadādyākāreṇa niyamena pravartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2843: (chāndo. 6.2.1,3) iti ca tejo 'bannānāṃ sṛṣṭimuktvā tadeva prakṛtaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2844: sadīkṣitṛ, tāni ca tejo 'bannāni, devatāśabdena parāmṛśyāha- 'seyaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2845: devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupravaśya nāmarūpe
GSP33brssgo1u:2847: tatra yadi pradhānamacetanaṃ guṇavṛttyekṣitṛ kalpyeta tadeva prakṛtatvātseyaṃ devateti parāmṛśyeta
GSP33brssgo1u:2849: jīvo hi nāma cetanaḥ śarīrādhyakṣaḥ prāṇānāṃ dhārayitā,
GSP33brssgo1u:2853: nācetanasya pradhānasya cetano jīvaḥ svarūpaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:2854: atha tu cetanaṃ brahma mukhyamīkṣitṛ parigṛhyate tasya jīvaviṣaya ātmaśabdaprayoga upapadyate
GSP33brssgo1u:2855: tathā 'sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chāndo. 6.14.3) ityatra 'sa ātmā' iti prakṛtaṃ sadaṇimānamātmānamātmaśabdenopadiśya 'tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti cetanasya śvetaketorātmatvenopadiśati, aptejasostu viṣayatvādacetanatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2862: nanu pradhānasya cetanena kiṃ sāmyaṃ yena gauṇamīkṣaṇamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:2868: sā prakṛtā sacchabdavācyā iyamīkṣitrī devatā parokṣā hanta idānīṃ bhūtasṛṣṭyanantaraṃ imāḥ sṛṣṭāstisrastejo 'bannarūpāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2870: anena pūrvakalpānubhūtenajīvenātmanā mama svarūpeṇa tā anupraviśya tāsāṃ bhogyatvāya nāma ca rūpaṃ ca sthūlaṃ kariṣyāmītyaikṣatetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2873: svapakṣe tu bimbapratibimbayorloke bhedasyakalpitatvadarśanājjīvo brāhmaṇaḥ sata ātmeti yuktamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2874: jīvasya sacchabdārthaṃ pratyātmaśabdāt sanna pradhānamityuktvā satau jīvaṃ pratyātmaśabdānna pradhānamiti vidhāntareṇa hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe-tatheti
GSP33brssgo1u:2875: sa yaḥsadākhya eṣoṇimāsūkṣmaḥ, aitadātmakamidaṃ sarvaṃ jagat, tatsadeva
GSP33brssgo1u:2878: he śvetaketo, tvaṃ ca nāsi saṃsārī, kintu tadeva sadabhādhitaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2885: āptejasodṛgviṣayatvātsṛjyatvānniyamyatvāccācetanatvamīkṣaṇasya mukhyatve bādhakamasti sādhakaṃ ca nāstīti hetoryuktamīkṣaṇasya gauṇatvamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2889: syādetadyadi sata īkṣaṇaṃ mukhyaṃ syāttadeva kuta ityata āha-satastviti
GSP33brssgo1u:2894: yathā rājñaḥ sarvārthakāriṇi bhṛtye bhavatyātmaśabdo mamātmā bhadrasena iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2895: pradhānaṃ hi puruṣasyātmano bhogāpavargo kurvadupakaroti, rājña iva bhṛtyaḥ saṃdhivigrahādiṣu vartamānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2900: FN: anena pūrvasṛṣṭyanubhūtena prāṇadhṛtihetunāmātmanā sadrūpeṇa yathoktā devatāḥ sargānantaraṃ praviśya nāma rūpaṃ ceti
GSP33brssgo1u:2904: na pradhānamacetanamātmaśabdālambanaṃ bhavitumarhati, 'sa ātmā' iti prakṛtaṃ sadaṇimānamādāya 'tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti cetanasya śvetaketormokṣayitavyasya tanniṣṭhamupadiśya 'ācāryavānpuruṣo veda' 'tasya
GSP33brssgo1u:2905: tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chāndo. 6.14.2) iti mokṣopadeśāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2906: yadi hyacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ tadasīti grāhayenmumukṣuṃ cetanaṃ santamacetano 'sīti tadā viparītavādī śāstraṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:2909: yadi cājñasya sato mumukṣoracetanamanātmānamātmetyupadiśetpramāṇabhūtaṃ śāstraṃ sa śraddhadhānatayāndhagolāṅgūlanyāyena tadātmadṛṣṭiṃ na
GSP33brssgo1u:2910: parityajet, tadvyatiriktaṃ cātmānaṃ na pratipadyeta, tathā sati puruṣārthādvihanyetānarthaṃ na ṛcchet /
GSP33brssgo1u:2911: tasmādyathā svargādyarthino 'gnihotrādisādhanaṃ yathābhūtamupadiśati tathā mumukṣorapi 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti yathābhūtamevātmānamupaduśatīti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2912: evañca sati taptaparaśugrahaṇamokṣadṛṣṭāntena satyābhisandhasya mokṣopadeśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:2917: bhṛtye tu svāmibhṛtyabhedasya pratyakṣatvādupapanno gauṇa ātmaśabdo mamātmā bhadrasena iti
GSP33brssgo1u:2918: apica Dvacidgauṇaḥ śabdo dṛṣṭa iti naitāvatā śabdapramāṇaker'tho gauṇī kalpanā nyāyyā, sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brssgo1u:2919: yattūktaṃ cetanācetanayoḥ sādhāraṇa ātmābdaḥ kratujvalanayoriva jyotiḥśabda iti, tanna, anekārthatvāsyānyāyyatvāt
GSP33brssgo1u:2920: tasmāccetanaviṣaya eva mukhya ātmaśabdaścetanatvopacārādbhūtādiṣu prayujyate bhūtātmendriyātmeti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:2924: prakṛtaṃ tu sadīkṣitṛ, saṃnihitaścetanaḥ śvetaketuḥ nahi cetanasya śvetaketoracetana ātmā saṃbhavatītyavocāma /
GSP33brssgo1u:2926: jyotiḥśabdo 'pi laukikena prayogeṇa jvalana eva rūḍhor'thavādakalpitena tu jvalanasādṛśyena kratau pravṛtta ityadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2927: athavā pūrvasūtra evātmaśabdaṃ nirastasamastagauṇatvasādhāraṇatvaśaṅkatayā vyākhyāya tataḥ svatantra eva pradhānakāraṇanirākaraṇaheturvyākhyeyaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2931: tadā cetanaṃ santaṃ mumukṣumacetano 'sītibruvacchāstraṃ viparītavādibhūtvā puṃso 'narthāyetikṛtvā syādapramāṇamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:2933: 'yathā satyābhisaṃdhastaptaṃ paraśuṃ sa na dahyate 'tha mucyate' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2942: tasminsatpadārthe niṣṭā abhedajñānaṃ yasya sa sanniṣṭhastasya muktiśravaṇāditi sūtrārthamāha-netyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:2945: kaścitkila duṣṭātmā mahāraṇyamārge patitamandhaṃ svabandhunagaramaṃ jagamiṣuṃ babhāṣe, kimātrāyuṣmatā duḥkhitena sthīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2946: sa cāndhaḥ sukhāṃ vāṇīmākarṇya tamāptaṃ matvovāca, aho madbhāgadheyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2947: yadatra bhavānmāṃ dīnaṃ svābhīṣṭanagaraprāpyasamarthaṃ bhāṣata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2949: upadideśa ca enamandhaṃ, eṣa goyuvā tvāṃ nagaraṃ neṣyati, mā tyaja lāṅgūlamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2953: ātmajñānābhāve sati vihanyeta mokṣaṃ na prāpnuyāt pratyutānarthaṃ saṃsāraṃ ca prāpnuyādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:2957: kasyacidāropitacoratvasya satyena taptaṃ paraśuṃ gṛhṇato mokṣo dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:2958: taddṛṣṭāntena satye brahmaṇi ahamityabhisaṃdhimato mokṣo yathā
GSP33brssgo1u:2959: 'satyābhisaṃdhastaptaṃ paraśuṃ gṛhṇāti sa na dahyate 'tha mucyate'iti
GSP33brssgo1u:2961: sa upadeśaḥ saṃpatpakṣe na yuktaḥ ityāha-anyatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2963: tasmānmokṣopadeśānmukhye saṃbhavati gauṇatvasyānyāyyatvāccātmaśabdaḥ sati mukhya ityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2969: astuvāvyāpivastūnāṃ sādhāraṇastathāpi tasyātra śrutau pradhānaparatve 'pi niścāyakābhāvānna pradhānavṛttitetyāha-sādhāraṇatve 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2970: cetanavācitve tu prakaraṇaṃ śetaketupadaṃ ca niścāyakamastītyāha-prakṛtaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2977: 'etāni vāva tāni jyotīṃṣi ya etasya stomāḥ'ityarthavādena kalpitaṃ jvalanena sādṛśyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:2979: tathā ca jyotīṃṣi stomā asyeti jyotiṣṭoma ityatra jyotiḥśabdo gauṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2980: nanvātmaśabdāditi pūrvasūtra evātmaśabdasya pradhāne gauṇatvasādhāraṇatvaśaṅkānirāsaḥ kartumucitaḥ, mukhyārthasya lāghavenoktisaṃbhave gauṇatvanānārthakatvāśaṅkāyā durbalatvena tannirāsārthaṃ pṛthaksūtrāyāsānapekṣaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2981: tathā ca śaṅkottaratvenāsūtrākhyānaṃ nātīva śobhata ityarucerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:2982: nirastā samastā gauṇatvanānārthakatvaśaṅkā yasyātmaśabdasya sa tacchaṅkastasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:2984: sata ātmaśabde jīvābhinnatvāditi hetvapekṣayā mokṣopadeśaḥ svatantra eva pradhānakāraṇatvanirāse heturityarthaḥ //7//
GSP33brssgo1u:2989: yadyānātmaiva pradhānaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ 'sa ātmā tattvamasi' itīhopadiṣṭaṃ syātsa tadupadeśaśravaṇādanātmajñatayā tanniṣṭho mā bhūditi
GSP33brssgo1u:2991: yathārundhatīṃ didarśayiṣustatsamīpasthāṃ sthūlāṃ tārāmamukhyāṃ prathamamarundhatiti grāhayitvā tāṃ pratyākhyāya paścādarundhatīmeva grāhayati tadvannāyamātmeti brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:2999: 'uta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātamiti kathaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sa ādeśo bhavatīti yathā somyaikena
GSP33brssgo1u:3000: mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam'
GSP33brssgo1u:3001: 'evaṃ somya sa ādeśo bhavati' (chāndo. 6.1.1,3) iti vākyopakrame śravaṇāt
GSP33brssgo1u:3002: naca sacchabdavācye pradhāne bhogyavargakāraṇe heyatvenāheyatvena vā vijñāte bhoktṛvargo vijñāto bhavati, apradhānavikāratvādbhoktṛvargasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:3004: nanu yathā kaścidarundhatīṃ darśayituṃ nikaṭasthāṃ sthūlāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3011: vedānadhītyāgataṃ stabdhaṃ putraṃ pitovāca-he putra uta api, ādiśyata ityādeśa upadeśaikalabhyaḥ sdātmā tamapyaprākṣyaḥ gurunikaṭepṛṣṭavānasi,
GSP33brssgo1u:3012: yasya śravaṇena mananena vijñānenānyasya śravaṇādikaṃ bhavatītyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3013: nanvanyena jñātena kathamanyadajñātamapi jñātaṃ syāditi putraḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3015: he bhagavaḥ, kathaṃ nu khalu sa bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3021: nanu vācā nāmaivārabhyate, na ghaṭādirityāśaṅkya nāmamātrameva vikāra
GSP33brssgo1u:3028: kāraṇaṃ kāryādbhinnasattākaṃ na kāryaṃ kāraṇādbhinnam, ataḥ kāraṇātiriktasya kāryasvarūpasyābhāvātkāraṇajñānena tajjñānaṃ bhavatīti sthite dārṣṭāntikamāha-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3029: mṛdvadbrahmaiva satyaṃ viyadādivikāro mṛṣeti brahmajñāne sati jñeyaṃ kiñcinnāvaśiṣyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3030: yadyapi pradhāne jñāte tādātmyādvikārāṇāṃ jñānaṃ bhavati tathāpi na puruṣāṇāṃ, teṣāṃ pradhānavikāratvābhāvādityāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3035: he śvetaketo, uta api ādisyata ityādeśastaṃ śāstrācāryoktigamyaṃ vastvaprākṣyaḥ pṛṣṭavānasyācāryam
GSP33brssgo1u:3036: vācārabhyamāṇamuccāryamāṇaṃ nāmadheyameva vikāro na tu ghaṭaśarāvādināmātirikto mṛdi vikāro vastuto 'sti paramārthato mṛttikaiva tu satyaṃ vastvastīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3038: tadeva sacchabdavācyaṃ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate- 'yatraitatpuruṣaḥ svapiti nāma satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati tasmādenaṃ svapitītyācakṣate svaṃ hyapīto bhavati' (chāndo. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3039: eṣā śrutiḥ svapitītyetatpuruṣasya lokaprasiddhaṃ nāma nirvakti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3046: sa upādhidvayoparame suṣuptāvasthāmupādhikṛtaviśeṣābhāvātsvātmani pralīna iveti 'svaṃ hyapīto bhavati' ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3047: yathā hṛdayaśabdanirvacanaṃ śrutvā darśitam- 'sa vā eṣa ātmā hṛdi tasyaitadeva niruktaṃ hṛdyayamiti tasmādhṛdayamiti' (chāndo. 8.3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3048: yathāvāśanāyodanyāśabdapravṛttimūlaṃ darśayati śrutiḥ- 'āpa eva tadaśitaṃ nayante' 'teja eva tatpītaṃ nayante' (chā. 6. 8. 3,5) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:3049: evaṃ svamātmānaṃ sacchabdavācyamapīto bhavatītīmamarthaṃ svapitināmanirvacanena darśayati
GSP33brssgo1u:3050: naca cetana ātmācetanaṃ pradhānaṃ svarūpatvena pratipadyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:3051: yadi punaḥ pradhānamevātmīyātvātsvāśabdenaivocyeta, evamapi cetano 'cetanamapyetīti viruddhamāpadyeta
GSP33brssgo1u:3052: śrutyantaraṃ ca - 'prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram' /
GSP33brssgo1u:3054: ato yasminnapyayaḥ sarveṣāṃ cetanānāṃ taccetanaṃ sacchabdavācyaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ na pradhānam FN: yatra suptau puṃsaḥ svapitītyetannāma bhavati tadā puruṣaḥ satā saṃpannastenaikībhūta iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3058: etatsvapanaṃ yathā syāttathā yatra suṣuptau svapitīti nāma bhavati tadā puruṣaḥ satā saṃpanna ekībhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3065: laya ityāśaṅkya upādhilayāditi vaktuṃ jāgratsvapnayorupādhimāha-mana iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3070: sa ātmā sthūlasūkṣmopādhidvayoparame 'haṃ naraḥ karteti viśeṣābhimānābhavāllīna ityupacaryata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3077: idaṃ ca pradhānapakṣe na yuktamityāha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3084: yadi tārkikasamaya iva vedānteṣvapi bhinnā kāraṇāvagatirabhaviṣyatkvaciccetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3089: vipratiṣṭherannevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokāḥ' (kau. 3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3092: 'ātmana eṣa prāṇo jāyate' (pra. 3.3) iti cātmanaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ darśayanti sarve vedāntāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3098: vipratiṣṭheran nānāgatitvena diśo daśāpi prasṛtāḥ syurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3100: tattadvedāntajanyānāmavagatīnāṃ cetanakāraṇaviṣayakatvena sāmānyānnācetanaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti sūtrārthaṃ vyatirekamukhenāha-yadi
GSP33brssgo1u:3107: sūryādayastadanugrāhakāḥ, tadanantaraṃ lokyanta iti lokā viṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3108: nanu vedāntānāṃ svataprāmāṇyatvena pratyakaṃ svārthaniścāyakatvasaṃbhavātkiṃ gatisāmānyenetyata āha-mahacceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3111: yathā sarveṣāṃ cakṣuṣāmekarūpāvagatihetutvaṃ, śravaṇānāṃ śabdāvagatihetutvaṃ ghrāṇādīnāṃ gandhādiṣu, evaṃ brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3117: svaśabdenaiva ca sarvajña īśvaro jagataḥ kāraṇamiti śrūyate śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ mantropaniṣadi sarvajñamīśvaraṃ prakṛtya 'sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścijjanitā na cādhipaḥ' (śve. 6.9) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3118: tasmāt sarvajñaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ, nācetanaṃ pradhānamanyadveti siddham // 11 //
GSP33brssgo1u:3122: evamīkṣatyādiliṅgairacetane vedāntānāṃ samanvayaṃ nirasya cetanavācakaśabdenāpi nirasyati-śrutatvācceti
GSP33brssgo1u:3125: 'jñaḥ kālakālo guṇī sarvavidyaḥ'iti sarvajñaṃ parameśvaraṃ prakṛtya 'sa
GSP33brssgo1u:3134: 'janmādyasya yataḥ' ityārabhya 'śrutatvācca' ityevamantaiḥ sūtrairyānyudāhṛtāni vedāntavākyāni teṣāṃ sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktirīśvaro
GSP33brssgo1u:3136: gatisāmānyopanyāsena ca sarve vedāntāścetanakāraṇavādina iti vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3140: 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛha. 4.5.15) 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmātha yatrānyatpaśyatyanyacchṛṇotyanyadvijānāti tadalpaṃ vo vai bhūmā tadamṛtamatha yadalpaṃ tanmartyam' (chāndo. 7.24.1) 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' (tai.ā. 3.12.7) 'niṣkalaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3144: iti caivaṃ sahasraśo vidyāvidyāviṣayabhedena brahmaṇo dvirūpatāṃ darśayanti vākyāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:3149: eka eva tu paramātmeśvarastaistairguṇaviśeṣairviśiṣṭa upāsyo yadyapi bhavati tathāpi yathāguṇopāsanameva phalāni bhidyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:3150: 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti śruteḥ, 'yathākraturasmiṃloke
GSP33brssgo1u:3151: puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati' (chā. 3.14.1) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:3152: smṛteśca- 'yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram /
GSP33brssgo1u:3153: taṃ tamevaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ //' (gī. 8.6) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3154: yadyapyeka ātmā sarvabhūteṣu sthāvarajaṅgameṣu gūḍhastathāpi cittopādhiviśeṣatāratamyādātmanaḥ kūṭasthanityasyaikarūpasyāpyuttarottaramāviṣkṛtasya tāratamyamaiśvaryaśaktiviśeṣaiḥ śrūyate- 'tasya ya ātmānamāvistarāṃ veda'
GSP33brssgo1u:3158: yatra yatra vibhūtyādyatiśayaḥ sa sa īśvara ityupāsyatayā codyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3159: evamihāpyādityamaṇḍale hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvapāpmodayaliṅgātpara eveti vakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3161: evaṃ sadyomuktikāraṇamapyātmajñānamupādhiviśeṣadvāreṇopadiśyamānamapyavivakṣitopādhisaṃbandhaviśeṣaṃ parāparaviṣayatvena saṃdihyamānaṃ vākyagatiparyālocanayā nirṇetavyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3163: evamekamapi brahmāpekṣitopādhisaṃbandhaṃ nirastopādhisaṃbandhaṃ copāsyatvena jñeyatvena ca vedānteṣūpadiśyata iti pradarśayituṃ paro grantha ārabhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3170: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimihānandamayaśabdena parameva brahmocyate yatprakṛtam
GSP33brssgo1u:3179: iha tu 'tasya priyameva śiraḥ' ityādi śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3180: śārīratvaṃ ca śrūyate- 'tasyaiṣa eva śārīra ātmā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3182: tasya pūrvasya vijñānamayasyaiṣa eva śārīra ātmā ya eṣa ānandamaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3183: naca saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyasaṃspārśo vārayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3190: ānandamayaṃ prastutya 'raso vai saḥ' iti tasyaiva rasatvamuktvocyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:3198: śrutyantare ca 'vijñānamānandaṃ brahma' (bṛ. 3.9.28) iti brahmaṇyevānandaśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3199: evamānandaśabdasya bahukṛtvo brahmaṇyabhyāsādānandamaya ātmā brahmeti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3203: mukhyameva hyātmānamupadidikṣu śāstraṃ lokabuddhimanusarat, annamayaṃ śarīramanātmānamatyantamūḍhānāmātmatvena
GSP33brssgo1u:3207: yathārundhatīnidarśane barhvīṣvapi tārāsvamukhyāsvarundhatīṣu darśitāsu yāntyā pradarśyate sā mukhyaivārundhatī bhavati, evamihāpyānandamayasya sarvāntaratvānmukhyamātmatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3208: yattu brūṣe, priyādīnāṃ śirastvādikalpanānupapannā mukhyasyātmana iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3210: śārīratvamapyānandamayasyānnamayādiśarīraparamparayā pradarśyamānatvāt, na punaḥ sākṣādeva śārīratvaṃ saṃsārivat, tasmādāndamayaḥ para evātmā // 12
GSP33brssgo1u:3219: sarvavedāntānāṃ kārye pradhānādyacetane ca samanvayanirāsena brahmaparatvaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3221: vedānteṣu saguṇanirguṇabrahmavākyānāṃ bahulamupalabdheḥ, tatra kasya vākyasya saguṇopāsanāvidhidvārā niguṇe samanvayaḥ kasya vā guṇavivakṣāṃ vinā sākṣādeva brahmaṇi samanvaya ityākāṅkṣaiva kāraṇamityāha-ucyata iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3223: nāmarūpātmako vikāraḥ sarvaṃ jagat, tadbhedo hiraṇyaśmaśrutvādiviśeṣa iti vākyārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3225: yasyāṃ khalvajñānāvasthāyāṃ dvaitamiva kalpitaṃ bhavati tattadetaraḥ sannitaraṃ paśyatīti dṛśyopādhikaṃ vastu bhāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3226: yatra jñānakāle viduṣaḥ sarvaṃ jagadātmamātramabhūttattadā tu kena kaṃ paśyedityākṣepānnirupādhikaṃ tattvaṃ bhāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3227: yatra bhumni niścito vidvān dvitīyaṃ kimapi na vetti so 'dvitīyo bhūmā paramātmā nirguṇaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3229: yatra saguṇe sthito dvitīyaṃ vetti tadalpaṃ paricchinnaṃ, yastu bhūmā tadamṛtaṃ nityam
GSP33brssgo1u:3232: dhīraḥ paramātmaiva sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya sṛṣṭvā nāmāni ca kṛtvā buddhyādau praviśya jīvasaṃjño vyavaharanyo vartate sa saguṇastaṃ nirguṇatvena vidvānapyamṛto bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3237: añjanaṃ mūlatamaḥsaṃbandho dharmādikaṃ vā tacchūnyaṃ nirañjanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3238: kiñcāmṛtasya mokṣasya svayameva vākyotthavṛttisthatvena paramutkṛṣṭaṃ setuṃ laukikasetuvatprāpakam
GSP33brssgo1u:3239: yathā dagdhendhano 'nalaḥ śāmyati tamivāvidyāṃ tajjaṃ ca dagdhvā praśāntaṃ nirguṇamātmānaṃ vidyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3244: dvaitasthānaṃ nyūnamalpaṃ saguṇarūpaṃ nirguṇādanyat, tathā saṃpūrṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ saguṇādanyadityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3246: vidyāviṣayo jñeyaṃ nirguṇatvaṃ satyaṃ avidyāviṣaya upāsyaṃ saguṇatvaṃ kalpitamityavirodhaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3248: nirguṇajñānārthamāropitaprapañcamāśrityabādhātprākkāle guḍajihvikānyāyena tattatphalārthānyupāsanāni vidhīyante, teṣāṃ cittaikāgryadvārā jñānaṃ mukhyaṃ phalamiti tadvākyānāmapi mahātātparyaṃ brahmaṇīti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3252: dhyānānāṃ mānasatvāt, jñānāntaraṅgatvācca, jñānakāṇḍe vidhānamiti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3259: taṃ paramātmānaṃ yadyadguṇatvena lokā rājānamivopāsate tattadguṇavatvameva teṣāṃ phalaṃ bhavati
GSP33brssgo1u:3261: iha yādṛśadhyānavān bhavati mṛtvā tādṛśopāsyarūpo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3263: nanu sarvabhūteṣu niratiśayātmana ekatvādupāsyopāsakayostāratamyaśrutayaḥ kathamityāśaṅkya pariharati-yadyapyeka iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3264: uktānāmupādhīnāṃ śuddhitāratamyādaiśvaryajñānasukharūpaśaktīnāṃ tāratamyarūpā viśeṣā bhavanti tairekarūpasyātmana uttarottaraṃ manuṣyādihiraṇyagarbhāntepvāvirbhāvāvatāratamyaṃ śrūyate tasyātmana ātmānaṃ svarūpamāvistarāṃ prakaṭataraṃ yo veda upāste so 'śnute taditi tarappratyayādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3265: tathāca nikṛṣṭhopādhirātmaivopāsakaḥ, utkṛṣṭopādhirīśvara upāsya ityaupādhikaṃ tāratamyamaviruddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3267: atra sūryāderapi na jīvatvenopāsyatā kintvīśvaratvenetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3270: evaṃ yasminvākye upādhirvivakṣitaḥ tadvākyamupāsanaparamiti vaktumuttarasūtrasaṃdarbhasyārambha ityuktvā yatra na vivakṣitaḥ tadvākyaṃ jñeyabrahmaparamiti nirṇayārthamārambha ityāha-evaṃ sadya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3275: annaṃ prasiddhaṃ, prāṇamanobuddhyaḥ hiraṇyagarbharūpāḥ bimbacaitanyāmīśvara ānandaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3276: teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ vikārā ādhyātmikā dehaprāṇamanobuddhijīvā annamayādayaḥ pañcakośāḥ iti śruteḥ paramārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3277: pūrvādhikaraṇe gauṇamukhyekṣaṇayoratulyatvena saṃśayābhāvādgauṇaprāyapāṭho na niścāyaka ityuktaṃ tarhi mayaṭo vikāre prācurye ca mukhyatvātsaṃśaye vikāraprāyapāṭhādānandādhikāro jīva ānandamaya iti niśacayo 'stīti pratyudāharamasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha kiṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3282: pūrvapakṣe vṛttikāramatejīvopāstyā priyādiprāptiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tu brahmopāstyeti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3289: nanvānandapadābhyāse 'pyānandamayasya brahmatvaṃ kathamityāśaṅkya jyotiṣṭomādhikāre jyotiṣpadasya jyotiṣṭomaparatvavadānandamayaprakaraṇasthānandamayapadasyānandamayaparatvāttadabhyāsastasya brahmatvasādhaka ityabhipretyāha-
GSP33brssgo1u:3294: yadyapi eṣa ākāśaḥ pūrṇaḥ ānandaḥ sākṣiprerako na syāttadā ko
GSP33brssgo1u:3295: vānyāccalet, ko vā viśiṣyā prāṇyājjīvet, tasmādeṣa evānandayāti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3297: 'yuvā syātsādhuyuvā'ityādinā vakṣyamāṇā manuṣyayuvānanadamārabhya brahmānandāvasānā eṣā saṃnihitā ānandasya tāratamyamīmāṃsā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3299: mukhyasiddhānte tūpasaṃkramaṇaṃ viduṣaḥ kośānāṃ pratyaṅmātratvena vilāpanamiti jñeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3308: tāmrasya mūṣākāratvavatprāṇasya dehākāratvaṃ dehena sāmānyaṃ, tathā manaḥ prāṇākāraṃ tena samamityāha-pūrveṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3317: prakṛtivacanādayamanyaḥ śabdo vikāravacanaḥ samadhigataḥ, ānandamaya iti mayaṭo vikārthatvāt
GSP33brssgo1u:3320: 'tatprakṛtavacane mayaṭ' (pā. 5.4.21) iti hi pracuratāyāmapi mayaṭ smaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3321: yathā 'annamayo yajñaḥ' ityannapracura ucyate, evamānandapracuraṃ brahmānandamaya ucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3322: ānandapracuratvaṃ ca brahmaṇo manuṣyatvādārabhyottarasminnuttarasminsthāne śataguṇa ānanda ityuktvā brahmānandasya niratiśayatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3329: atra vacanagrahaṇātprakṛtasya prācuryavaiśiṣṭyasiddhiḥ, tādṛśasya loke mayaṭo 'bhidhānāt, yathā 'annamayo yajñaḥ'iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3330: atra hyannaṃ pracuramasminnityannaśabdaḥ prathamāvibhaktiśaktastasmānmayaṭ yajñasya prakṛtyarthānnaprācuryavācī dṛśyate na śuddhaprakṛtavacana iti dhyeyam //13//
GSP33brssgo1u:3335: yasmādānandahetutvaṃ brahmaṇo vyapadiśati śrutiḥ- 'eṣa hyevānandayāti' iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3337: yo hyanyānānandayati sa pracurānanda iti prasiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3338: yathā loke yo 'nyeṣāṃ dhanikatvamāpādayati sa pracuradhana iti gamyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3350: yasmādākāśādikrameṇa sthāvarajaṅgamāni bhūtānyajāyanta, yacca bhūtāni sṛṣṭvā tānyanupraviśya guhāyāmavasthitaṃ, sarvāntaraṃ, yasya vijñānāya 'anyo 'ntara ātmānyo 'ntara ātmā' iti prakrāntaṃ tanmāntravarṇikameva
GSP33brssgo1u:3361: yasmādevaṃ prakṛtaṃ tasmāttanmāntrāvarṇikameva brahmānandamaya iti vākye gīyata iti yojanā
GSP33brssgo1u:3362: nanu mantroktamevātra grāhmamiti ko nirbandhaḥ, tatrāha-mantreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3367: kiñca bhṛgave proktā, varuṇenopadiṣṭā bhṛguvallī pañcamaparyāyasthānande
GSP33brssgo1u:3386: tatra prākśarīrādyutpatterabhidhyānaṃ sṛjyamānānāṃ ca vikārāṇāṃ sraṣṭuravyatirekaḥ sarvavikārasṛṣṭiśca, na parasmādātmano 'nyatropapadyate
GSP33brssgo1u:3395: rasaṃhyevāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati' (tai. 2.7) iti jīvānandamayau bhedena
GSP33brssgo1u:3399: śrutismṛtī, yāvatā na labdhaiva labdhavyo bhavatītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3404: pratiṣidhyata eva tu paramārthataḥ sarvajñātparameśvarādanyo draṣṭā śrotā vā 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' (bṛ. 3.7.23) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3406: yathā māyāvinaścarmakhaḍgadharātsūtreṇākāśamadhirohataḥ sa eva māyāvī paramārtharūpo bhūmiṣṭho 'nyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3416: nanu labdhṛlabdhavyabhāve 'pyabhedaḥ kiṃ na syadata āha-nahi labdhaiveti
GSP33brssgo1u:3420: tarhyātmana evātmanā labhyatvoktibādhaḥ abhedādityāśaṅkya kalpitabhedānna bādha ityāha-tathāpīti
GSP33brssgo1u:3423: ātmanaḥ svājñānajabhrameṇa dehādyabhinnasya bhedabhrāntyā paramātmano jñeyatvādyuktirityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3424: anveṣṭavyo dehādiviviktatayā jñeyaḥ, vivekajñānena labdhavyaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, tadarthaṃ śrotavyaḥ, vijñānaṃ nididhyānaṃ sākṣātkāro vā śrutyantarasyārthānuvādādapaunaruktyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3425: nanu bhedaḥ satya evāstu, tatrāha-pratiṣidhyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3426: ata īśvarāddraṣṭā jīvo 'nyo nāstīti cejjīvabhedādīśvarasyāpi mithyātvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3428: avidyāpratibimbatvena kalpitājjīvāccinmātra īśvaraḥ pṛthagastīti na mithyātvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3431: sūtrārūḍhaḥ svato 'pi mithyā, na jīva ityarucyābhedamātramidhyātve
GSP33brssgo1u:3433: nanu sūtrabalādbhedaḥ satya ityata āha-īdṛśaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3440: ānandamayādhikāre ca 'so 'kāmayata bahusyāṃ prajāyeya' (tai. 2.6) iti kāmayitṛtvanirdeśānnānumānikamapi
GSP33brssgo1u:3443: pūrvasūtrodāhṛtāṃ kāmayitṛtvaśrutimāśritya prasaṅgātpunarnirākriyate gatisāmānyaprapañcanāya nanvānandātmakasattvapracuraṃ pradhānamānandamayamastu,
GSP33brssgo1u:3451: yasmādasminnānandamaye prakṛta ātmani pratibuddhasyāsya jīvasya tadyogaṃ śāsti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3461: yadā tvetasminnānandamaye nirantaraṃ tādātmyena pratitiṣṭhati tadā saṃsārabhayānnivartata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3462: tacca paramātmaparigrahe ghaṭate, na pradhānaparigrahe jīvaparigrahe vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3464: idaṃ tviha vaktavyam- 'sa vā eṣa puruṣo 'nnarasamayaḥ' /
GSP33brssgo1u:3466: anyo 'ntara ātmā prāṇamayaḥ' tasmāt 'anyo 'ntara ātmā manomayaḥ' tasmāt
GSP33brssgo1u:3468: mayaṭpravāhe satyānandamaya evākasmādardhajaratīyanyāyena kathamiva mayaṭaḥ prācuryarthātvaṃ brahmaviṣayatvaṃ cāśrīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3472: tasmāttasmādāntarasyāntarasyānyasyānyasyātmana ucyamānatvāt ānandamayāttu na kaścidanya āntara ātmocyate, tenānandamayasya brahmatvam, anyathā prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriyāprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:3473: atrocyate- yadyapyannamayādibhya ivānandamayādanyo 'ntara ātmeti na śrūyate tathāpi nānandamayasya brahmatvaṃ, yata ānandamayaṃ prakṛtya
GSP33brssgo1u:3479: tatra yadbrahma mantravarṇe prakṛtam- 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:3485: tatra kathaṃ brahmaṇaḥ svapradhānatvaṃ śakyaṃ vijñātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:3487: nanvānandamayāvayavatvenāpi brahmaṇi vijñāyamāne na prakṛtatvaṃ hīyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3489: atrocyate- tathā sati tadeva brahmānandamaya ātmāvayavī tadeva ca brahmapucchaṃ pratiṣṭhāvayava ityasāmañjasyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3490: anyataraparigrahe tu yuktaṃ 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityatraiva brahmanirdeśa āśrayituṃ, brahmaśabdasaṃyogāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3492: apica brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā ityuktatvedamucyate- 'tadapyeṣa śloko bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3501: kathaṃ punaḥ svapradhānaṃ sadbrahma, ānandamayasya pucchatvena nirdiśyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:3507: apica ānandamayasya brahmatve priyādyavayavatvena saviśeṣaṃ brahmābhyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3508: nirviśeṣaṃ tu brahma vākyaśeṣe śrūyate, vāṅmanasayoragocaratvābhidhānāt- '
GSP33brssgo1u:3513: apica ānandapracura ityukte duḥkhāstitvamapi gamyate prācuryasya loke pratiyogyalpatvāpekṣatvāt
GSP33brssgo1u:3514: tathāca sati, 'yatra nānyatpaśti nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā'
GSP33brssgo1u:3517: brahma tu na pratiśarīraṃ bhidyate, 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' (taitti.
GSP33brssgo1u:3522: rasaṃhyevāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati, ko hyevānyātkaḥ prāṇyāt, yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt'
GSP33brssgo1u:3526: yadica ānandamayaśabdasya brahmaviṣayatvaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet, tata uttareṣvānandamātraprayogeṣvapyānandamayābhyāsaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:3529: ityānandaprātipadikasya brahmaṇi prayogadarśanāt, 'yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na
GSP33brssgo1u:3530: syāt' ityādirbrahmaviṣayaḥ prayogo na tvānandamayābhyāsa ityavagantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3534: nanvānandamayasyopasaṃkramitavyasyānnamayādivadbrahmatve sati naiva viduṣo brahmaprāptiphalaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:3538: yato vāco nivartante' ityadinā ca prapañcyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3539: yā tvānandamayasaṃnidhāne 'so 'kāmayata bahusyāṃ prajāyeyeti' iyaṃ śrutirudāhṛtā sā 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityanena saṃnihitatareṇa brahmaṇā saṃbadhyamānā nānandamayasya brahmatāṃ pratibodhayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3544: 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' ityatra puṃliṅgenāpyātmaśabdena brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtatvāt
GSP33brssgo1u:3545: yā tu bhārgavī vāruṇī vidyā 'ānando brahmeti vyajānāt' iti tasyāṃ mayaḍaśravaṇāt, priyaśirastvādyaśravaṇācca yuktamānandasya brahmatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3546: tasmādaṇumātramapi viśeṣamanāśritya na svata eva priyaśirastvādi brahmaṇa upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3548: tasmādannamayādiṣvivānandamaye 'pi vikārārtha eva mayaḍvijñeyo na prācuryārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3549: sūtrāṇi tvevaṃ vyākhyeyāni- 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' ityatra kimānandamayāvayavatvena brahma vivakṣyata uta svapradhānatveneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3550: pucchaśabdādavayavatveneti prāpta ucyate- 'ānandamayo 'bhyāsāt' ānandamaya ātmetyatra 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā' iti svapradhānameva brahmopadiśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:3556: pucchamityavayavaśabdānna svapradhānatvaṃ brahmaṇa iti yaduktaṃ, tasya parihāro vaktavyaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3559: annamayādīnāṃ hi śiraādiṣu pucchāntevavayaveḥṣūkte tvānandamayasyāpi śiraādīnyavayavāntarāṇyuktvāvayavaprāyāpattyā 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'
GSP33brssgo1u:3563: sarvasya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya kāraṇatvena brahma vyapadiśyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:3566: naca kāraṇaṃ sat brahma svavikārasyānandamayasya mukhyayā vṛttyāvayava upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3567: aparāṇyapi sūtrāṇi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pucchavākyanirdiṣṭasyaiva brahmaṇa upapādakāni draṣṭavyāni FN: anātmye sasaṃbandhitayādhyastendriyajātenāpañcākṛtabhūtakāryeṇātmyena tādātmyādihīne, anirukte nikṛṣyocyanta iti niruktāni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi taiścābhedavarjite, niḥśeṣalayasthānaṃ nilayanaṃ māyā tacchūnye /
GSP33brssgo1u:3568: udaramiti ut api aramalpam antaraṃ bhedam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3572: yato yasmāt vācaḥ śaktivṛttyā tamaprakāśyaiva nivartante /
GSP33brssgo1u:3578: asminniti viṣayasaptamī ānandamayaviṣayakaprabodhavato jīvasya tadyogaṃ yasmācchāsti tasmānna pradhānamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3581: adṛśye sthūlaprapañcaśūnye, ātmasaṃbandhamātmātmyaṃ liṅgaśarīraṃ tadrahite, niruktaṃ śabdaśakyaṃ tadbhinne, niḥśeṣalayasthānaṃ nilayanaṃ māyā tacchūnye brahmaṇi, abhayaṃ yathā syattathā yadaiva pratiṣṭhāṃ manasaḥ prakṛṣṭāṃ vṛttimeṣa vidvāṃllabhate atha tadaivābhayaṃ brahma prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3582: ut api aramalpamapyantaraṃ bhedaṃ yadaivaiṣa naraḥ paśyati atha tadā tasya bhayamiti yojanā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3584: iha paravyākhyāyāṃ vikārārthake mayaṭibuddhisthe satyakasmātkāraṇaṃ vinā ekaprakaraṇasthasya mayaṭaḥ pūrvaṃ vikārārthakatvaṃ, ante prācuryārthakatvamityardhajaratīyaṃ kathamiva kena dṛṣṭāntenāśrīyata itīdaṃ vaktavyamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3587: kimāntara iti na śrūyate, kiṃvā vastuto 'pyāntaraṃ brahma na śrūyata iti vikalpya ādyamaṅgīkaroti-atrocyate-yadyapīti
GSP33brssgo1u:3589: iṣṭārthasya dṛṣṭyā jātaṃ sukhaṃ priyaṃ, smṛtyā modaḥ, sa cābhāyāsātprakṛṣṭaḥ pramodaḥ, ānandastu kāraṇaṃ, bimbacaitanyamātmā,
GSP33brssgo1u:3592: yanmantre prakṛtaṃ guhānihitatvena sarvāntaraṃ brahma, tadiha pucchavākye brahmaśabdātpratyabhijñāyate
GSP33brssgo1u:3594: tatra tātparyaṃ nāstīti vaktuṃ kalpyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3595: evaṃ pucchavākye prakṛtasvapradhānabrahmapare sati na prakṛtahānyādidoṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3602: tatra virodhanirāsāyānyatarasmanvākye brahmasvīkāre pucchavākye brahma svīkāryamityāha-anyatareti
GSP33brssgo1u:3606: tvayāpi pucchaśabdasya mukhyārtho vaktumaśakyaḥ, brahmaṇa ānandamayalāṅgūlatvābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3612: ekaṃ mukhyaṃ nīḍamadhiṣṭhānaṃ sopādānasya jagata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3615: yatra saviśeṣatvaṃ tatra vāṅmanasagocaratvamiti vyāpteratra vyāpakābhāvoktyā nirviśeṣamucyata ityāha-nirviśeṣamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3622: viśeṣasya yaḥ pratiyogī virodhīti tasyālpatvamapekṣate, yathā vipramayo grāma iti śūdrālpatvam
GSP33brssgo1u:3624: prakṛtyarthaprādhānye tvayaṃ doṣo nāsti, pracuraprakāśaḥ savitetyatra tamaso 'lpasyāpyābhānāt
GSP33brssgo1u:3629: tatparatvajñānādabhyasasiddhiḥ, tatsiddhau tannirṇaya iti parasparāśraya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3632: nanu 'sa ya evaṃvit'iti brahmavidaṃ prakramyopasaṃkramaṇavākyena phalaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3643: mayaṭśrutyā sāvayavatvādiliṅgena ca sthānaṃ bādhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3647: pūrvamīkṣateḥ saṃśayābhāvāditi yuktyā prāyapāṭho na niścāyaka ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3656: atra hi prakṛtasya brahmaṇo jñānārthaṃ kośāḥ pakṣitvena kalpyante, nātra tātparyamasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3657: tatrānandamayasyāpi avayavāntaroktyanantaraṃ kasmiṃścitpucche vaktavye prakṛtaṃ brahma pucchapadenoktam
GSP33brssgo1u:3661: priyādiviśiṣṭatvākāreṇānandamayasya jīvasya kāryatvāttaṃ prati śeṣatvaṃ brahmaṇo na yuktamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3664: jñānam'iti mantroktaṃ brahma, tadatraiva pucchavākye gīyate
GSP33brssgo1u:3671: ayamānandamayo brahmarasaṃ labdhvānandī bhavatīti bhedokteśca tasyāpratipādyatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3674: kāmyata iti kāmānandaḥ tasya bhṛguvallyāṃ pañcamasya brahmatvadṛṣṭerānandamayasyāpi brahmatvānumānāpekṣā na kārya,
GSP33brssgo1u:3678: guhānihitatvena pratīci 'sa ekaḥ'ityupasaṃhṛte pucchāvākyokte brahmaṇyahameva paraṃ brahmeti prabodhavata ānandamayasya 'yadā hi 'iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3679: śāstraṃ brahmabhāvaṃ śāsti, ato nirguṇabrahmaukyajñānārthaṃ jīvabhedānuvāda ityabhipretyāha-aparāṇyapi
GSP33brssgo1u:3684: idamāmnāyate- 'atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate
GSP33brssgo1u:3685: hiraṇyaśmaśrurhiraṇyakeśa āpraṇakhātsarvaṃ eva suvarṇaḥ' 'tasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkamevamakṣiṇī tasyoditi nāma sa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya udita
GSP33brssgo1u:3686: udeti ha vai sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyo ya evaṃ veda' 'ityadhidaivatam' ( chā.
GSP33brssgo1u:3690: sūryamaṇḍale cakṣuṣi copāsyātvena śrūyate kiṃvā nityasiddhaḥ parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3694: akṣipuruṣe 'pi tadevātideśena prāpyate- 'tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ yadamuṣya rūpam' iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3699: 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti sve mahimni' (chā. 7.24.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3702: ' sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca' (chāṃ 1.6.8)
GSP33brssgo1u:3704: 'sa eṣa ye caitasmādarvāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe manuṣyakāmānāṃ ca'
GSP33brssgo1u:3706: naca parameśvarasya maryādāvadaiśvaryaṃ yuktam, 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya'
GSP33brssgo1u:3709: 'antastaddharmopadeśāt' iti, 'ya eṣo 'ntarāditye' 'ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi' iti ca śrūyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvara eva, na saṃsārī /
GSP33brssgo1u:3712: tadyathā- 'tasyoditi nāma' iti śrāvayitvā asyādityapuruṣasya nāma 'sa eṣa sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhya uditaḥ' iti sarvapāpmāpagamena nirvakti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3713: tadeva ca kṛtanirvacanaṃ nāmākṣipuruṣasyāpyatidiśati- 'yannāma tannāma' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3723: tathādhyātmamapi- ' yāvamuṣya geṣṇau tau geṣṇau' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3725: tadya ime vīṇāyāṃ gāyantyetaṃ te gāyanti tasmātte dhanasanayaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssgo1u:3726: 1.7.6) iti ca laukikeṣvapi gāneṣvasyaiva gīyamānatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3731: lokakāmeśititṛtvamapi niraṅ kuśaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ parameśvaraṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3732: yattūktaṃ hiraṇyaśmaśrutvādirūpaśravaṇaṃ parameśvare nopapadyata iti, atra
GSP33brssgo1u:3734: 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /
GSP33brssgo1u:3735: sarvabhūtaguṇairyuktaṃ maivaṃ māṃ jñātumarhasi' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3736: apica yatra tu nirastasarvaviśeṣaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpamupadiśyate, bhavati tatra śāstram- 'śabdarmasparśamarūpamavyayam' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:3737: sarvakāraṇattvāttu vikāradharmairapi kaiścidviśiṣṭaḥ parameśvara upāsyatvena nirdiśyate- 'sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:3748: kapermarkaṭasyāsaḥ pṛṣṭa(puccha) bhāgo 'tyantatejasvī tattulyaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ yathātyantadīptimattathāsya devasyākṣiṇī prakṛṣṭadīptimatī, tasya uditīti udita udgataḥ sakāryasarvapāpāspṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ sa eṣa ityādhidaivikapuruṣoktiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3749: amuṣmādādityādūrdhvagā ye lokāsteṣāmīśitā ye ca devānāṃ kāmā bhogāsteṣāṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3758: kapermarkaṭasya āsaḥ pucchabhāgo 'tyantatejasvī tattulyaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ yathā dīptimadevaṃ tasya puruṣasyākṣiṇī, sadyovikasitaraktāmbhojanayana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3759: upāsanārthamādityamaṇḍalaṃ sthānaṃ, rūpaṃ coktvā nāma karoti-tasyoditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:3766: rūpavattvādibahupramāṇavaśājjīvo hiraṇmaya itipūrvadṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvamutsargataḥ siddhanirguṇasamanvayasyāpavādārthaṃ pūrvapakṣayati-saṃsārīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3770: ādityasthaḥ puruṣaḥ, amuṣmādādityādūrdhvagā ye kecana lokāsteṣāmīśvaro devabhogānāṃ cetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3771: sa eṣo 'kṣisthaḥ puruṣa etasmādakṣṇo 'dhastanā ye lokāḥ, ye ca manuṣyakāmā bhogāsteṣāmīśvara iti maryādā śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3775: kiñca jalānāmasaṃkarāya loke vidhārako yathā setuḥ, evameṣāṃ lokānāṃ varṇāśramādīnāṃ maryādāhetutvātsetureṣa eva /
GSP33brssgo1u:3778: yadyapyekasminvākye prathamaśrutānusāreṇa caramaṃ neyaṃ, tathāpyatra prathamaṃ śrutaṃ rūpavatvaṃ niṣphalaṃ, dhyānārthamīśvare netuṃ śakyaṃ ca
GSP33brssgo1u:3779: sarvapāpmāsaṅgitvaṃ sarvātmaikatvaṃ tu saphalaṃ, jīve netumaśakyañceti prabalaṃm /
GSP33brssgo1u:3780: naca 'na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati'iti śruterādityajīvasyāpi pāpmāsparśitvamiti vācyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3781: śruteradhunā karmānadhikāriṇāṃ devānāṃ kriyamāṇapāpmāsaṃmbandhe tatphalāsparśe vā tātaparyāt, teṣāṃ saṃcitapāpābhāve 'kṣīṇe puṇye martyalokaṃ viśanti 'ityayogātyabhipretyāha--sarvapāpmāpagamaśca
GSP33brssgo1u:3787: ukthādanyacchastramṛgucyate, yajurvedo yajuḥ, brahma trayo vedā
GSP33brssgo1u:3791: adhyātmaṃ tu ṛk, vākcakṣuḥśrotrākṣisthaśuklabhārūpā caturvidhā, sāma ca prāṇacchāyātmamano 'kṣigatātinīlarūpaṃ caturvidhamuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3793: yau sarvātmakarksāmātmakau geṣṇāvamuṣyādityasthasyai, tāvevākṣisthasya geṣṇau parvaṇītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3797: tattatra loke, dhanasya sanirlābho yeṣāṃ dhanasanayaḥ, vibhūtimanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3798: nanu loke rājāno gīyante neśvara ityata āha-yadyaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:3799: paśuvittādirvibhūtiḥ, śrīḥ kāntiḥ, ūrjitatvaṃ balaṃ, tadyuktaṃ satvaṃ rajādikaṃ madaṃśa eveti tadgānamīśvarasyaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3804: yatra tūpāsyatvenocyate tatretyadhyāhṛtya sarvakāraṇatvātprāptarūpavatvaṃ 'sarvakarmā'ityādiśrutyā nirdiśyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:3811: asti cādityādiśarīrābhimānibhyo jīvebhyo 'nya īśvaro 'ntaryāmī, 'ya āditye tiṣṭhannādityāntaro yamādityo na veda yasyādityaḥ śarīraṃ ya ādityamantaro
GSP33brssgo1u:3812: yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛ. 3.7.9) iti śrutyantare bhedavyapadeśāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3813: tatra hi 'ādityādantaro yamādityo na veda' iti vediturādityādvijñānātmano 'ntaryāmī spaṣṭaṃ nirdiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3817: ādityajīvādīśvarasya bhedokteḥ śrutyantare jīvādanya īśvaraḥ siddha iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3825: tasmātpara evādityādisthānaka udgīthe upāsya iti siddham //21//
GSP33brssgo1u:3831: idamāmananti- 'asya lokasya kā gatirityākāśa iti hovāca sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyanta ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yantyākāśo
GSP33brssgo1u:3833: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimākāśaśabdena paraṃ brahmābhidhīyata uta bhūtākāśamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3838: yathā- 'yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt' (tai. 2.7) iti 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1) iti caivamādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:3841: kutaḥ, taddhi prasiddhatareṇa prayogeṇa śīghraṃ buddhimārohati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3842: nacāyamākāśaśabda ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ śakyo vijñātuṃ, anekārthatvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brssgo1u:3847: nanu bhūtākāśaparigrahe vākyaśeṣo nopapadyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni
GSP33brssgo1u:3858: parasya hi brahmaṇa idaṃ liṅgam- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva
GSP33brssgo1u:3865: tathā 'ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti' iti brahmaliṅgaṃ 'ākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ parāyaṇam' iti ca jyāyastvaparāyaṇatve /
GSP33brssgo1u:3871: api cāntavattvadoṣeṇa śālāvatyasya pakṣaṃ ninditvā, anantaṃ kiñcidvaktukāmena jaivalinā ākāśaḥ parigṛhītaḥ, taṃ cākāśamudgīthe saṃpādyopasaṃharati- 'sa eṣa parovarīyānudgīthaḥ sa eṣo 'nantaḥ' (chāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:3874: yatpunaruktaṃ bhūtākāśaṃ prasiddhibalena prathamataraṃ pratīyata iti, atra
GSP33brssgo1u:3875: brūmaḥ- prathamataraṃ pratītamapi sat vākyaśeṣagatānbrahmaguṇāndṛṣṭvā na parigṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3878: tathākāśaparyāyavācināmapi brahmaṇi prayogo dṛśyate- 'ṛco akṣare parame vyomandevā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ' (ṛ.saṃ 1.164.39) 'saiṣā bhārgavī vāruṇī vidyā parame vyomanpratiṣṭhitā' (tai. 3.6) 'oṃ kaṃ brahma khaṃbrahma'
GSP33brssgo1u:3885: nirvahitā utpattisthitihetuḥ, te nāmarūpe yadantarā yasmādanye yasya vā
GSP33brssgo1u:3886: madhye staḥ tannāmarūpāspṛṣṭaṃ brahmeti vākyoṣādatrākāśo brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3888: deśato 'nantatvaṃ paratvaṃ, guṇata utkṛṣṭatvaṃ varīyastvaṃ, kālato vastutaścāparicchinnatvamānantyam
GSP33brssgo1u:3890: vyoman vyomni, parame prakṛṣṭe, aśrare kūṭasthe brahmaṇi, ṛco ṛgupakṣitāḥ sarve vedā jñāpakāḥ santi /
GSP33brssgo1u:3896: śālāvatyo brāhmaṇo jaivaliṃ rājānaṃ pṛcchati, asya pṛthvilokasyānyasya ca ka ādhāra iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3902: yatra kalpitatvena madhye sta iti vārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3903: akṣa pūrvapakṣe bhūtākāśātmanodgīthopāstiḥ, siddhānte brahmātmanā iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3911: tathā sarvalayādhāratvaṃ, niratiśayamahattvaṃ, sthitāvapi paramāśrayatvamityetāni spaṣṭāni brahmaliṅgānītyāha-tathā ākāśamityādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:3915: dālbhyaśālāvatyau brāhmaṇau rājā ceti traya udgīthavidyākuśalā
GSP33brssgo1u:3917: tatra svargādāgatābhiradbhirjīvitena prāṇena kriyamāṇodgīthasya svarga eva parāyaṇamiti dālbhyapakṣamapratiṣṭhādoṣeṇa śālāvatyo ninditvā svargasyāpi karmadvārā heturayaṃ lokaḥ pratiṣṭhetyuvāca /
GSP33brssgo1u:3918: taṃ śālāvatyasya pakṣaṃ 'antavadvai te kila śālāvatyasāma'iti rājā ninditvānantamevākāśaṃ vakti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3921: udgītha ākāśa eveti saṃpādanādudgīthasyānantatvādikaṃ na svata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3922: sa udgīthāvayava oṅkāraḥ, eṣa ākāśātmakaḥ, paraḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3925: paraḥ ityavyayaṃ sakārāntaṃ vā, paraḥ kṛtsnamiti prayogāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:3930: kulasyārthe'iti nyāyenaikasyāḥ śruterbādho yukta ityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3933: ākāśapadādgauṇārthasya brahmaṇo 'pi prathamapratītirasti, tasya tatparyāyāṇāṃ ca brahmaṇi prayogaprācuryāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3934: akṣare kūṭasthe vyoman vyomni ṛco vedāḥ santi /
GSP33brssgo1u:3935: pramāṇatvena yasminnakṣare viśve devā adhiṣṭhitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3936: oṅkāraḥ kaṃ sukhaṃ brahma khaṃ vyāpakamityupāsīta /
GSP33brssgo1u:3939: 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma'iti chāndogyam, 'oṃ khaṃ brahma khaṃ purāṇam'iti
GSP33brssgo1u:3941: kiñca tatraiva prathamānusāreṇottaraṃ neyaṃ, yatra tannetuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3950: katamā sā devateti prāṇā iti hovāca sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate saiṣā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā'
GSP33brssgo1u:3954: iti caivamādau brahmaviṣayaḥ prāṇaśabdo dṛśyate, vāyuvikāre tu prasiddhataro lokavedayoḥ, ata iha prāṇaśabdena katarasyopādānaṃ yuktamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3958: nanu pūrvavadihāpi talliṅgādbrahmaṇa eva grahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3959: ihāpi vākyaśeṣe bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamanaṃ pārameśvaraṃ karma pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3962: evaṃ hyāmnāyate- 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyete prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ manaḥ sa yadā prabudhyate prāṇadevādhi punarjāyante'
GSP33brssgo1u:3963: (śa.brā. 10.3.3.6) iti. pratyakṣaṃ caitatsvāpakāle prāṇavṛttāvaparilupyamānāyāmindriyavṛttayaḥ parilupyante prabodhakāle ca prādurbhavantīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3967: naca tayorbrahmatvamasti, tatsāmānyācca prāṇasyāpi na brahmatvamityevaṃ prāpte sūtrakāra āha- 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3969: ata eva talliṅgātprāṇaśabdamapi paraṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3970: prāṇasyāpi hi brahmaliṅgasaṃbandhaḥ śrūyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate' (chāṃ 1.115) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3971: prāṇanimittau sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmutpattipralayāvucyamānau prāṇasya brahmatāṃ gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3976: ihatu sendriyāṇāṃ saśarīrāṇāṃ ca jīvāviṣṭānāṃ bhūtānāṃ, 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:3978: nanu sahāpi viṣayairindriyāṇāṃ svāpaprabodhayoḥ prāṇe 'pyayaṃ prāṇācca prabhavaṃ śṛṇumaḥ- 'yadā suptaḥsvapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati tadainaṃ vāksarvairnāmabhiḥ sahāpyeti' (kau. 3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:3982: yatpunaḥ prāṇaśabdasya pañcavṛttau prasiddhataratvaṃ, tadākāśaśabdasyeva pratividheyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:3984: atra kecidudāharanti- 'prāṇasya prāṇam', 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:3988: yathā pituḥ piteti prayoge 'nyaḥ pitā ṣaṣṭīnirdiṣṭo 'nyaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:3989: prathamānirdiṣṭaḥ pituḥ piteti gamyate, tadvat 'prāṇasya prāṇam' iti śabdabhedātprasiddhātprāṇādanyaḥ prāṇasya prāṇa iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:3990: nahi sa eva tasyeti bhedanirdeśārhe bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:3991: yasya ca prakaraṇe yo nirdiśyate nāmāntareṇāpi sa eva tatra prakaraṇī nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate
GSP33brssgo1u:3992: yathā jyotiṣṭomādhikāre- 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta' ityatra jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣṭomaviṣayo bhavati, tathā parasya brahmaṇaḥ prakaraṇe
GSP33brssgo1u:3993: 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ' iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo vāyuvikāramātraṃ kathamavagamayet /
GSP33brssgo1u:3996: FN: cākrāyaṇarṣirdhanārthī rājño yajñaṃ gatvovāca- he prastotaḥ, yā devatā prastāvaṃ sāmabhaktimanvāyattānugatā
GSP33brssgo1u:4000: bhūteṣvindriyāṇi sūkṣmatvādbhoktṛsāmīpyācca sārāṇi atasteṣāṃ layodayoktyetareṣāmapi tatsiddheḥ śeṣaghaṭanetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4002: prāṇaḥ paramātmā bandhanamāśrayaḥ svarūpaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4006: kaścidṛṣiścākrāyaṇaḥ prastotāramuvāca, he prastotaḥ, yā devatā prastāvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4007: sāmabhaktimanugatā dhyānārthaṃ, tāṃ cedajñātvā mama viduṣo nikaṭe prastoṣyasi mūrdhā te patiṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4008: tato bhītaḥ san papraccha, katamā sā devateti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4010: prāṇamabhilakṣya samyagviśanti līyante, tamabhilakṣyojjihate utpadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4012: manaupādhiko jīvaḥ prāṇena brahmaṇā badhyate suṣuptāvekībhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4013: prāṇasya vāyoḥ prāṇaṃprerakaṃ tasya sattāsphūrtipradamātmānaṃ ye viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4021: indriyāṇi liṅgātmarūpāṇi apañcīkṛtabhūtānāṃ sārāṇi teṣāṃ layādyuktyā bhūtānāmapi prāṇe layādisiddheḥ vākyaśeṣopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4023: udgātṛpratihartṛbhyāmudgīthe pratihāre ca kā devateti pṛṣṭena cākrāyaṇenādityo 'nnaṃ ca nirdiśyate
GSP33brssgo1u:4026: saṃnidhyanugrahītaprathamaśrutaprāṇaśrutyā mukhyaprāṇanirṇaye taddṛṣṭyā prastāvopāstiriti pūrvapakṣaphalam, siddhānte brahmadṛṣṭirūpopāstiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4028: bhavantīti bhūtānīti vyutpatyā yatkiñcidbhavanadharmakaṃ kāryamātraṃ tasya layodayau vāyuvikāre prāṇe na yuktāvityuktvā bhūtaśabdasya rūḍhārthagrahe 'pi layāderbrahmanirṇāyakatvamityāha-yadāpīti bhaitikaprāṇasya bhūtayonitvāyogādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4030: atha yadā suṣupto jīvaḥ prāṇe brahamaṇyekībhavati tadā enaṃ prāṇaṃ saviṣayavāgadayo 'piyantītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4031: atra jīvābhannatve sarvalayādhāratvaliṅgānna mukhyaḥ prāṇa ityāha-tatrāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4034: ekavākyatvaṃ vākyaśeṣaḥ tasya balaṃ tadgataṃ liṅgaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4035: prāṇamevetyavadhāraṇena sarvabhūtaprakṛtitvaliṅgana ca prāṇapadena tatkāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣyamityāha-tadākāśaśabdasyeveti
GSP33brssgo1u:4043: idamāmananti- 'atha yadataḥ paro jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥpṛṣṭeṣu sarvataḥpṛṣṭeṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥpuruṣe jyotiḥ' (chā. 3.13.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4051: tamo jyotiriti hīmau śabdau parasparapratidvandvī vīṣayau prasiddhau /
GSP33brssgo1u:4055: nahi rūpādihīnaṃ brahma 'dīpyate' iti mukhyāṃ śrutirmahati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4057: nahi carācarabījasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmakasya dyaurmaryādā yuktā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4058: kāryasya tu jyotiṣaḥ paricchinnasya dyaurmaryādā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4072: sarvatrāpi gamyamānasya jyotiṣaḥ 'paro divaḥ' ityupāsanārthaḥ pradeśaviśeṣaparigraho na virudhyate
GSP33brssgo1u:4076: 'idaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnāntaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ' (chā. 3.13.7) iti ca kaukṣeye jyotiraṣi paraṃ jyotiradhyasyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4081: 'tadetaddṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cepyupāsīta' iti ca śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4082: 'cakṣuṣyaḥ śruto bhavati ya evaṃ veda' (chā. 3.13.8) iti cālpaphalaśravaṇādabrahmatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4085: naca pūrvasminnapi vākye brahma nirdiṣṭamasti, 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4087: athāpi kathañcitpūrvasminvākye brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ syādevamapi na tasyeha pratyabhijñānamasti
GSP33brssgo1u:4088: tatra hi 'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (3.12.1,6) iti dyauradhikaraṇatvena śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4089: atra punaḥ 'paro divo jyotiḥ' iti dyaurmaryādātvena /
GSP33brssgo1u:4090: tasmātprākṛtaṃ jyotiriha grāhyamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ-jyotiriha brahma grāhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4093: pūrvasminhi vākye catuṣpādbrahma nirdiṣṭam- 'tāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyāṃśca pūruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4094: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (chā. 3.12.6) ityanena mantreṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:4095: tatra yaccatuṣpādo brahmaṇastripādamṛtaṃ dyusaṃbandhirūpaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tadeveha dyusaṃbandhānnirdiṣṭamiti pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4096: tatparityajya prākṛtaṃ jyotiḥ kalpayataḥ prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriye prasajyeyātām /
GSP33brssgo1u:4097: na kevalaṃ pūrvavākyājjyotirvākya eva brahmānuvṛttiḥ, parasyāmapi śāṇḍilyavidyayāmanuvartiṣyate brahma /
GSP33brssgo1u:4099: yattūktam- 'jyotiradīpyate' iti caitau śabdau kārye jyotiṣi prasiddhāviti
GSP33brssgo1u:4104: yadvā nāyaṃ jyotiḥśabdaścakṣurvṛtterevānugrāhake tejasi vartate, anyatrāpi prayogadarśanāt
GSP33brssgo1u:4107: tathā sati brahmaṇo 'pi caitanyarūpasya samastajagadavabhāsahetutvādupapanno jyotiḥśabdaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4108: 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' (kau.
GSP33brssgo1u:4111: yadapyuktaṃ dyumaryādatvaṃ sarvagatasya brahmaṇo nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4112: atrocyate- sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upāsanārthaḥ pradeśaviśeṣaparigraho na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4113: nanuktaṃ niṣpradeśasya brahmaṇaḥ pradeśaviśeṣakalpanā nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4116: tathāhi- ādityo, cakṣuṣi, hṛdaye, iti pradeśaviśeṣasaṃbandhāni brahmaṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:4123: 'dṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cetyupāsīta' iti tu pratīkadvārakaṃ dṛṣṭatvaṃ śrutatvaṃ ca bhaviṣyati
GSP33brssgo1u:4125: nahīyate phalāya brahmāśrayaṇīyaṃ, iyate neti niyamaheturasti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4128: yatra tu guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ pratīkaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ vā brahmopadiśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4129: tatra saṃsāragocarāṇyevoccāvacāni phalāni dṛśyante- 'annādo vasudāno vidante vasu ya evaṃ veda' (bṛ. 4.4.24) ityādyāsu śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssgo1u:4130: yadyapi na svavākye kiñcijjyotiṣo brahmaliṅgamasti tathāpi pūrvasminvākye dṛśyamānaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4131: taduktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa- 'jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt' iti kathaṃ punarvākyāntaragatena brahmasaṃnidhānena jyotiḥśrutiḥ svaviṣayācchakyā pracyāvayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:4133: 'yadataḥ paro jyotiḥ' iti prathamatarapaṭhitena yacchabdena sarvanāmnā dyusaṃbnandhātpratyabhijñāyamāne pūrvavākyanirdiṣṭe brahmaṇi svasāmārthyena parāmṛṣṭe satyarthājjyotiḥśabdasyāpi brahmaviṣayatvopapatteḥ tasmādiha jyotiriti brahma pratipattavyam // 24 //
GSP33brssgo1u:4140: tāsāṃ tejobannānāmekaikaṃ dvidhā vibhajya punaścekaikaṃ bhāgaṃ dvedhā kṛtvā svabhāgāditarabhāgayornikṣipya trivṛtkaraṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4142: ekatvasāmyādbhūrityasminnakṣare prajāpateḥ śirodṛṣṭiruktā tathātrāpi sārūpyaṃ vācyaṃ anyathādhyāsāsiddheḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4151: kaukṣeyakaṃ hi jyotirjīvabhāvenānupraviṣṭasya paramātmano vikāraḥ jīvābhāve dehasya śaithilyāt jīvataścauṣṇyājjāyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4154: vasu hiraṇyaṃ karmaphalaṃ dadātīti vasudāna iti guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4155: sarvanāmnā svasāmarthyena svasya sarvanāmnaḥ sāmartyaṃ saṃnihitavācitvaṃ tadbalena parāmṛṣṭe satīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4159: ato divo dyulokātparaḥ parastādyajjyotirdīpyate tadyatadidamiti jāṭharāgnāvadhyasyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4161: viśvasmātprāṇivargādupari sarvasmādbhūrādilokādupari ye lokāsteṣūttameṣu na vidyante uttamā yebhya ityanuttameṣu sarvasaṃsāramaṇḍalātītaṃ paraṃ jyotiridameva, yaddehasthamityarthaḥ asya pūrveṇāgatārthatvaṃ vadanpratyudāharaṇasaṃtimāha-arthāntareti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4162: atra svavākye spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgābhāve 'pi 'pādosya'iti pūrvavākye bhūtapādatvaṃ liṅgamastīti pādasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4176: svargādau jātaṃ kiñcidatīndriyaṃ tejo divaḥ parastādasti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4179: dhyānaṃ phalamityāśaṅkya niṣphalasya kvāpi dhyānaṃ nāstītyāha-idamevetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4182: tejo 'bannānāṃ devatānāmekaikaṃ dvidhā vibhajya punaścaikaikaṃ bhāgaṃ dvedhā kṛtvā svabhāgāditarabhāgayornikṣipya tantriguṇarajjuvantrivṛttaṃ karavāṇītyaviśeṣokternāstyatrivṛtkṛtaṃ kiñcidityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4188: tasya parigraha upasanārtho na viruddhata ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4192: niṣpradeśasya niravayavasya viśeṣe 'pi divaḥ parastāddedīpyamānabrahmāvayavakalpanā bhāginī yuktā na tvityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4195: yathā ekatvasāmyādbhūritivyāhṛtau prajāpateḥ śirodṛṣṭiḥ śrutā tathā jāṭharāgnāvabrahmatvaṃ ghoṣādiśrutyā prasiddhamiti jaḍajyotiṣṭvaṃ sāmyaṃ vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4210: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtam' 'vāgvai gāyatrī' 'yeyaṃ pṛthivī'
GSP33brssgo1u:4213: yaduktaṃ tāvān tatparimāṇaḥ sarvaḥ prapañco 'sya gāyatryanugatasya brahmaṇo mahimā vibhūtiḥ, puruṣastu pūrṇabrahmarūpaḥ, ataḥ prapañcājjyāyānadhikaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4215: sarvaṃ jagadekaḥ pādo 'ṃśaḥ, 'viṣṭabhyāhamidaṃ kṛtsnamekāṃśena sthito jagat'iti smṛteḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4216: asya puruṣasya divi svaprakāśasvarūpe tripādamṛtaṃ rūpamasti, divi sūryamaṇḍale vā dhyanārthamasti, kalpitājjagato brahmasvarūpāmanantamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4217: yathā loke pādātpādatrayamadhikaṃ tathedamadhikamiti bodhanārthaṃ tripādamṛtamityuktaṃ, na tripādatvaṃ vivakṣitamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4222: iha tu pūrvavākyaprasiddhasya brahmaṇo dyusaṃbandhena pratyabhijñātasya yadarthatvaniśacayādyatpadaikārthakajyotiḥpadasyāpi sa evārtha ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4227: ataḥ prakaraṇājjyotiḥśrutibādho na yukta iti nirastam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4230: yena cetasā caitanyeneddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ sūryastapati prakāśayati taṃ bṛhantamavedavinna manuta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4231: jyotiḥśabdasya kāryajyotiṣyeva śaktirityaṅgīkṛtya kāraṇabrahmalakṣakatvamuktvā brahmaṇyapi śaktimāha-yadveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4232: gāḍhāndhakāre vācaiva jyotiṣā loka āsanādivyavahāraṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4233: ājyaṃ juṣatāṃ pibatāṃ mano jyotiḥ prakāśakaṃ bhavati ityājyastutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4234: yathā gacchantamanugacchataḥ svasyāpi gatirasti tathā sarvasya svaniṣṭhaṃ bhānaṃ syādityata āha-tasya bhāseti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4235: tat kālānavacchinnaṃ brahma sūryādijyotiṣāṃ sākṣibhūtamāyuramṛtamiti ca devā upāsata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4241: 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tathā tathā phalaṃ bhavati'iti śruterityāha-na
GSP33brssgo1u:4243: jñānaphalavadupāstīphalamekarūpaṃ kiṃ na syādata āha-yatra hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4246: īśvaro jīvarūpeṇānnamattītyannādaḥ annasyāsamantāddātā vā vasu hiraṇyaṃ dadātīti vasudāna iti guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ yo veda sa dhanaṃ vindate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4248: nāmno vāguttamā, mano vā pratīkaṃ vāco bhūya iti
GSP33brssgo1u:4252: sarvanāmnā svasāmarthyena svasya sarvanāmnaḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṃnihitavācitvaṃ tadbalena parāmṛṣṭe satīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4256: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam |
GSP33brssgo1u:4257: atha yaduktaṃ pūrvasminnapi vākye na brahmabhihitamiti, 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca' (chāṃ. 3.12.1) iti gāyatryākhyasya chandaso
GSP33brssgo1u:4259: kathaṃ punaśchandobhidhānānna brahmābhihitamiti śakyate vaktuṃ, yāvatā
GSP33brssgo1u:4262: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' iti gāyatrīmupakramya tāmeva
GSP33brssgo1u:4263: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākyapramāṇabhedairvyakhyāya 'saiṣā catuṣpādā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī tadetadṛcābhyanuktaṃ tāvānasya mahimā' iti tasyāmeva vyākhyātarūpāyāṃ gāyatryāmudāhṛto mantraḥ kathamakasmādbrahma catuṣpādabhidadhyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4264: yo 'pi tatra 'yadvai tadbrahma' (chā. 3.12.5,6) iti brahmaśabdaḥ so 'pi
GSP33brssgo1u:4265: chandasaḥ prakṛtatvācchandoviṣaya eva 'ya etāmevaṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ veda'
GSP33brssgo1u:4278: tathānyatrāpi vikāradvāreṇa brahmaṇa upāsanaṃ dṛśyate- 'etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyukthe mīmāṃsanta etamagnāvadhvaryava etaṃ mahāvrate chandogāḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:4282: apara āha- sākṣādeva gāyatrīśabdena brahma pratipādyate, saṃkhyāsāmānyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4283: yathā gāyatrī catuṣpadā ṣaḍakṣaraiḥ pādaistathā brahma catuṣpāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4285: tadyathā- 'te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam' ityupakramyāha
GSP33brssgo1u:4289: FN: ya etāṃ prakṛtāṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ vedarahasyaṃ madhuvidyārūpaṃ veda tasyodayāstamayarahitabrahmaprāptirbhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4290: etamṛgvedino mahatyukthe śastre upāsate, adhvaryavo yajurvedinaḥ kratau
GSP33brssgo1u:4294: te vā ete pañcānye ādhidaivikāḥ, pañcānye ādhyātmikāste militvā daśa santaḥ kṛtamityucyate
GSP33brssgo1u:4300: vedarahasyabhūtāṃ madhuvidyāmevamuktarītyā yaḥ kaścidveda tasyodayāstamayarahitabrahmā prāptirbhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4301: tathāca vedatvādgāyatryāṃ brahmaśabdo yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4304: naca gāyatryā dhyānārthaṃ sarvātmatvāropa iti vācyaṃ, svataḥ sarvātmano dhyānasaṃbhavenāsadāropāyogādīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4308: etaṃ paramātmānaṃ bahvṛcā ṛgvedino mahatyukthe śastre tadanugatamupāsate
GSP33brssgo1u:4310: etameva chantogāḥ sāmavedino mahāvrate kratau upāsata ityaitareyake dṛṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4311: gāyatrīśabdo brahmalakṣaka iti vyākhyāya gauṇa ityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4314: pūrvaṃ tūpāsyatayā gāyatrīpadenājahallakṣaṇayā gāyatrībrahmaṇī dve api lakṣite /
GSP33brssgo1u:4315: naca gāyatrī sarvamityanvayāsaṃbhavaḥ, ghaṭo rūpīti padārthaikadeśe
GSP33brssgo1u:4319: gāyatrīvaccatuṣpātvaguṇasāmānyāt, ceto brahmaṇi samarpyate yena sa cetorpaṇo gāyatrīśabdastena brahmaṇa eva nigadādabhidhānāt chandobhidhānamasiddhamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4323: te vā ete pañcānye ādhidaivikāḥ, pañcānye ādhyātmikāste militvā
GSP33brssgo1u:4325: santi hi kṛtatretādvāparakalisaṃjñakāni catvāri dyutāni krameṇa caturaṅkatryaṅkadvyaṅkaikāṅkāni
GSP33brssgo1u:4326: tatra kṛtaṃ daśātmakaṃ bhavati, caturṣvaṅkeṣu trayāṇāṃ triṣu
GSP33brssgo1u:4333: evañca daśatvadvārā vāyvādiṣu kṛtatvaṃ virāṭtvaṃ ca dhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4339: ayo dyūtaṃ, kṛtasaṃjño 'yaḥ kṛtāyaḥ sa vijito yena tasmai,
GSP33brssgo1u:4342: evañca sā vāyvādidaśātmikā eṣā kṛtaśabditā virāḍannaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4346: atrāpara āhetyaparapadena gauṇatve svamataṃ neti dyotayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4347: ajahallakṣaṇāpakṣe hi 'vāgvai gāyatrī'iti vāgātmatvaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca iti niruktanāmakatvaṃ ca gāyatryā upādhitvenopāsyatvādupapannataram /
GSP33brssgo1u:4349: evaṃ gāyatrīpadasya svārthatyāgaḥ, aprasiddhacatuṣpāttvaguṇadvārā viprakṛṣṭalakṣaṇā ceti bahvasamañjasam
GSP33brssgo1u:4355: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayāni hi nirdiśyāha- 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4356: nahi brahmānāśrayaṇe kevalasya chandaso bhūtādayaḥ pādā upapadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4358: anayā hi ṛcā svarasena brahmaivābhidhīyate, 'pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (chā. 3.12.5) iti sarvātmatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4360: smṛtiśca brahmaṇa evaṃrūpatāṃ darśayati- 'viṣṭabhyāhamidaṃ kṛtsnamekāṃśena sthito jagat' (bhaga. 10.42) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4361: 'yadvai tadbrahma' (chā. 3.12.7) iti ca nirdeśa evaṃ sati mukhyārtha
GSP33brssgo1u:4366: tadeva brahma jyotirvākye dyusaṃbandhātpratyabhijñāyamānaṃ parāmṛśyata iti sthitam // 26 //
GSP33brssgo1u:4367: FN: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇa iti ṣaṭprakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:4369: nanu 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'iti prathama gāyatrīśruteḥ kathaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4380: hṛdayasya caturdikṣūrdhvaṃ ca pañca suṣayaḥ santi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4381: teṣu brahmasthānahṛnnagarasya prāgādidvāreṣu krameṇa prāṇavyānāpānasamānodānāḥ pañcadvārapālā iti dhyānārthaṃ śrutyā kalpitam
GSP33brssgo1u:4382: tatra hṛdayacchidrasthaprāṇeṣu brahmapuruṣatvaśrutirhṛdi gāyatryākhyabrāhmaṇa upāsanāsaṃbandhitāyāṃ brahmaṇo dvārapālatvādbrahmapuruṣā iti saṃbhavatītyāha-pañca brahmeti //26//
GSP33brssgo1u:4385: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt |
GSP33brssgo1u:4386: yadapyetaduktaṃ pūrvatra- 'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti saptamyā dyaurādhāratvenopadiṣṭā iti, punaḥ 'atha yadataḥ paro divaḥ' iti pañcamyā maryādātvena, tasmādupadeśabhedānna tasyeha pratyabhijñānamasti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4389: ubhayasminnapi saptamyante pañcamyante copadeśe na pratyabhijñānaṃ virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4390: yathā loke vṛkṣāgrasaṃbaddho 'pi śyena ubhayathopadiśyamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:4391: vṛkṣāgre śyeno vṛkṣāgrātparataḥ śyena iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:4393: apara āha- yathā loke vṛkṣāgreṇāsaṃbaddho 'pi śyena ubhayathopadiśyamāno dṛśyate, vṛkṣāgre śyeno vṛkṣāgrātpurataḥ śyena iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:4394: evaṃ ca divaḥ paramapi sadbrahma divītyupadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4397: divi diva iti vibhaktibhedātprakṛtapratyabhijñā nāstītyuktaṃ nopakṣaṇīyamityāha-tatparihartavyamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:4401: pradhānaprātipadikārthadyusaṃbandhena pratyabhijñāyā vibhaktyarthabhedo na pratibandhakaḥ, kathañcidādhārasyāpi maryādātvasaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4402: yathā vṛkṣāgraṃ svalagnabhagāvacchinnaśyenasyādhāraḥ sanneva svālagnabhāgāvacchinnasya tasyaiva maryādā bhavati, evaṃ divi sūrye
GSP33brssgo1u:4403: hārdākāśe vā mukhye ādhāre sabrahmadivo maryadātvaṃ tadalagnākāśāvacchinnaṃ brahma prati kalpayitvā divaḥ paramityucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4404: yadyākāśena anavacchinnaṃ brahma gṛhītvā pañcamyā divo maryādātvameva mukhyaṃ tadā gaṅgāyāṃ gheṣa itivatsaptamyā sāmīpyalakṣaṇayādhāratvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4406: sabaddhaṃ pratyādhāratvaṃ mukhyaṃ pūrvamuktaṃ divyeva saditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4407: asaṃbaddhaṃ prati maryādātvaṃ mukhyamadhunocyate divaḥ paramapīti bhedaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4414: asti kauṣītakibrāhmaṇopaniṣadīndrapratardanākhyāyikā- 'pratardano ha vai daivodāsirindrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāma yuddhena ca pauruṣeṇa ca'
GSP33brssgo1u:4416: tasyāṃ śrūyate- 'sa hovāca praṇo 'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāḥsva' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4417: tathottaratrāpi 'atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' (ko. 1.1,2,3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4418: tathā 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4419: ante ca 'sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' (ko. 3.8) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4420: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimiha prāṇaśabdena vāyumātramabhidhīyata upa devatātmeti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4422: nanu 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' ityatra varṇitaṃ prāṇaśabdasya brahmaparatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4430: 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4432: tatra prasiddhervāyuḥ prāṇa iti prāpta ucyate-prāṇaśabdaṃ brahma vijñeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4434: tathāhi- paurvāparyeṇa paryalocyamāne vākye padārthānāṃ samanvayo brahmapratipādanapara upalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4435: upakrame tāvat, 'varaṃ vṛṇīṣva' itīndreṇoktaḥ pratardanaḥ paramaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4436: puruṣārthaṃ varamupacikṣepa- 'tvameva me vṛṇīśva yaṃ tvaṃ manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ manyase' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4437: tasmai hitatamatvenopadiśyamānaḥ prāṇaḥ kathaṃ paramātmā na syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4441: tathā 'sa yo māṃ veda na ha vai tasya kenacana karmaṇā loko mīyate na
GSP33brssgo1u:4442: steyena na bhrūṇahatyayā' (kau. 3.1) ityādi ca brahmaparigrahe ghaṭate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4443: brahmavijñānena hi sarvakarmakṣayaḥ prasiddhaḥ- 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (mu. 2.2.8) ityādyāsu śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssgo1u:4448: 'sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānbhavati no evāsādhunā karmaṇā kanīyāneṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokasya unninīṣate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4449: eṣa u bhavāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhyo 'dho ninīṣate' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4454: sa netyādinā dharmādyaspṛṣṭatvaṃ tatkārayitṛtvaṃ tadīśitṛtvaṃ ca sarvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4456: divodāsyāpatyaṃ daivodāsiḥ pratardano nāma rājā yuddhena puruṣakāreṇa ca karaṇenendrasya premāspadaṃ gṛhaṃ jagāma /
GSP33brssgo1u:4457: taṃ ha indra uvāca, pratardana varaṃ te dadānīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4458: sa hovāca pratardanaḥ, yaṃ tvaṃ martyāya hitatamaṃ manyase taṃ varaṃ tvamevālocya mahyaṃ dehīti
GSP33brssgo1u:4465: prāṇasya dehadhārakatvamutthāpakatvaṃ ca prasiddhamiti vaktuṃ khalvityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4471: na tatheha prāṇaśrutibhaṅge kiñcidbalamasti, mitho viruddhānekaliṅgānāmaniścāyakatvāditi pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatyā
GSP33brssgo1u:4473: pūrvaṃ pradhānaprātipadikārthabalāt vibhaktyarthabādhavadvākyārthajñānaṃ prati hetutvena pradhānānekapadārthabalādekavākyatābhaṅga iti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatirvāstu /
GSP33brssgo1u:4476: hitatamatvakarmakṣayādipadārthānāṃ saṃbandho brahmaṇi tātparyaniścāyaka upalabhyata ityuktaṃ vivṛṇoti-upakrama ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4477: yaṃ manyase taṃ varaṃ tvameva prayacchetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4478: sa yaḥ kaścinmāṃ brahmarūpaṃ vedasākṣādanubhavati, tasya viduṣo loko
GSP33brssgo1u:4479: mokṣo mahatāpi pātakena na ha mīyate naiva hiṃsyate na pratibadhyate jñānāgninā karmatūlarāśerdagdhatvādityāha-sa ya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4484: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin |
GSP33brssgo1u:4488: vaktā hīndro nāma kaścidvigrahavāndevatāviśeṣaḥ svamātmānaṃ pratardanāyācacakṣe- 'māmeva vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā'
GSP33brssgo1u:4490: sa eṣa vakturātmatvenopadiśyamānaḥ prāṇaḥ kathaṃ brahma syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4499: 'yā ca kācidbalakṛtirindrakarmaiva ta' diti hi vadanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4502: niścite caivaṃ devatātmopadeśe hitatamatvādivacanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ tadviṣayāṇyeva yojayitavyāni
GSP33brssgo1u:4506: 'yāvaddhyasmiñsarīre prāṇo vasati tāvadāyuḥ' iti prāṇasyaiva prajñātmanaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4507: pratyagbhūtasyāyuṣyapradhānopasaṃhārayoḥ svātantryaṃ darśayati na devatāviśeṣasya parācīnasya
GSP33brssgo1u:4508: tathāstitve ca prāṇānāṃ niḥśreyasamityadhyātmamevendriyāśrayaṃ prāṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4509: tathā 'prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' (kau. 3.3) iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4510: 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' iti cepakramya 'tadyathā
GSP33brssgo1u:4511: rathasyāreṣu nemirarpitā nābhāvarā arpitā evamevaitā bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsvarpitāḥ prajñāmātrāḥ prāṇe 'rpitāḥ sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando 'jaro 'mṛtaḥ' iti viṣayondriyavyavahārānabhibhūtaṃ pratyagātmānamevopasaṃharati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4512: 'sa ma ātmeti vidyāt' iti copasaṃhāraḥ pratyagātmaparigrahe sādhurna parācīnaparigrahe /
GSP33brssgo1u:4516: FN: tvaṣṭṛputraṃ viśvarūpaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ahanaṃ, arunmukhān rauti yathārthaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4517: śabdayatīti rut vedāntavākyaṃ tanmukhe yeṣāṃ te runmukhāstebhyo
GSP33brssgo1u:4519: yasyāreṣu neminābhyormadhyasthaśalākāsu cakropāntarūpā nemirarpitā, nābhau cakrapiṇḍikāyāmarā arpitāḥ evaṃ bhūtāni pṛthivyādīni pañca mīyanta iti
GSP33brssgo1u:4520: mātrā bhogyāḥ śabdādayaḥ pañceti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4523: trīṇi śīrṣāṇi yasyeti triśīrṣā tvaṣṭuḥ putro viśvarūpo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ taṃ hatavānasmi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4524: rauti yathārthaṃ śabdayatīti rut vedāntavākyaṃ, tanmukhe yeṣāṃ te
GSP33brssgo1u:4528: balavācinā prāṇaśabdena baladevatā lakṣyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4529: indro hitapradātṛtvādhitatamaḥ, karmānadhikārādapāpa ityevaṃ vyākhyeyānītyāha-niścite ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4541: tattatra nānāprapañcasyātmani kalpanāyāṃ yathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ, loke prasiddhasya rathasyāreṣu neminābhyormadhyasthaśalākāsu cakropāntarūpā nemirarpitā, nābhaucakrapiṇḍikāyāmarā arpitāḥ, evaṃ bhūtāni pañca
GSP33brssgo1u:4542: pṛthivyādīni mīyanta iti, mātrāḥ bhogyāḥ śabdādayaḥ pañceti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsu daśasvarpitāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4543: indriyajāḥ pañca śabdādiviṣayaprajñāḥ mīyante ābhiriti mātrāḥ pañca dhīndriyāṇi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4544: nemivadgrāhyaṃ grāhakeṣu areṣu kalpitamityuktvā nābhisthānīye prāṇe sarvaṃ kalpitamityāha-prāṇe 'rpitā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4545: sa prāṇo mama svarūpamityāha-sa ma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4546: tarhi pratyagātmani samanvayo na tu brahmaṇi, tatrāha-ayamiti //29//
GSP33brssgo1u:4550: indro nāma devatātmānaṃ svamātmānaṃ paramātmatvenāhameva paraṃ brahmetyārṣeṇa darśanena yathāśāstraṃ paśyannupadiśati sma- 'māmeva
GSP33brssgo1u:4554: 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavat' (bṛ. 1.4.10) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4562: vijñānastutimanusaṃdadhāti- 'tasya me tatra lobha ca na mīyate sa yo māṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4563: veda na ha vai tasya kena ca karmaṇā loko mīyate' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4565: yasmādīdṛśānyapi krūrāṇi karmāṇi kṛtavato mama brahmabhūtasya lomāpi na hiṃsyate, sa yo 'nyo 'pi māṃ veda na tasya kenacidapi karmaṇā loko hiṃsyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4566: vijñeyaṃ tu brahmaiva 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā' iti vakṣyamāṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4572: vijñeyendrastutyartha upanyāso na cetkathaṃ tarhi sa iti
GSP33brssgo1u:4583: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt |
GSP33brssgo1u:4584: yadyapyadhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmadarśanānna parācīnasya devatātmana upadeśaḥ tathāpi na brahmavākyaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4586: jīvasya tāvadasminvākye vispaṣṭaṃ liṅgamupalabhyate 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4587: atra hi vāgādibhiḥ karaṇairvyāpṛtasya kāryakaraṇādhyakṣasya jīvasya vijñeyatvamabhidhīyate
GSP33brssgo1u:4588: tathā mukhyaprāṇaliṅgamapi- 'atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4592: ye tu imaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhya iti paṭhanti teṣāmimaṃ jīvamindriyagrāmaṃ vā parigṛhya śarīramutthāpayatīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4595: jīvamukhyaprāṇaparigrahe ca prāṇaprajñātmanoḥ sahavṛttitvenābhedanirdeśaḥ svarūpeṇa ca bhedanirdeśa ityubhayayā nirdeśa upapadyate- 'yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vai prajñā sa prāṇaḥ saha hyetāvasmiñśarīre vasataḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4598: tasmādihajīvamukhyaprāṇayorantara ubhau vā pratīyeyātāṃ na brahmeti cet,
GSP33brssgo1u:4600: evaṃ sati trividhamupāsanaṃ prasajyeta- jīvopāsane mukhyaprāṇopāsanaṃ brahmopāsanaṃ ceti
GSP33brssgo1u:4603: 'māmeva vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāḥsva' ityuktvānte 'sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānando
GSP33brssgo1u:4610: yattu mukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ darśitam- 'idaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' iti,
GSP33brssgo1u:4614: itareṇa tu jīvanti yasminnetāvupāśritau' (kāṭha. 2.5.5) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4615: yadapi na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt ityādi jīvaliṅgaṃ darśitaṃ tadapi na brahmapakṣaṃ nivārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4618: buddhyādyupādhikṛtaṃ tu viśeṣamāśritya brahmaiva sañjīvaḥ kartā bhoktā cetyucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4619: tasyopādhikṛtaviśeṣaparityāgena svarūpaṃ brahma darśayituṃ 'na vācaṃ vijijñāsīta vaktāraṃ vidyāt' ityādinā pratyagātmābhimukhīkaraṇārthamupadeśo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4621: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi nedaṃ yadidamupāsate //
