GSP33brssgo1u:4622: ' (ke. 1.4) ityādi ca śrutyantaraṃ vacanādikriyāvyāpṛtasyaivātmano brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4623: yatpunaretaduktam- 'saha hyetāvasmiñśarīre vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ' iti prāṇaprajñātmanorbhedadarśanaṃ brahmavāde nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4625: jñānakriyāśaktidvayāśrayayorbuddhiprāṇayoḥ pratyagātmopādhibhūtayorabhedanirdeśopapatteḥ upādhidvayopahitasya tu pratyagātmanaḥ svarūpeṇābheda ityataḥ prāṇa eva prajñātmetyekīkaraṇamaviruddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:4626: athavā nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvādiha tadyogāt ityasyāyamanyor'thaḥ- na brahmavākyo 'pi jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4628: trividhamiha brahmopāsane vivakṣitaṃ prāṇadharmeṇa prajñādharmeṇa svadharmeṇa ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:4633: bhūtamātrā prajñayā vācaṃ samāruhya vācā sarvāṇi nāmānyāpnoti' ityādiḥ prajñādharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4634: tā vā etā daśaiva bhūtamātrā adhiprajñaṃ daśa prajñāmātrā adhibhūtam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4635: yaddhi bhūtamātrā na syurna prajñāmātrāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4636: yaddhi prajñāmātrā na syurna bhūtamātrāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4639: 'tadyathā rathasyāreṣu nemirarpitā nābhāvarā arpitā evamevaitā bhūtamātrāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4640: prajñāmātrāsvarpitāḥ prajñāmātrāḥ prāṇe 'rpitāḥ sa eṣa prāṇa eva
GSP33brssgo1u:4642: tasmādbrahma evaitadupādhidvayadharmeṇa svadharmeṇa caikamupāsanaṃ trividhaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4646: iti śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye śrīśaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau prathamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ FN: yathāyogaṃ kiñcidatra jīvavākyaṃ kiñcinmukhyaprāṇavākyaṃ kiñcidbrahmavākyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4647: prāṇasaṃvāde- vāgādayaḥ sarve pratyekamātmanaḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ manyamānāstannirdidhārayiṣayā prajāpatimupajagmuḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4648: sa tānuvāca yasminnutkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataramiva bhavati sa vaḥ śreṣṭha iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4652: etadbhāti gacchatīti vānaṃ tadeva bāṇamasthiraṃ śarīramavaṣṭabhyāśrityeti
GSP33brssgo1u:4653: pañca śabdādayaḥ pañca pṛthivyādaya iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4654: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhaya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4656: yena caitanyena vāgabhyudyate preryate vadanasāmarthyamāpadyate tadeva vāgāderagamyaṃ brahma
GSP33brssgo1u:4657: upāseti svatantrāṇāṃ trayāṇāmupāstau vākyabhedaḥ, natvekasyaiva brahmaṇastaddharmeṇetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4661: dehotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgaṃ kiṃ na syāt, tatrāha-śarīradhāraṇaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4662: sarve vāgādayaḥ prāṇā ahamahaṃ śreṣṭha iti vivadamānāḥ prajāpatimupajagmuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4663: sa ca tānuvāca, yasminnutkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataraṃ patiṣyati sa vaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4664: śreṣṭha iti tathākrameṇa vāgādipūtkrānteṣvapi mūkādibhāvena śarīraṃ svasthamasthāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:4665: mukhyaprāṇasya tu uccikramiṣāyāṃ sarveṣāṃ vyākulatvāptau tānvāgādīnvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca, yūyaṃ mohaṃ māpadyatha yato
GSP33brssgo1u:4667: kiṃ tat, pañcadhā prāṇāpānādibhāvenātmānaṃ vibhajya etadvāti gacchatīti vānaṃ tadeva bāṇamasthiraṃ śarīramavaṣṭabhyāśritya dhārayāmītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4675: naca svatantrapadārthabhedādvākyabhedaḥ kiṃ na syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4678: nahi pradhānavākyārthabrahmaliṅgamanyathā netuṃ śakyaṃ, na vā taducitamityāha-naca brahmaliṅgamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:4680: anyatra 'ata eva prāṇaḥ'ityādau vṛtterāśritvādihāpi tasya brahmaliṅgasya
GSP33brssgo1u:4684: yasminnetau preryatvena sthitau tenetareṇa brahmaṇā sarve prāṇādivyāpāraṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4689: yena caitanyena vāgabhyudyate svakāryābhimukhyena preryate tadeva vāgādiragamyaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4701: tasyāḥ saṃbhandhīni dṛśyāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni yathaikaṃ bhavantyadhiṣṭhānacidātmanā tathā vyākhyāsyāma
GSP33brssgo1u:4707: tatra karmendriyeṣu vāgevāsyāḥ prajñāyā ekamaṅgaṃ dehārdhamadūduhat pūrayāmāsa /
GSP33brssgo1u:4710: tasyāḥ punarnāma kila cakṣurādinā prativihitā jñāpitābhūtamātrā rūpādyartharūpā parastādaparārdhe kāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4712: evaṃ buddheḥ sarvārthadraṣṭṛtvamupapādya tanniṣṭhacitpratibimbadvārā sākṣiṇi draṣṭṛtvādhyāsamāha-prajñayeti
GSP33brssgo1u:4713: buddhidvārā cidātmā vācamindriyaṃsamāruhya tasyāḥ prerako bhūtvā vācā karaṇena sarvāṇi nāmāni vaktavyatvenāpnoti, cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi rūpāṇi
GSP33brssgo1u:4715: tathāca sarvadraṣṭṛtvaṃ cidātmani draṣṭṛtvādhyāsanimittatvaṃ ca buddherdharma ityuktaṃ bhavati sarvādhāratvāndatvādiḥ brahmadharma ityāha-tā vā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4717: prajñā indriyajātyā adhikṛtya grāhyā bhūtamātrā vartante, prajñāmātrā indriyāṇi grāhyaṃ bhūtajātamadhikṛtya vartanta iti grāhya grāhakayormithaḥ sāpekṣatvamuktaṃ sādhayati-yaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:4719: grāhyeṇa grāhyasvarūpaṃ na sidhyati kintu grāhakeṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:4721: tasmātsāpekṣatvādetadgrāhyagrāhakadvayaṃ vastuto na bhinnaṃ kintu cidātmanyaropitamityāha-
GSP33brssgo1u:4738: ata upāsanāvidhilubdhena 'vaktāraṃ vidyāt' 'etadevokthamupāsīta' 'sa ma ātmeti vidyāt'iti jīvaprāṇabrahmopāsanavidhayaḥ, anye guṇavidhaya iti
GSP33brssgo1u:4743: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhāyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1//
GSP33brssgo1u:4749: prathame pāde 'janmādyasya yataḥ' ityākāśādeḥ samastasya jagato
GSP33brssgo1u:4751: tasya samastajagatkāraṇasya brahmaṇo vyāpitvaṃ, nityatvaṃ, sarvajñatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:4752: sarvaśaktitvaṃ, sarvātmatvamityevañjātīyakā dharmā uktā eva bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4753: arthāntaraprasiddhānāṃ ca keṣāñcicchabdānāṃ brahmaviṣayatvahetupratipādanena kānicidvākyāni spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni saṃdihyamānāni brahmaparatayā nirṇītīni /
GSP33brssgo1u:4754: punarapyanyāni vākyānyaspaṣṭabrahmaliṅgāni saṃdihyante- kiṃ paraṃ brahma
GSP33brssgo1u:4762: idamāmnāyate- 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalāniti śānta upāsīta /
GSP33brssgo1u:4763: atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasmiṃlloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta', 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssgo1u:4769: kutaḥ, tasya hi kāryakaraṇādhipateḥ prasiddho manaādibhiḥ saṃbandho na parasya brahmaṇaḥ, 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ śubhraḥ' (mu. 2.1.2) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:4770: nanu 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti svaśabdenaiva brahmopāttaṃ, kathamiha śārīra ātmopāsya āśaṅkyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4772: nedaṃ vākyaṃ brahmopāsanāvidhiparaṃ kiṃ tarhi śamavidhiparam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4773: yatkāraṇaṃ 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalāniti śānta upāsīta' ityāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:4776: naca sarvasyaikātmatve rāgādayaḥ saṃbhavanti, tasmācchānta upāsīteti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4777: naca śamavidhiparatve satyanena vākyena brahmopāsanaṃ niyantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4778: upāsanaṃ tu 'sa kratuṃ kurvīta' ityanena vidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4780: tasya ca viṣayatvaṃna śrūyate- 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' iti jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4784: 'eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye 'ṇīyānvrīhervā yavādvā' iti ca hṛdayāyatanatvamaṇīyastvaṃ cārāgramātrasya
GSP33brssgo1u:4787: atra brūmaḥ- na tāvadaṇīyastvaṃ jyāyastvaṃ cobhayamekasminsamāśrayituṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:4789: anyatarāśrayaṇe ca prathamaśrutatvādaṇīyastvaṃ yuktamāśrayituṃ, jyāyastvaṃ tu brahmabhāvāpekṣayā bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4794: yatsarveṣu vedānteṣu prasiddhaṃ brahmaśabdasyālambanaṃ jagatkāraṇaṃsa iha ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyopakrame śrute, tadeva manomayatvādidharmairviśiṣṭamupadiśyata iti yuktam evañca prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriye na bhaviṣyataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4795: nanu vākyopakrame śamavidhivivakṣayā brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ na svavivakṣayetyuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4796: atrocyate- yadyapi śamavidhivivakṣayā brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ tathāpi manomayatvādiṣūpadiśyamāneṣu tadeva brahma saṃnihitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4797: jīstu na saṃnihito naca svaśabdenopātta iti vaiṣamyam // 1 //
GSP33brssgo1u:4798: FN: tasmin jāyata iti tajjaṃ, tasmin iti tallaṃ, tasminnaniti ceṣṭata iti
GSP33brssgo1u:4799: tadanaṃ tajjaṃ catallaṃ ca tadanaṃ ceti tajjalān /
GSP33brssgo1u:4805: prāṇaḥ śarīramasyeti samāsagatasarvanāmnā saṃnihitārthena prakṛtaṃ brahma hitvā jīvamaprakṛtamicchataḥ prakṛtahāniraprakṛtaprakriyācetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4809: tadupajīvyottaraṃ pādadvayaṃ pravartata iti hetuhetumadvāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4815: tasmājjāyata iti tajjaṃ, tasmiṃllīyata iti tallaṃ, tasminnaniti ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ, tajjaṃ ca tallaṃ ca tadanaṃ ceti tajjalān /
GSP33brssgo1u:4826: iha yadhyāyati, mṛtvā dhyānamahimnā tadhyeyarūpeṇa jāyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4830: pūrvatra brahmaliṅgairabrahmaliṅgabādha uktaḥ, na tathehopakrame brahmaṇo liṅgamasti, kintu prakaraṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4832: ato jīvaliṅgaṃ balīya iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-śārīra
GSP33brssgo1u:4839: atra prayojanābhāve 'pi yatra prayojanaṃ tatra bhavatyeva
GSP33brssgo1u:4852: sarvatra prasidvabrahmaṇa evātropāsyatvopadeśānna jīva upāsya iti
GSP33brssgo1u:4854: yatra phalaṃ nocyate tatra pūrvottarapakṣasidviḥ phalamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4855: tadyapi nirākāṅkṣaṃ brahma tathāpi manaḥpracuramupadhirasya, prāṇaḥ śarīramasyeti samāsāntargatasarvanāmnaḥ saṃnihitaviśeṣyākāṅkṣatvādbrahma saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4856: 'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ karomi'iti saṃskārārthasadanasya nirākāṅkṣasyāpi 'tasminsīda'iti sākāṅkṣatacchabdena iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4860: idaṃ hi liṅgadvayaṃ lokasidvaṃ jīvaṃ na saṃnidhāpayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:4869: yadyapyapauruṣeye vede vakturabhāvānneccārthaḥ saṃbhavati tathāpyupādānena phalenopacaryate
GSP33brssgo1u:4874: tadiha ye vivakṣitā guṇā upāsanāyāmupādeyatvenopadiṣṭāḥ satyasaṃkalpaprabhṛtayaste parasminbrahmaṇyupapadyante
GSP33brssgo1u:4881: yadāpyākāśa ātmā yasyeti vyākhyāyacate, tadapi saṃbhavati sarvajagatkāraṇasya sarvātmano brahma ākāśātmatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:4884: yattūktaṃ 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' iti jīvaliṅgaṃ na tadbrahmaṇyupapadyata
GSP33brssgo1u:4886: sarvātmatvāddhi brahmaṇo jīvasaṃbandhīni manomayatvādīni brahmasaṃbandhīni bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:4887: tathāca brahmaviṣaye śrutismṛtī bhavataḥ- 'tvaṃ strī tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī /
GSP33brssgo1u:4888: tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ' (śve. 4.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:4891: 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ śubhraḥ' iti śrutiḥ śuddhabrahmaviṣayā, iyaṃ tu 'manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīraḥ' iti saguṇabrahmaviṣayeti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:4896: jīrṇaḥ sthaviro bhūtvā yodaṇḍena vañcati gacchati, tathā yo jātaḥ bālaḥ so 'pi tvameva
GSP33brssgo1u:4897: vastuno vivakṣāyāḥ phalamupādānaṃ svīkāraḥ, sa ca prakṛteṣu guṇeṣvastīti vivakṣopacāra ityāha-tathāpyupādāneneti
GSP33brssgo1u:4898: nanvidaṃ grāhyamidaṃ tyājyamiti dhīrvivakṣādīnā vede kutaḥ syādityata
GSP33brssgo1u:4906: jīrṇaḥ sthaviro yo daṇḍena vañcati gacchati so 'pi tvameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:4908: sarvataḥ sarvāsu dikṣu śrutayaḥ śrotrāṇyasyeti sarvataḥ śrutimat /
GSP33brssgo1u:4916: brahmaivoktena nyāyena manomayatvādiguṇaṃ, natu śārīro jīvo
GSP33brssgo1u:4918: yatkāraṇaṃ 'satyasaṃkalpaḥ, ākāśātmā, avākī, anādaraḥ, jyāyānpṛthivyā' iti caivañjātīyakā guṇā na śārīra āñjasyenopapadyante /

GSP33brssgo1u:4932: ṭavāgeva vākaḥ so 'syāstīti vākī, na vākī avākī /

GSP33brssgo1u:4942: etamiti prakṛtaṃ manomayatvādiguṇamupāsyamātmānaṃ karmatvena prāpyatvena vyapadiśati /

GSP33brssgo1u:4975: atrāha- kaḥ punarayaṃ śārīro nāma paramātmano 'nyaḥ, yaḥ pratiṣidhyate 'anupapattestu na śārīraḥ' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4976: śrutistu- 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā śrotā' (bṛha. 3.7.23) ityevañjātīyakā paramātmano 'nyamātmānaṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:4977: tathā smṛtirapi- 'kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata' (gī.
GSP33brssgo1u:4980: para evātmā dehendriyamanobuddhyupādhibhiḥ paricchidyamāno bālaiḥ śārīra ityupacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:4983: tadapekṣayā ca karmakartṛtvādibhedavyavahāro na virudhyate prāk
GSP33brssgo1u:4987: smṛtau hṛdisthasya jīvādbhedokterannāpi hṛdistho manomaya īśvara
GSP33brssgo1u:4991: atra sūtrakṛtā satyabheda ukta iti bhrāntinirāsāyekṣatyadhikaraṇe nirastamapi codyamudbhāvya nirasyati-atrāhetyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:4992: tvaduktarītyā vastuta ekatvameva, bhedastu kalpitaḥ sūtreṣvanūdyata
GSP33brssgo1u:4996: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca |
GSP33brssgo1u:4997: arbhakamalpamoko nīḍaṃ, 'eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye' iti paricchinnāyatanatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:4998: svaśabdena ca 'aṇīyānvrīhervā yavādvā' ityaṇīyastvavyapadeśāt, śārīra evārāgramātro jīva ihopadiśyate, na karvagataḥ paramātmeti yaduktaṃ tatparihartavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5003: yathā samastavasudhādhipatirapi hi sannayodhyādhipatiriti vyapadiśyate kayā punarapekṣayā sarvagataḥ sannīśvaror'bhakaukā aṇīyāṃśca vyapadiśyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5005: evamaṇīyastvādiguṇagaṇopeta īśvarastatra hṛdayapuṇḍarīke nicāyyo draṣṭavya upadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5012: tadevaṃ nicāyyatvāpekṣaṃ brahmaṇor'bhakaukastvamaṇīyastvaṃ ca na pāramārthikam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5019: arbhakamoko yasya sor'bhakaukāḥ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmādārthikamalpatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5024: paricechedatyāgaṃ vinā brahmatvāsaṃbhavāt tattyāge ca brahmaṇa evopāsyatvamāyātīti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5035: vyemavatsarvagatasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvaprāṇihṛdayasaṃbandhāt, cidrūpatayā ca śārīrādaviśiṣṭatvāt, sukhaduḥkhādisaṃbhogo 'pyaviśiṣṭaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:5046: yadi ca saṃnidhānamātreṇa vastuśaktimanāśritya kāryasaṃbandho 'bhyupagamyeta, ākāśādīnāmapi dāhādiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5048: yadapyekatvādbrahmaṇa ātmāntarābhāvāccharīrasya bhogena brahṇo bhogaprasaṅga iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5051: 'tattavamasi' 'ahaṃ brahmāsmi' 'nānyo 'to 'sti vijñātā' ityādiśāstrebhya iti cet, yathāśāstraṃ tarhi śāstrīyor'thaḥ pratipattavyo na tatrārdhajaratīyaṃ labhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5052: śāstraṃ ca tattvamasi ityapahatapāpmatvādiviśeṣaṇaṃ brahma śārīrasyātmatvenopadiśacchārīrasyaiva tāvadupabhoktṛtvaṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5054: athāgṛhītaṃ śārīrasya brahmaṇaikatvaṃ tadā mithyājñānanimittaḥ śārīrasyopabhogaḥ, na tena paramārtharūpasya brahmaṇaḥ saṃsparśaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5055: nahi bālaistalamalinatādibhirvyomni vikalpyamāne talamalitādiviśiṣṭameva paramārthato vyoma bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5069: ardhaṃmukhamātraṃ jaratyā buddhāyāḥ kāmayate nāṅāgānīti so
GSP33brssgo1u:5073: brahmaṇo hārdatve 'niṣṭasaṃbhogāpatterjīva eva hārda upāsya iti śaṅkāṃ vyācaṣṭe-vyomavaditi
GSP33brssgo1u:5074: brahma bhoktṛ syāta, hārdatve sati cetanatvāt, jīvābhinnatvācca jīvavadityuktaṃ nirasyati-na
GSP33brssgo1u:5081: kiñca vibhavo bahava ātmāna iti vādināmekasmindehe sarvātmanāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5082: bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ, svakarmārjita eva dehe bhoga iti parihāraśca tulya iti na vayaṃ paryanuyojyā ityāha-sarvagateti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5084: brahmaṇo jīvābhinnatvaṃ śrutyā niścitya tena bhoktṛtvānumāne
GSP33brssgo1u:5086: arthaṃ mukhamātraṃ jaratyā vṛddhāyāḥ kāmayate nāṅgānīti so
GSP33brssgo1u:5089: na hyabhedamaṅgīkṛtyābhoktṛtvaṃ tyaktuṃ yuktaṃ, śrutyaivābheda siddhyarthaṃ bhoktṛtvavāraṇādityāha-śāstraṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5090: nanvekatvaṃ mayā śrutyā na gṛhītaṃ, yonopajīvyabādhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5095: brahmaṇo hārdatve bādhakābhāvacchāṇḍilyavidyāvākyaṃ brahmaṇyupāsye samanvitamiti sidvam //8//
GSP33brssgo1u:5100: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate- 'yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5101: mṛtyūryasyopasevanaṃ ka ityā veda yatra saḥ' (1.2.24) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5103: tatra kimagnirattā syāt, uta jīvaḥ, athavā paramātmeti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5109: jīvo vāttā syāt, 'tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvatti' iti darśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5110: na paramātmā, 'anaśnannanyo 'abhicākaśīti' (muṇḍa. 3.1.1) iti darśanādityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- attātra paramātmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5113: tādṛśasya cādyasya na paramātmano 'nyaḥ kārtsyenāttā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5115: nanviha carācaragrahaṇaṃ nopalabhyate, kathaṃ siddhavaccarācaragrahaṇaṃ hetutvenopādīyate
GSP33brssgo1u:5125: FN: yasya paramātmano brahma kṣatraṃ cobhe jātī prasiddhānnavadodanau
GSP33brssgo1u:5128: taṃ nirviśeṣamātmānaṃ 'nāvirato duścaritāt' iti mantroktopāyavānyathā veda
GSP33brssgo1u:5131: naca brahkṣatre evātra vivakṣite, mṛtyūpasecanena prāṇabhṛnmātropasthāpanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5134: itaśca paramātmaivehāttā bhavitumarhati, yatkāraṇaṃ prakaraṇamidaṃ paramatmanaḥ, 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' (kāṭha. 1.2.18) ityādi prakṛtagrahaṇaṃ ca nyāyyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5135: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ' iti ca durvijñānatvaṃ paramātmaliṅgam // 10 //
GSP33brssgo1u:5139: 'bhedakalpanayā vartate tacchudvaṃ brahma itthā itthaṃ īśvarasyāpyadhiṣṭhānabhūtaṃ ko veda /
GSP33brssgo1u:5152: guṇaścātra mṛtyūpasecanapadena saṃnidhāpitaṃ prasidvaudanagataṃ vināśyatvaṃ gṛhyate, gauṇaśabdasya saṃnihitaguṇagrāhitvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5153: tathāca sarvasya vināśyatvena bhānālliṅgādīśvaro 'ttetyāhanaiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5161: kaṭhavallīṣveva paṭhyate- 'ṛtaṃ pibantau loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33brssgo1u:5162: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañṭagnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ' (kāṭha.
GSP33brssgo1u:5164: tatra saṃśayaḥ, kimiha buddhijīvau nirdiṣṭāvuta jīvaparamātmānāviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5170: atha jīvaparamātmānau tato jīvādvilakṣaṇaḥ paramātmā pratipādito bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5173: anyatra bhūtācca bhavyācca yattatpaśyasi tadvada' (kāṭha. 1.2.14) iti pṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5175: kasmāt, ṛtapānaṃ karmaphalopabhogaḥ, sukṛtasya loke, iti ca dvivacanena
GSP33brssgo1u:5178: ata eva kṣetrajñaparamātmapakṣo 'pi na saṃbhavati, cetane 'pi paramātmani ṛtapānāsaṃbhavāt
GSP33brssgo1u:5192: yadi śarīraṃ guhā, yadi vā hṛdayaṃ, ubhayathāpi buddhikṣetrajñau guhāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5194: naca sati saṃbhavesarvagatasya brahmaṇo viśiṣṭadeśatvaṃ yuktaṃ kalpayitum
GSP33brssgo1u:5196: paramātmā tu na sukṛtasya vā duṣkṛtasya vā gocare vartate, 'na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5201: kasmāt, ātmānau hi tāvubhāvapi cetanau samānasvabhāvau /
GSP33brssgo1u:5203: asya gordvitīyo 'nveṣṭavya ityukte gaureva dvitīyo 'nviṣyate, nāśvaḥ puruṣo vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5204: tadiha ṛtapānena liṅgena niścite vijñānātmani dvitīyānveṣaṇāyāṃ samānasvabhāvaścetanaḥ paramātmaiva pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5208: gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam' (kāṭha. 1.2.12) 'yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame
GSP33brssgo1u:5210: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyartho deśaviśeṣopadeśo na virudhyata ityedapyuktameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:5218: FN: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ karmaphalaṃ pibantau, bhuñjānau sukṛtasya loke
GSP33brssgo1u:5219: samyagarjitasyādṛṣṭasya kārye dehe vartamāno parasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5220: sthānamarhatīti parārdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasminparame śreṣṭhe yā guhā nabhokṣaṇā tāṃ praviśya sathitau chāyātapavanmitho viruddhau, tau ca brahmavidaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5223: manuṣye prete mṛtesati yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5229: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi
GSP33brssgo1u:5232: guhāhitaṃ buddhau sthitaṃ gahvare 'nekānarthasaṃkule dehe sthitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5234: parame vyoman śreṣṭhe hārdākāśe tatra guhāyāṃ buddau /
GSP33brssgo1u:5237: ṛtamavaśyaṃbhāvi karmaphalaṃ pibantau bhuñjānau, sukṛtasya karmaṇo loke
GSP33brssgo1u:5238: kārye dehe parasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ sthānamarhatīti parārdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5239: paramaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tasminyā guhā nabhorūpā vudvirūpā vā tāṃ praviśya sthitau chāyātapavat mitho virudvau tau brahmavidaḥ karmiṇaśca vadanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5246: manuṣye prete mṛte sati yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ paraloke bhoktāstītyeke, nāstītyanye
GSP33brssgo1u:5250: chatripadena gantāra iva pibatpadenājahallakṣaṇayā praviṣṭāvucyete ityāha-atrocyata iti
GSP33brssgo1u:5253: yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeveti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5258: edhāṃsi kāṣṭhāni pacantītyākhyātena kārakatvaṃ lakṣyaṃ, prakṛtistu mukhyaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5263: ekasmiñjātimati kḷpte sajātīyameva dvitīyaṃ grāhyaṃ, vyaktimātragrahe lāghavāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5265: na cāstu kārakatvena sajātīyā budvireva jīvasya dvitīyeti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5267: tathāca loke dvitīyasyāntaraṅgajātimattvadarśanājjīvasya dvitīyaścetana eveti sūtrārthamāha-saṃkhyāśravaṇe ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5268: guhāyāṃ budvau sthitaṃ, gahvare 'nekānarthasaṃkule dehe sthitaṃ purāṇamanādipuruṣaṃ viditvā harṣaśokau jahāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5269: parame śreṣṭhe, vyoman hārdākāśe yā guhā buddhiḥ tasyāṃ nihitaṃ brahma yo veda so 'śnute sarvānkāmānityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5275: 'ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu' (kā. 1.3.3) ityādinā pareṇa granthena rathirathādirūpakakalpanayā vijñānātnāṃ rathinaṃ saṃsāramokṣayorgantāraṃ kalpayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5279: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti' (kā. 1.2.12)
GSP33brssgo1u:5282: brahmavido vadanti iti ca vaktṛviśeṣopādanaṃ paramātmaparigrahe ghaṭate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5284: eṣa eva nyāyaḥ 'dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā' (muṇḍa. 3.1.1) ityevamādiṣvapi
GSP33brssgo1u:5288: anantare ca mantre tāveva draṣṭṛdraṣṭavyabhāvena viśinaṣṭi- 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagno 'nīśayā śocati muhyamānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5289: juṣṭaṃ yadā paśyatyanyamīśamasya mahimānamiti vītaśokaḥ' (muṇḍa. 3.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5291: apara āha- 'dvā suparṇā' iti neyamṛgasyādhikaraṇasya siddhāntaṃ bhajate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5297: tatraiva ca vyākhyātatvāt- 'tadetatsattvaṃ yena svapnaṃ paśyati, atha yo 'yaṃ śārīra upadraṣṭā sa kṣetrajñastāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5299: nahyatra śārīraḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādinā saṃsāradharmeṇopeto vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5304: tāvatā ca vidyopasaṃhāradarśanamelamevāvakalpate, tāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcana raca ādhvaṃsate ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5305: kathaṃ punarasminpakṣe tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādittīti sattvam ityacetane sattve bhoktṛtvāvacanamti
GSP33brssgo1u:5306: ucyate- neyaṃ śrutiracetanasya sattvasya bhoktṛtvaṃ vakṣyāmīti pravṛttā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5307: kiṃ tarhi cetanasya kṣetrajñasyābhoktṛtvaṃ brahmasbhāvatāṃ ca vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5309: idaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ta sattvakṣetrajñayoritaretisvabhāvāvivekakṛtaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5313: tathāca śrutiḥ- 'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānyo 'nyatpaśyet' ityādinā svapnadṛṣṭahastyādivyavahāravadavidyāviṣaya eva kartṛtvādivyavahāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5314: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛ. 4.5.15) ityādinā ca vivekinaḥ kartṛtvādivyavaharābhāvam darśayati // 12 //
GSP33brssgo1u:5317: durdarśe durjñānaṃ, tata eva gūḍhamanupraviṣṭaṃ gahanatāṃ gatamīśvaram adhyātmaprayogaḥ pratyagātmanyeva cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5320: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ pasyati
GSP33brssgo1u:5324: anyadivābhāsabhūtaṃ nānātvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāttatra avidyakabuddhyādisaṃbandhādanyo bhūtvānyacakṣuṣā paśyet /
GSP33brssgo1u:5328: sa jīvo 'dhvanaḥ saṃsāramārgasya paramaṃ pāraṃ, kiṃ tat,
GSP33brssgo1u:5330: durdarśaṃ durjñānaṃ, tatra heturgūḍhaṃ māyāvṛtaṃ māyānupraviṣṭaṃ paścādguhāhitaṃ guhādvārā gahvareṣṭhaṃ, evaṃ bahirāgatamātmānaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5331: adhyātmayogaḥ sthūlasūkṣmakāraṇadehalayakrameṇa pratyagātmani cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5332: ṛtapānamatre jīvānuvādena vākyārthajñānāya tatpadārtho brahma pratipādyata ityupasaṃharati-tasmādiheti
GSP33brssgo1u:5342: anīśayā svasyeśvaratvāpratītyā dehe nimagnaḥ puruṣo jīvaḥ śocati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5345: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ śodhitacinmātraṃ pratyaktvena paśyati tadāsya mahimānaṃ svarūpameti prāpnotīva /
GSP33brssgo1u:5352: pūrvapakṣārthastadā syāt, yadyatra buddhibhinnaḥ saṃsārī pratipadyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:5353: nahyatra saṃsārī vivikṣyate kintu śodhitastvamartho brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5357: nāhi jīvo buddhibhinna iti vivekamātreṇopasaṃhāro yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5359: avidyā viduṣi kimapi svakāryaṃ nādhvaṃsate na saṃpādayati, jñānāgninā svasyā eva dagdhatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5365: vastuto jīvasyābhoktṛtve bhoktṛtvadhīḥ kathamityata āha-idaṃ hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5371: tasmāt 'ṛtaṃ pibantau'iti vākyameva guhādhikaraṇaviṣaya iti sthitam
GSP33brssgo1u:5377: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovācaitadamṛtamabhayametadbrahmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5378: etadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' (chā. 4.15.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:5384: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti ca prasiddavadupadeśāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5386: sa hi cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyaṃścakṣuṣi saṃnihito bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5400: tathākṣisthānaṃ sarvaleparahimupadiṣṭaṃ, 'tadyadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5402: 'etaṃ saṃyaddhāma ityācakṣate etaṃ hi sarvāṇi vāmānyabhisaṃyanti' /
GSP33brssgo1u:5403: 'eṣa u eva vāmanīreṣa hi sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati' /
GSP33brssgo1u:5404: ' eṣa u eva bhāmānīreṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti' (chā. 4.15.2,3,4) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:5415: tadakṣisthānamasaṅgatvena brahmaṇo 'nurūpaṃ yato 'sminkṣiptaṃ vartmanī pakṣmaṇī eva gacchatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5417: pūrvaṃ 'pibantau'iti prathamaśrutacetanatvānusāreṇa caramaśrutā guhāpraveśādayo nītāḥ, tadvadihāpi dṛśyata iti
GSP33brssgo1u:5418: cākṣuṣatvānusāreṇamṛtatvādayo dhyānārthaṃ kalpitatvena neyā iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-chāyātmeti
GSP33brssgo1u:5424: 'mano brahmetyupāsīta'ityatra itipadasya pratyayaparatvāt, iha ca brahmetyuvācetyanvayena
GSP33brssgo1u:5440: santi hyanyānyapi pṛthivyādīni sthānānyasya nirdiṣṭāni- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5442: teṣu hi cakṣurapi nirdiṣṭam- 'yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭhan' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5443: 'sthānādivyapadeśāt' ityādigrahaṇenaitaddarśayati- na kevalaṃ sthānamevaikamanucitaṃ brahmaṇo nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate, kiṃ tarhi nāmarūpamityevañjātīyakamapyanāmarūpasya brahmaṇo 'nucitaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5445: nirguṇamapi sadbrahma nāmarūpagatairguṇaiḥ saguṇamupāsanārthaṃ tatra tatropadiśyata ityetadapyuktameva
GSP33brssgo1u:5446: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyarthaṃ sthānaviśeṣo na virudhyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5448: FN: sthānādanyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakārāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvaṅgatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5451: anavakḷptiḥ akḷptakalpanā tadā bhavet, yadyatraiva nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavedityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5456: apica naivātra vivaditavyaṃ, kiṃ brahmāsminvākye 'bhidhīyate na veti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5458: sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ hi brahma yadvākyopakrame prakrāntaṃ 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti tadevehābhihitaṃ, prakṛtaparigrahasya nyāyyatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5459: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' (chā. 4 14.1) iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5460: kathaṃ punarvākyopakrame sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma vijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5461: ucyate- 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' ityetadagnīnāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvopakosala uvāca- 'vijānāmyahaṃ yatprāṇo brahma kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmi' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5462: tatredaṃ prativacanam- 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kaṃ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5466: yadi tasya viśeṣaṇatvena kaṃśabdaḥ sukhavācī nopādīyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:5467: tathā sati kevale bhūtākāśe brahmaśabdo nāmādiṣviva pratīkābhiprāyeṇa prayukta iti pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5468: tathā kaṃśabdasya viṣayendriyasaṃparkajanite sāmaye sukhe prasiddhatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:5469: yadi tasya khaṃśabdo viśeṣaṇatvena nopādīyeta, laukikaṃ sukhaṃ brahmeti
GSP33brssgo1u:5471: itaretaraviśeṣatau tu kaṅkhaṃśabdau sukhātmakaṃ brahma gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5472: tatra dvitīye brahmaśabde 'nupādīyamāne kaṃ khaṃ brahmetyevocyamāne
GSP33brssgo1u:5474: tanmā bhūdityubhayoḥ kaṅkhaṃśabdayorbrahmaśabdaśirastvaṃ 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5477: pratyekaṃ ca gārhapatyādayo 'gnayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ mahimānamupadiśya 'eṣā somya te 'smadvidyātmavidyā ca' ityupasaṃharantaḥ pūrvatra brahma nirdiṣṭamiti jñāpayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5478: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ vārayati
GSP33brssgo1u:5479: 'yathā puṣkarapalāśā āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate' (chā. 4.14.3) iti cākṣisthānaṃ puruṣaṃ vijānataḥ pāpenānupaghātaṃ bruvannakṣisthānasya puruṣasya brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5480: tasmātprakṛtasyaiva brahmaṇo 'kṣisthānatāṃ saṃyadvāmatvādiguṇatāṃ coktvārcirādikāṃ tadvido gatiṃ vakṣyāmītyupakramate- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca' (chā. 4.15.1) iti // 15 //
GSP33brssgo1u:5485: brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoste brahmaśirasī tayorbhāvo brahmaśirastvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5487: dhyānārthaṃ bhedakalpanayā sukhaguṇaviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtasya ya eṣa iti sarvanāmnābhidhānādantaraḥ paramātmā syāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5488: nanu prakaraṇātprabalena dṛśyatvaliṅgenopasthāpitaśchāyātmā sarvanāmārtha ityata āha-ācāryastviti
GSP33brssgo1u:5494: tathā cāgnibhiruktātmavidyāvākyasya gativākyenaikavākyatā vācyā, sā ca sarvanāmnā prakṛtātmagrahe nirvahatītyekavākyatānirvāhakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vākyabhedakālliṅgadbalavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5496: prāṇaśca sūtrātmā bṛhattvādbrahmeti yattajjānāmi, kaṃ viṣayasukhaṃ khaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5497: ca bhūtākāśaṃ brahmatvena jñātuṃ na śaknomītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5498: khaṃ kathaṃbhūtaṃ, yatkaṃ tadeva khamiti sukhena viśeṣitasya khasya
GSP33brssgo1u:5500: tathā kaṃ kathaṃbhūtaṃ, yatkhaṃ tadeva kamiti vibhutvena viśeṣitasya kasya janyatvanirāsa iti vyatirekamukhenāha-tatra khamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5506: nanvekaṃ brahmaivātra dhyeyaṃ cedbrahmapadāntaraṃ kimarthamityata āha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5512: pṛthivyagnirannamāditya iti mama catasrastanavo vibhūtiriti gārhapatya upadideśa /
GSP33brssgo1u:5513: āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā ityanvāhāryapacana uvāca /
GSP33brssgo1u:5514: prāṇa ākāśo dyaurvidyuditi svamahimānamāhavanīyo jagādeti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5523: itaścākṣisthānaḥ puruṣaḥ parameśvaraḥ, yasmācchrutopaniṣatkasya śrutarahasyavijñānasya brahmavido yā gatirdevayānākhyā prasiddhā śrutau-
GSP33brssgo1u:5528: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ' (gī. 8.24) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5530: 'atha yadu caivāsmiñchavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣamevābhisaṃbhavanti'
GSP33brssgo1u:5531: ityupakramya 'ādityāccandramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enānbrahma gamayatyeva devapatho brahmapatha etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavamāvarte nāvartante' (chā. 4.17.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5532: tadiha brahmavidviṣayā prasiddhayā gatyākṣisthānasya brahmatvaṃ niścīyate
GSP33brssgo1u:5535: asminnupāsake mṛte putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃbandhi saṃskārādikarma kurvanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5537: śrutā anuṣṭhitā upaniṣat rahasyaṃ saguṇabrahmopāsanaṃ yena tasya yā gatiḥ śrutau smṛtau ca prasidvā tasyā atrābhidhānālliṅgaditi
GSP33brssgo1u:5542: svadharmastapaḥ tapobrahmacaryaśraddhāvidyābhirātmānaṃ dhyātvā tayā dhyānavidyayottaraṃ devayānamārgaṃ prāpyate nottareṇa pathā /
GSP33brssgo1u:5543: ādityadvārā saguṇabrahmasthānaṃ gacchanti, etadvai brahma prāṇānāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5546: ataḥ kāryaṃ brahma prāpya tatsvarūpaṃ nirguṇaṃ jñātvā mucyanta ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5547: agnireva jyotirdevatā evamaharādyā devatā eva smṛtāvuktāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5548: asminnupāsake mṛte sati yadi putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃskārādikaṃ kurvanti yadi ca na kurvanti ubhayathāpyupāstimahimnā arcirādidevānkrameṇa gacchanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5549: ārciṣamagniṃ, tato 'haḥ, ahnaḥ śuklapakṣaṃ, tatra uttarāyaṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5550: tasmātsaṃvatsaraṃ, tato devalokaṃ, tato vāyuṃ, vāyorādityaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5551: tataścandraṃ, candrādvidyutaṃ gatvā tatra vidyulloke sthitānupāsakānamānavaḥ puruṣo brahmalokādāgatya kāryaṃ brahmalokaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:5555: ta etatkāryaṃ brahma pratipadyamānā upāsakā imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ āvartaṃ janmamaraṇāvṛttiyuktaṃ nāvartante nāgacchantītyarthaḥ //16//
GSP33brssgo1u:5559: yatpunaruktaṃ chāyātmā, vijñānātmā, devatātmā vā syādakṣisthāna iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5563: yadaiva hi kaścitpuruṣaścakṣurāsīdati tadā cakṣuṣi puruṣacchāyā dṛśyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:5565: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣaḥ' iti ca śrutiḥ saṃnidhānātsvacakṣuṣi dṛśyamānaṃ puruṣamupāsyatvenopadiśati
GSP33brssgo1u:5566: nacopāsanākāle chāyākaraṃ kañcitpuruṣaṃ cakṣuḥsamīpe saṃnidhāpyopāsta iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum
GSP33brssgo1u:5567: 'asyaiva śarīrasya nāśamanveṣa naśyati' (chā. 8.9.1) iti śrutiśchāyātmano 'pyanavasthitatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5568: asaṃbhavācca tasminnamṛtatvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ na chāyātmani pratītiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5573: yadyapi vijñānātmā paramātmano 'nanya eva, tathāpyavidyākāmakarmakṛtaṃ tasminmartyatvamadhyaropitaṃ bhayaṃ cetyamṛtatvābhayatve nopapadyete /
GSP33brssgo1u:5575: devatātmanastu 'raśmibhireṣo 'sminpratiṣṭhitaḥ' iti śruteryadyapi cakṣuṣyavasthānaṃ syāttathāpyātmatvaṃ tāvanna saṃbhavati, parāgrūpatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5582: asmiṃśca pakṣe dṛśyata iti prasiddhavadupādānaṃ śāstrādyapekṣaṃ vidvadviṣayaṃ prarocanārthamiti vyākhyeyam // 17 //
GSP33brssgo1u:5585: bhīṣā bhayena, asmāt brahmaṇaḥ, pavate calati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5586: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5591: naca tasya svacakṣuṣā darśanaṃ saṃbhavatītyāha-ya eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5600: nanu 'cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata''sūryo 'stameti'iti vākyaṃ amarā devā iti
GSP33brssgo1u:5604: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5607: tasyaśāstre śrutasya śāstrameva karaṇaṃ kalpyaṃ, saṃnidhānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5608: tathāca śāstrakaraṇako vidvadanubhava upāsanāstutyartha ucyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5615: 'ya imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni yo 'ntaro yamayati'
GSP33brssgo1u:5616: ityupakramya śrūyate- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhanpṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na
GSP33brssgo1u:5617: veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛha. 3.7.1,2) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:5619: sa kimadhidaivādyabhimānī devatātmā kaścitkiṃvā prāptāṇimādyaiśvaryaḥ kaścidyogī kiṃvā paramātmā kiṃvārthāntaraṃ kiñcidityapūrvasaṃjñādarśanātmasaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5620: kiṃ tāvannaḥ pratibhāti, saṃjñayā aprasiddhatvātsaṃjñino 'pyasiddhenārthāntareṇa kenacidbhavitavyamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:5627: yogino vā kasyacitsiddhasya sarvānupraveśena yamayitṛtvaṃ syāt, natu paramātmā pratīyeta, akāryakaraṇatvādityevaṃ prāpta idamucyate- yo
GSP33brssgo1u:5630: tasya hi paramātmano dharmā iha nirdiśyamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:5631: pṛthivyādi tāvadadhidaivatādibhedabhinnaṃ samastaṃ vikārajātamantastiṣṭanyamayatīti paramātmano yamayitṛtvaṃ dharma upapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5633: eṣa ta 'ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' iti cātmatvāmṛtatve mukhye paramātmana upapadyete /
GSP33brssgo1u:5634: 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda' iti ca pṛthivīdevatāyā avijñeyamantaryāmiṇaṃ bruvandevatātmano 'nyamantaryāmiṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5643: FN: āyatanaṃ śarīraṃ, lokyate 'neneti lokacakṣuḥ, jyotirmanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5647: 'yaḥ pṛthivyām'ityādinā devatāḥ pṛthivyādyā adhikṛtya yamayitā śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5657: avāntaraphalaṃ tu pūrvapakṣe anīśvaropāstiḥ, sidvānte pratyagbrahmajñānamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:5661: pṛthivī yasya devasyāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ, lokyate 'neneti lokaścakṣuḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5668: īśvaro na niyantā, aśarīratvāt, ghaṭavadiyuktaṃ nirasyati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5674: vastutastu cetanasāṃnidhyājjaḍasya vyāpāro niyamanaṃ tacchaktimattvaṃ niyantṛtvaṃ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5676: nanu dehaniyanturjīvasyānyo niyantā cettasyāpyanya ityanavasthetyata āha-tasyāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5677: niraṅkuśaṃ sarvaniyantṛtvamīśvarasya śrutaṃ, tasya niyantrantarānumāne śrutibādha dati nānavasthetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5689: ata uttaramucyate- naca smārte pradhānamantaryāmiśabdaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5691: yadyapyadṛṣṭatvādivyapadeśaḥ pradhānasyasaṃbhavati tathāpi na draṣṭṛtvādivyapeśaḥ saṃbhavati, pradhānasyācetanatvena tairabhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5692: 'adṛṣṭo draṣṭāśrutaḥ śrotāmato mantāvijñāto vijñātā' (bṛha. 3.7.23) iti hi vākyaśeṣa iha bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5696: śārīro hi cetanatvāddraṣṭā śrotā mantā vijñātā ca bhavati, ātmā ca pratyaktvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5698: adṛṣṭatvādayaśca dharmāḥ śārīre parasiddhāḥ darśanādikriyāyāḥ kartari pravṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5703: kartarīti kriyāyāṃ guṇaḥ kartā, pradhānaṃ karma, tatraikasyāṃ kriyāyāmekasya guṇatvapradhānatvayorvirodhānna kartuḥ karmatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5704: pradhānaṃ mahadādikrameṇa kathaṃ pravartata iti tarkasyāviṣaya
GSP33brssgo1u:5706: rūpādihīnatvādavijñeyaṃ, sarvato dikṣu prasuptamiva tiṣṭhati jaḍatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5707: atat apradhānaṃ cetanaṃ, tasya dharmāṇāmabhidhānāditi hetvarthaḥ //19//
GSP33brssgo1u:5714: yadyapi draṣṭṛtvādayo dharmastasya saṃbhavanti tathāpi ghaṭākāśavadupādhiparicchinnatvānna kārtsyena pṛthivyādiṣvantaravasthātuṃ niyantuṃ ca śaknoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5715: apicobhaye 'pi hi śākhinaḥ kāṇvā mādhyandinānāścāntaryāmiṇo bhedenainaṃ śārīraṃ pṛthivyādivadadhiṣṭhānatvena niyamyatvena cādhīyate- 'yo vijñāne
GSP33brssgo1u:5720: 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan' ityasminnapi pāṭhe vijñānaśabdena śārīra ucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5727: atra hi prakṛtādantaryāmiṇo 'nyaṃ draṣṭāraṃ, śrotāraṃ, mantāraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5734: eko hi pratyagātmā bhavati, na dvau pratyagātmānau saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5735: ekasyaiva tu bhedavyavahāra upādhikṛto yathā ghaṭākāśo mahākāśa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5736: tataśca jñātṛjñeyādibhedaśrutayaḥ pratyakṣādīni ca pramāṇāni saṃsārānubhavo vidhipratiṣedhaśāstraṃ ceti sarvametadupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5737: tathāca śrutiḥ 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati'
GSP33brssgo1u:5739: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' iti vidyāviṣaye sarve
GSP33brssgo1u:5744: yathā devadattakartṛkagamanakriyāyā grāmaḥ karma na devadattaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:5745: tathātmakartṛkadarśanādikriyāyā anātmā viṣayaḥ na tvātmā, kriyāyāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:5747: kriyāyāṃ guṇaḥ kartā, pradhānaṃ karma, tatraikasyāṃ kriyāyāmekasya guṇatvapradhānatvayorvirodhānna kartuḥ karmatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:5748: dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāramātmānaṃ tayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na viṣayīkuryā ityādiśruteścādṛṣṭatvādidharmāḥ śārīrasyetyāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5751: nanvatraiko bhoktā jīvaḥ, īśvarastvabhokteti na virodha iti śaṅkate-kā
GSP33brssgo1u:5757: tasmātsūtre, 'ya ātmāni tiṣṭhan'iti śrutau ca draṣṭṛbhedoktirayuktā,
GSP33brssgo1u:5758: 'nānyaḥ'iti vākyaśeṣe bhedanirāsāditi prāpte, bheda upādhikalpitaḥ śrutisūtrābhyāmanūdyata iti samādhatte-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5759: bhedaḥ satyaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-eko hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5771: 'yattadadreśyamagrāhyamagotramavarṇamacakṣuḥśrotraṃ tadapāṇipādaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣmaṃ tadavyayaṃ yadbhūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti dhīrāḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:5773: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimayamadreśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ pradhānaṃ syāduta śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5774: tatra pradhānamacetanaṃ bhūtayoniriti yuktaṃ, acetanānāmeva taddṛṣṭāntatvenopādānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:5775: 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca yathā pṛthivyāmoṣadhaḥ saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5780: nahi kevalasya cetanasya tatra sūtrayonitvaṃ keśalomayonitvaṃ cāsti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5781: cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ hyacetanamūrṇanābhiśarīraṃ sūtrasya yoniḥ, puruṣaśarīraṃ ca keśalomnāmiti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:5787: pradhāne na saṃbhavanti, kathaṃ pradhānaṃ bhūtayoniḥ pratijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5791: tatra yaḥ paro 'kṣarācchrutaḥ sa sarvajñaḥ sarvavitsaṃbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5793: yadā tu yoniśabdo nimittavācī tadā śārīro 'pi bhūtayoniḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:5795: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate- yoyamadṛśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ sa parameśvara eva syānnānya iti
GSP33brssgo1u:5798: parameśvarasya hi dharma ihocyamāno dṛśyate- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' iti
GSP33brssgo1u:5799: nahi pradhānasyācetanasya śārīrasya vopādhiparicchinnadṛṣṭeḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:5800: nanvakṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭādbhūtayoneḥ parasyaiva tatsarvajñatvaṃ ca na bhūtayoniviṣayamityuktam
GSP33brssgo1u:5805: tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyate' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:5806: tasmānnirdeśasāmyena pratyabhijñāyamānatvātprakṛtasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ ca dharma ucyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:5810: 'yenākṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ veda satyaṃ provāca tāṃ tattvato brahmavidyām' (muṇḍa.

GSP33brssgo1u:6053: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kiṃ vaiśvānaraśabdena jāṭharo 'gnirupadiśyata uta bhūtāgniratha tadabhimāninī devatā athavā śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti /

GSP33brssgo1u:6138: atra jāṭharo vaiśvānara iti mukhyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6140: tasya dehavyāpitvādātmatvaṃ śrutyā dyumūrdhatvādikalpanayā bṛhattvādbrahmatvamiti dhyeyam
GSP33brssgo1u:6144: nanu nirviśeṣasya kuto viśeṣa ityata āha-atra hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6146: jāṭharasyāpi dhyānārthaṃ viśeṣakalpaneti cet, na, asatkalpanāpatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6150: yathāgnau nikṣiptamiṣīkātūlaṃ dahyate evaṃ hāsya viduṣa ityarthaḥ //24//
GSP33brssgo1u:6154: itaśca parameśvara eva vaiśvānaraḥ, yasmātparameśvarasyaivāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhetīdṛśaṃ trailokyātmakaṃ rūpaṃ smaryate- 'yasyāgnirāsyaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6158: etatsmaryamāṇaṃ rūpaṃ mūlabhūtāṃ śrutimanumāpayadasya vauśvānaraśabdasya parameśvaraparatve 'numānaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6162: stutitvamapi nāsati mūlabhūte vedavākye samāyagīdṛśena rūpeṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6163: 'dyāṃ mūrdhānaṃ yasya viprā vadanti khaṃ vai nābhiṃ candrasūryau ca netre
GSP33brssgo1u:6164: diśaḥ śrotre viddhi pādau kṣitiṃ ca so 'cintyātmā sarvabhūtapraṇetā //
GSP33brssgo1u:6170: satā rūpeṇa stuti saṃbhavānnāsadāropa iti bhāvaḥ //25//
GSP33brssgo1u:6173: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānāc ca neti cen na tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśād
GSP33brssgo1u:6177: śabdastāvadvaiśvānaraśabdo na parameśvare saṃbhavati, arthāntare rūḍhatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6184: yadapyuktaṃ- mūrdhaiva sutejā ityāderviśeṣātkāraṇātparamātmā vaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6185: atra brūmaḥ- kuto hyeṣa nirṇayaḥ, yadubhayathāpi viśeṣapratibhāne sati
GSP33brssgo1u:6186: parameśvaraviṣaya eva viśeṣa āśrayaṇīyo na jāṭharaviṣaya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6188: tasyāpi hi dyulokādisaṃbandho mantravarṇādavagamyate- 'yo bhānunā pṛthivī dyāmutemāmātatāna rodasī antarikṣam' (ṛ.sa. 10.88.3) ityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:6192: na śabdādibhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ parameśvarasya pratyākhyānaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6198: yadi ceha parameśvaro na vivakṣyeta kevala eva jāṭharo 'gnirvivakṣyeta
GSP33brssgo1u:6199: tato mūrdhaiva sutejā ityādirviśeṣasyāsaṃbhava eva syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6200: yathā tu devatābhūtāgnivyapāśrayeṇāpyayaṃ viśeṣa upapādayituṃ na śakyate tathottarasūtre vakṣyāmaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6201: yadi ca kevala eva jāṭharo vivakṣyeta, puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvaṃ kevalaṃ tasya syānna tu puruṣatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6203: yatpuruṣaḥ sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe
GSP33brssgo1u:6207: ye tu 'puruṣavidhamapi cainamadhīyate' iti sūtrāvayavaṃ paṭhanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:6208: teṣāmeṣor'thaḥ- kevalajāṭharaparigrahe puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitatvaṃ kevalaṃ syānna puruṣavidhatvam
GSP33brssgo1u:6214: FN: bhaktamannaṃ homīyaṃ homasādhanaṃ tena prāṇāgnihotraṃ kāryamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6215: imāṃ pṛthivīmuta dyāmapi dyāvāpṛthivyāveva rodasī yo bhānurūpeṇātatāna vyāptavān /
GSP33brssgo1u:6216: antarikṣaṃ ca tayormadhyamātatāna sa devo dyulokādyavayavo dhyeya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6221: 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaraḥ'ityagnirahasye vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ śruto 'gniśabda īśvare na saṃbhavatītyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6223: bhaktamannaṃ, homīyaṃ homasādhanaṃ, tena prāṇāgnihotraṃ kāryamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6224: vājasaneyināmagnirahasye saprapañcāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāmuktvā 'sa yo haitamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda sa sarvatrānnamatti'ityuktaṃ dehāntaḥsthatvaṃ jāṭhare saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:6226: atra sūtre ādipadenaivāntaḥpratiṣṭhānasya grahe saṃbhavati pṛthaguktiḥ sādhāraṇaliṅgatvadyotanārthā
GSP33brssgo1u:6228: yadyapi dyumūrdhatvādiviśeṣa īśvarapakṣapātī homādhāratvādirjāṭharapakṣapātīti pratibhānaṃ samaṃ tathāpi pārameśvaro viśeṣo jāṭhare na saṃbhavatīti balavānityata āha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6230: imāṃ pṛthivīṃ dyāmapi te eva dyāvāpṛthivyau rodasī tathormadhyamantarikṣaṃ ca yo bhūtāgnirbhānurūpeṇātatāna vyāptavān sa dhyātavya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6239: yat yaḥ, puruṣaḥ, sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaraśabditajāṭharopādhika iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6240: yo veda sa sarvatra bhuṅkta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6241: puruṣatvaṃ pūrṇatvamacetanasya jāṭharasya netyuktvā pāṭhāntare puruṣavidhatvaṃ dehākāratvaṃ tasya netyāha-ye tviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6244: na dehavyāpitvaṃ puruṣavidhatvaṃ kintu virāḍdehākāratvaṃ, adhidaivaṃ puruṣavidhatvamadhyātmaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6248: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca |
GSP33brssgo1u:6249: yatpunaruktaṃ bhūtāgnerapi mantravarṇe dyulokādisaṃbandhadarśanānmūrdhaiva sutejā ityādyavayavakalpanaṃ tasyaiva bhaviṣyatīti, yaccharīrāyā devatāyā vaiśvaryayogāditi, tatparihartavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6250: atrocyate- ata evoktebhyo hetubhyo na devatā vaiśvānaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6254: tathā devatāyāḥ satyapyaiśvaryayoge na dyumūrdhatvādikalpanā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6258: evaṃ jāṭharaṃ nirasya pakṣadvayaṃ nirasyati-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6267: pūrve jāṭharāgnipratīko jāṭharāgnyupādhiko vā parameśvara upāsya ityuktamantaḥpratiṣṭhitatvādyanurodhena
GSP33brssgo1u:6268: idānīṃ tu vinaiva pratīkopādhikalpanābhyāṃ sākṣādapi parameśvaropāsanaparigrahe na kaścidvirodha iti jaiminirācāryo manyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:6274: kathaṃ tarhi yatprakṛtaṃ mūrdhādicubukānteṣu puruṣāvayaveṣu puruṣavidhitvaṃ kalpitaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇedamucyate- 'puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe
GSP33brssgo1u:6276: yathā vṛkṣe śākhāṃ pratiṣṭhitāṃ paśyatīti tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6277: athavā yaḥ prakṛtaḥ paramātmādhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca puruṣavidhitvopādhistasya yatkevalaṃ sākṣirūpaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇedamucyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:6279: niścite ca pūrvāparālocanavaśena paramātmaparigrahe tadviṣaya eva vaiśvānaraśabdaḥ kenacidyogena vartiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6280: viśvaścāyaṃ naraśceti, viśveṣāṃ vāyaṃ naraḥ, viśve vā narā asyeti
GSP33brssgo1u:6287: kathaṃ punaḥ parameśvaraparigrahe prādeśamātraśrutirupapadyata iti tāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6293: adhunā pratīkopādhiparītyāgena virāṭpuruṣākārasya bhagavato vaiśvānarasyādhyātmaṃ mūrdhādicubukānteṣu saṃpādyopāsyatvāṅgīkāre 'pi na śabdādivirodhaḥ śabdayorīśvare yogavṛttyā mukhyatvāt, antaḥsthatvādīnāṃ ca tatra saṃbhavādityāha-sākṣādapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6296: idamantasthatvamudarasthatvarūpaṃ nocyate kintu nakhādiśikhāntāvayavasamudāyātmakapuruṣaśarīre mūrdhādicibukāntāṅgāni vṛkṣe śākhāvatpratiṣṭhitāni, teṣu saṃpanno vaiśvānaraḥ puruṣe
GSP33brssgo1u:6298: ato yathā śākhāsthasya pakṣiṇo vṛkṣāntaḥsthatvaṃ tathā vaiśvānarasya
GSP33brssgo1u:6308: viśve sarve narā jīvā asyātmatvena niyamyatvena vā santīti viśvānaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6312: aṅgayati gamayatyagraṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ prāpayatīti agniragraṇīruktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6320: abhivyajyate kila prādeśamātraparimāṇaḥ parameśvara upāsakānāṃ kṛte /
GSP33brssgo1u:6322: ataḥ parameśvare 'pi prādeśamātraśrutirabhivyakterupapadyata ityāśmarathya ācāryo manyate FN: atikrāntā mātrāḥ parimāṇaṃ yasya tasyeti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:6325: upāsakānāṃ kṛte 'nugrahāya prādeśamātro 'bhivyajyate, pradeśeṣu vā mīyate 'bhivyajyata iti prādeśamātraḥ //29//
GSP33brssgo1u:6329: prādeśamātrahṛdayapratiṣṭhena vāyaṃ manasānusmaryate tena prādeśamātra ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6331: yadyapi ca yaveṣu svagatameva parimāṇaṃ prasthasaṃbandhādvyajyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6337: FN: prādeśena manasā mīyata iti vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6342: manaḥsthaṃ prādeśamātratvaṃ smṛtidvārā smaryamāṇe kalpitaṃ śruterālambanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6346: saṃpatter iti jaiminis tathā hi darśayati |
GSP33brssgo1u:6349: tathāhi- samānaprakaraṇaṃ vājasaneyibrāhmaṇaṃ dyuprabhṛtīnpṛthivīparyantāṃstrailokyātmano vaiśvānarasyāvayavānadhyātmamūrdhaprabhṛtiṣu cubukaparyanteṣu dehāvayaveṣu saṃpādayatprādeśamātrasaṃpattiṃ parameśvarasya darśayati-
GSP33brssgo1u:6350: 'prādeśamātramiva ha vai devāḥ suviditā abhisaṃpannāstathā nu va etānvakṣyāmi yathā prādeśamātramevābhisaṃpādayiṣyāmīti
GSP33brssgo1u:6351: sa hovāca mūrdhānamupadiśannuvācaiṣa vā atiṣṭhā vaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6352: cakṣuṣī upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai sutejā vaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6353: nāsike upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai pṛthagvartmātmā vaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6355: mukhyā apa upadiśannuvācaiṣa vai rayirvaiśvānara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6359: chāndogye punardyaiḥ sutejastvaguṇā samāmnāyata ādityaśca viśvarūpaguṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6365: aparicchinnamapīśvaraṃ prādeśamātratvena saṃpattyā kalpitaṃ samyagviditavanto devāstameveśvaramabhi pratyaktvena saṃpannāḥ prāptavantaḥ, ha vai pūrvakāle, tato vo yuṣmabhyaṃ, tathā dyuprabhṛtīnavayavānvakṣyāmi yathā prādeśamātraṃ prādeśaparimāṇamanatikramya mūrdhādyadhyātmāṅgeṣu vaiśvānaraṃ saṃpādayiṣyāmīti prācīnaśāladīnprati rājā pratijñāya svakīyamūrdhānamupadiśan kareṇa darśayannuvāca-eṣa vai me mūrdhā
GSP33brssgo1u:6370: svakīyacakṣuṣī darśayan 'eṣa vai sutejāḥ sūryo vaiśvānarasya
GSP33brssgo1u:6372: nāsikāpadena tanniṣṭhaḥ prāṇe lakṣyate tasminnādhyātmikaprāṇe 'dhidaivaprāṇasya vāyordṛṣṭimāha-nāsika iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6374: mukhasthaṃ mukhyaṃ tasminnadhidaivaṃ bahulākaśadṛṣṭiḥ mukhasthalālārūpāsvapsu raiśabditatadīyabastisthodakadṛṣṭiḥ cibuke pratiṣṭhā pādarūpā pṛthivī draṣṭavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6383: yadvā śākhābhedena guṇavyavasthāstu na vidyābheda iti bhāvaḥ //31//
GSP33brssgo1u:6390: varaṇāyāṃ nāsyāṃ ca madhye pratiṣṭhita iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6391: kā vai varaṇā kā ca nāsīti' /
GSP33brssgo1u:6392: tatra cemāmeva nāsikāṃ varaṇā nāsīti nirucya yā sarvāṇīndriyakṛtāni pāpāni vārayatīti sā varaṇā, sarvāṇīndriyakṛtāni pāpāni nāśayatīti sā nāsīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6394: bhruvordhāraṇasya ca yaḥ saṃdhiḥ sa eṣa dyulokasya parasya ca
GSP33brssgo1u:6402: iti śrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ FN: avimukte avidyopādhikalpitāvacchede jīvātmi bhedakalpanayā pratiṣṭhita upāsyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6407: ya eṣo 'nanto 'paricchinnaḥ ato 'vyakto durvijñeyastaṃ kathaṃ jānīyāmityatreḥ praśne yājñavalkyasyottaraṃ, sa īśvaro 'vimukte
GSP33brssgo1u:6411: tatra ca śrutau imāmeva bhrūsahitāṃ nāsikāṃ nirucyeti bhāṣyayojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6412: sarvānindrayakṛtāndoṣānvārayatīti varaṇā bhrūḥ, sarvāndoṣānnāśayatīti nāsī nāsiketi nirvacanaṃ śrutam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6414: tayormadhye 'pi viśiṣya jīvasya sthānaṃ pṛcchati katamaditi,
GSP33brssgo1u:6417: sa eṣa saṃdhirdyulokasya svargasya parasya ca brahmalokasya saṃdhitvena dhyeya ityāha-sa eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6418: ābhimukhyenāhaṃ brahmeti vimīyate jñāyate ityabhivimānaḥ pratyagātmā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6424: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brssgo1u:6434: indrādivedyamakhilasya ca śāsitāraṃ jyotirnabhaḥ padamanidramajaṃ bhaje
GSP33brssgo1u:6438: idaṃ śrūyate- 'yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotaṃ manaḥ saha prāṇaiśca sarvaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6439: tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānamanyā vāco vimucyathāmṛtasyaiṣa setuḥ' (muṇḍa.
GSP33brssgo1u:6441: atra yadetaddyuprabhṛtīnāmotatvavacanādāyatanaṃ kiñcidavagamyate, tatkiṃ paraṃ brahma syādāhosvidarthāntaramiti saṃdihyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6447: arthāntare cāyatane parigṛhyamāṇe smṛtiprasiddhaṃ pradhānaṃ parigrahītavyaṃ, tasya kāraṇatvādāyatanatvopapatteḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6448: śrutiprasiddho vā vāyuḥ syāt, 'vāyurvai gautama tatsūtraṃ vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ ca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti'
GSP33brssgo1u:6451: tasyāpi bhoktṛtvādbhogyaṃ prapañcaṃ pratyāyatanatvopapatterityevaṃ prāpta idamāha- dyubhvādyāyatanamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:6452: dyauśca bhūśca dyubhuvau dyubhuvāvādī yasya tadidaṃ dyubhvādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6453: yadetadasminvākye dyauḥ pṛthivyantarikṣaṃ manaḥ prāṇā ityevamasmākaṃ jagadotatvena nirdiṣṭaṃ tasyāyatanaṃ paraṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6456: ātmaśabdo hīha bhavati- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6458: kvacicca svaśabdenaiva brahmaṇa āyatanatvaṃ śrūyate-' sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhāḥ' (chā. 6.8.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6459: svaśabdenaiva ceha purastādupariṣṭācca brahma saṃkīrtyate- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma tapo brahma parāmṛtam' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6464: yathānekātmako vṛkṣaḥ śākhā skandho mūlaṃ cetyevaṃ nānāraso vicitra ātmetyāśaṅkā saṃbhavati, tāṃ nivartayituṃ sāvadhāraṇamāha- 'tamevaikaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6466: etaduktaṃ bhavati- na kāryaprapañcaviśiṣṭo vicitra ātmā vijñeyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6468: yathā yasmānnāste devadattastadānayetyukta āsanamevānayati na devadattam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6470: vikārānṛtābhisaṃdhasya cāpavādaḥ śrūyate- 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (kā. 2.4.11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6471: sarvaṃ brahmeti tu sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prapañcapravilāpanārthaṃ nānekarasatāpratipādanārtham
GSP33brssgo1u:6472: 'sa yathā saindhavaghano 'nantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsno rasaghana evaivaṃ vā are 'yamātmānantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva' (bṛha. 4.5.13)
GSP33brssgo1u:6477: atrocyate- vidhāraṇatvamātramatra setuśrutyā vivakṣyate na pāravattvādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6478: nahi mṛddārumayo loke seturdṛṣṭa ityatrāpi mṛddārumaya evaseturabhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6479: setuśabdārtho 'pi vidhāraṇatvamātrameva na pāravattvādi ṣiño bandhanakarmaṇaḥ setuśabdavyutpatteḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6480: apara āha- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti yadetatsaṃkīrtitamātmajñānaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6484: tatra yaduktaṃ setuśruterbrahmaṇor'thāntareṇa dyubhvādyāyatanena bhāvyamityetadayuktam // FN: amṛtasyeti śravaṇāt seturiti śravaṇāditi yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6491: evaṃ rūḍhipadabahulānāṃ prāyeṇa saviśeṣavākyānāṃ samanvayo dvitīyapāde darśitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6492: adhunā yaugikapadabahulānāṃ nirviśeṣapradhānānāṃ vākyānāṃ samanvayaṃ vaktuṃ tṛtīyaḥ pāda ārabhyate
GSP33brssgo1u:6495: brahmaparatvamuktaṃ, tadvadatrāpyupakramasthasādhāraṇāyatanatvasya vākyaśeṣasthasetuśrutyā vastutaḥ paricchinne pradhānādau vyavastheti
GSP33brssgo1u:6499: yasmin lokatrayātmā virāṭ, prāṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ saha manaḥ sūtrātmakaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6500: cakārādavyākṛtaṃ kāraṇamotaṃ kalpitaṃ tadapavādena tamevādhiṣṭhānātmānaṃ pratyagabhinnaṃ jānatha śravaṇādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6501: anyā anātmavāco vimuñcatha viśeṣeṇa niḥśeṣaṃ tyajatha /
GSP33brssgo1u:6503: mokṣasyāsārāpāradurvārasaṃsāravāridheḥ parapārasya seturiva setuḥ prāpaka iti mātṛvacchrutirmumukṣūnupadiśati
GSP33brssgo1u:6505: amṛtasya brahmaṇaḥ seturiti ṣaṣṭhyā brahmaṇo bhinnatvena setoḥ śrutatvādeṣaśabdaparāmṛṣṭaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanamabrahmaiva seturiva
GSP33brssgo1u:6514: yathā loke maṇayaḥ sūtreṇa grathitā evaṃ he gautama,
GSP33brssgo1u:6515: samaṣṭiliṅgātmakavāyunā sthūlāni sarvāṇi saṃdṛbdhāni grathitāni bhavantīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6519: upādhiparicchinnasya jīvasya sarvavastu pratyekaṃ mukhyaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6522: prajānāmūtpattau sadeva mūlaṃ, sthitāvāyatanaṃ, laye pratiṣṭheti brahmavācisatpadena chāndogye brahmaṇa āyatanatvaśruteratrāpi tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6524: 'yasmin dyauḥ'iti vākyātpūrvottaravākyayoḥ puruṣabrahmādiśabdena brahmasaṃkīrtanānmadhye 'pi brahma grāhyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6525: puruṣa iti pūrvavākyaṃ, brahmaivetyuttaravākyaṃ, sarvāsu dikṣu sthitaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6531: yasmin sarvamotaṃ tamevaikamityevakāraikaśabdābhyāṃ nirviśeṣaṃ jñeyamityuktvā hetvantaramāha-vikārānṛteti
GSP33brssgo1u:6532: vikāre 'nṛte kalpite abhisaṃdho 'bhimāno yasya tasyānarthabhāktvena nindāśruteśca kūṭasthasatyaṃ jñeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6534: yaścoraḥ sa sthāṇuritivat yatsarvaṃ tadbrahmeti sarvoddeśena
GSP33brssgo1u:6535: brahmatvavidhānādbādhanārthaṃ, na tu yadbrahma tatsarvamiti nānārasatvārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6539: yadyapi pāravattvasāvayavatvādikaṃ mukhyasetvavyabhicāri tathāpi setorjalādibandhanarūpaṃ yadvidhāraṇaṃ tadeva vyabhicāritve 'pi
GSP33brssgo1u:6543: atra śrutau pareṇeti śeṣaḥ vidhāraṇasya śabdārthatvaṃ sphuṭayati-ṣiñ iti
GSP33brssgo1u:6547: yadvā dyubhvādyādhāro brahma na setuśabdārthaḥ kintvavyavahitaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6562: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (muṇḍa. 2.2.8) ityuktvā
GSP33brssgo1u:6565: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ śāstre- 'yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6566: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavatyatra brahma samaśnute' (bṛha. 4.4.7) ityevamādau
GSP33brssgo1u:6568: apica 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānamanyā vāco vimuñcathāmṛtasyaiva setuḥ' iti vāgvimokapūrvakaṃ vijñeyatvamiha dyubhvādyāyatanasyocyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6569: tacca śrutyantare brahmaṇo dṛṣṭam- 'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvati brāhmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6574: muktairūpasṛpyaṃ pratyaktvena prāpyaṃ yadbrahma tasyātrokteriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6578: yathā nadyo gaṅgādyā nāmarūpe vihāya samudrātmanā tiṣṭhanti tathā brahmātmavidapi saṃsāraṃ vihāya parātkāraṇādavyaktātparaṃ pūrṇaṃ svayañjyotirānandaṃ pratyaktvena prāpya tiṣṭhatītyāha-tathā vidvāniti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6579: idaṃ pradhānādeḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-brahmaṇaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6580: asya mumukṣoḥ, hṛdīti padenātmadharmatvaṃ kāmānāṃ nirastam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6582: na kevalamanarthanivṛttiḥ kintvatra dehe tiṣṭhanneva brahmānandamaśnuta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6584: dhīro vivekī tamevātmānaṃ vijñāya viśuddaṃ lakṣyapadārthaṃ jñātvā vākyārthajñānaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6588: jihvāmūlaṃ ca dantāśca nāsikoṣṭhau ca tālu ca //
GSP33brssgo1u:6594: yathā brahmaṇaḥ pratipādakaḥ vaiśeṣiko heturukto naivamarthāntarasya vaiśeṣiko hetuḥ pratipādako 'stītyāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:6597: tasyācetanasya pradhānasya pratipādakaḥ śabdastacchabdaḥ, na tacchabdo 'tacchabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6598: na hyatrācetanasya pradhānasya pratipādakaḥ kaścicchabdo 'sti, yenācetanaṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇatvenāyatanatvena vāvagamyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:6609: yadyapi prāṇabhṛto vijñānātmana ātmatvaṃ cetanatvaṃ ca saṃbhavati tathāpyupādhiparicchinnajñānasya sarvajñatvādyasaṃbhave satyasmādevātacchabdātprāṇabhṛdapi na dyubhvādyāyatanāśrayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6623: bhedavyapadeśaśceha bhavati- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti jñeyajñātṛbhāvena /
GSP33brssgo1u:6624: tatra prāṇabhṛttāvanmumukṣutvāj jñātā, pariśeṣādātmaśabdavācyaṃ brahma dyubhvādyāyatanamiti gamyate, na prāṇabhṛt // 5 //
GSP33brssgo1u:6630: paramātmani hi sarvātmake vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ syānna kevale prāṇabhṛti // 6 //
GSP33brssgo1u:6632: yadyapi viśuddhaḥ pratyagātmaivātra jñeyaḥ tathāpi jīvatvākāreṇa jñāturjñeyādbhedānna jñeyarūpatvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6633: evaṃ ca jīvatvaliṅgaviśiṣṭatvena jīvasya dyubhvādivākyarthatvaṃ nirasyate na śuddharūpeṇeti mantavyam //5 // //6//
GSP33brssgo1u:6638: dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ ca prakṛtya 'dvā supraṇā sayujā sakhāyā' (mu. 3.1.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:6643: yadi ceśvaro dyubhvādyāyatanatvena vivakṣitastatastasya prakṛtasyeśvarasya kṣetrajñātpṛthagvacanamavakalpate
GSP33brssgo1u:6648: kṣetrajñau hi kartṛtvena bhoktṛtvena ca pratiśarīraṃ buddhyādyupādhisaṃbaddho lokata eva prasijaddho nāsau śrutyā tātparyeṇa vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6649: īśvarastu lokato 'prasiddhatvācchrutyā tātparyeṇa vivakṣyata iti na tasyākasmikaṃ vacanaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6652: yadāpi paiṅgyupaniṣatkṛtena vyākhyānenāsyāmṛci sattvakṣetrajñāvucyete tadāpi na virodhaḥ kaścit
GSP33brssgo1u:6654: prāṇabhṛddhīha ghaṭādicchidravatsattvādyupādhyabhimānitvena pratiśarīraṃ gṛhyamāṇo dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ na bhavatīti niṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6657: yathā ghaṭādicchidrāṇi ghaṭādibhirupādhibhirvinopalakṣyamāṇāni mahākāśa eva bhavanti, tadvatprāṇabhṛtaḥ parasmādanyatvānupapatteḥ pratiṣedho
GSP33brssgo1u:6662: tasyaiva hi bhūtayonivākyasya madhya idaṃ paṭhitam 'yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī
GSP33brssgo1u:6665: nanu sthityeśvarasyādanājīvasya 'dvā suparṇā'ityatroktāvapi īśvara āyatanavākyena kimarthaṃ grāhya ityata āha-yadi ceśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6666: atra ceśvaraḥ śuddhacinmātro grāhyaḥ, na sarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6674: nanvatra jīveśau nānuvādyau, paiṅgivyākhyāvirodhādataḥ sūtrāsaṃgatirityata āha-yadāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6676: adanavākyena buddhimanūdya sthitivākyena buddhyādivilakṣaṇaśuddhapratyagbrahmaṇo jñeyasyokterdyubhvādivākye tadeva grāhyaṃ, na buddhyupahito jīva iti
GSP33brssgo1u:6678: nanvatrānupahito jīva ukto na paraṃ brahmetyata āha-yastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6689: idaṃ samāmananti- 'bhūmā tveva vidijñāsitavya iti bhūmānaṃ bhagavo vijijñāsa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6690: yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmātha yatrānyatpaśyatyanyacchṛṇotyanyadvijānāti tadalpam' (chā. 7.23,24) ityādi
GSP33brssgo1u:6696: tathā 'śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavaddṛśebhyastarati śokamātmaviditi so 'haṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6697: bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ mā bhagavāñśokasya pāraṃ tārayatu' (chāṃ. 7.1.3) iti prakaraṇotthānātparamātmā bhūmetyapi pratibhāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6698: tatra kasyopādanaṃ nyāyyaṃ kasya vā hānamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6703: yathā hi 'asti bhagavo nāmno bhūyaḥ' iti, 'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6704: tathā 'asti bhagavo nāmno bhūyaḥ' iti, mano vāva vāco bhūyaḥ' iti ca nāmādibhyo hyā prāṇādbhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanapravāhaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6705: naivaṃ prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanaṃ dṛśyate 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya ityādo vāva prāṇādbhūya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6706: prāṇameva tu nāmādibhya āśāntebhyo bhūyāsaṃ 'prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyān'
GSP33brssgo1u:6708: 'ativādyasītyativādyasmīti brūyānnāpahnuvīta' ityabhyanujñāya 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti prāṇavratamativāditvamanukṛṣyāparityajyaiva prāṇaṃ satyādiparamparayā bhūmānamavatārayanprāṇameva bhūmānaṃ manyanta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6709: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇe bhūmani vyākhyāyamāne 'yatra nānyatpaśyati'
GSP33brssgo1u:6714: tathāca śrutiḥ 'na śṛṇoti na paśyati' ityādinā sarvakaraṇavyāpārapratyastamayarūpāṃ suṣuptyavasthāmuktvā
GSP33brssgo1u:6716: prāṇasya jāgaraṇaṃ bruvatī prāṇapradhānāṃ suṣuptyavasthāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6717: yaccaitadbhūmnaḥ sukhatvaṃ śrutam- 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham' (chā. 7.23)
GSP33brssgo1u:6719: 'atraiṣa devaḥ svapnānna paśyatyatha yadetasmiñśarīre sukhaṃ bhavati'
GSP33brssgo1u:6721: yacca 'yo vai bhūmā tadamṛtam' (chā. 7.24.1) iti tadapi prāṇasyāviruddhaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6723: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇaṃ bhūmānaṃ manyamānasya tarati śokamātmavit ityātmavividiṣayā prakaraṇasyotthānamupapadyate
GSP33brssgo1u:6725: tathāhi-' prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo mātā prāṇo bhrātā prāṇaḥ svasā prāṇa ācāryaḥ prāṇo brāhmaṇaḥ' (chā. 7.15.1) iti prāṇameva sarvātmānaṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6726: 'yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evamasminprāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam' iti ca sarvātmatvāranābhinidarśanābhyāṃ ca saṃbhavati vaipulyātmikā bhūmarūpatā prāṇasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:6728: tata idamucyate- paramātmaiveha bhūmā bhavitumarhati na prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6731: saṃprasāda iti suṣuptaṃ sthānamucyate, samyakprasīdatyasminniti nirvacanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6732: bṛhadāraṇyake ca svapnajāgaritasthānābhyāṃ saha pāṭhāt tasyāṃ ca saṃprasādāvasthāyāṃ prāṇo jāgartīti prāṇo 'tra saṃprasādo 'bhipreyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6735: nahi nāmaiva nāmno bhūya iti nāmna ūrdhvamupadiṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6740: nanviha nāsti praśno 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya iti, nāpi prativacanamasti prāṇādvāva bhūyo 'stīti, kathaṃ prāṇādadhi bhūmopadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6741: prāṇaviṣayameva cātivāditvāmuttaratrānukṛṣyamāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ- 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6747: yathaiṣo 'gnihotrī yaḥ satyaṃ vadatītyukte na satyavadanenāgnihotritvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:6750: tathā 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' ityukte na satyavadanenātivāditvam, kena tarhi, prakṛtena prāṇavijñānenaiva /
GSP33brssgo1u:6751: satyavadanaṃ tu prāṇavido viśeṣo vivakṣyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6759: prakṛtavyāvṛttyarthaśca tuśabdo na saṃgacchate 'eṣa tu vā ativadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6760: 'satyaṃ tveva vijijñāsitavyam' (chā. 7.16) iti ca prayatnāntarakaraṇamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6761: tasmādyathaikavedapraśaṃsāyāṃ prakṛtāyāmeṣa tu mahābrāhmaṇo yaścaturo vedānadhīta ityekavedebhyor'thāntarabhūtaścaturvedaḥ praśasyate tādṛgetaddraṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6765: tatra prāṇāntamanuśāsanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇībhūtaṃ nāradaṃ svayameva sanatkumāro vyutpādayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6766: yatprāṇavijñānena vikārānṛtaviṣayeṇātivāditvamanativāditvameva tat 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6769: tathā vyutpāditāya nāradāya 'so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ satyenātivadāni' ityevaṃ pravṛttāya vijñānādisādhanaparamparayā bhūmānamupadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6770: tatra yatprāṇādadhi satyaṃ vaktavyaṃ pratijñātaṃ tadeveha bhūmetyucyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6771: tasmādasti prāṇādadhi bhūmna upadeśa ityataḥ prāṇādanyaḥ paramātmā bhūmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6775: nacānyatra paramātmajñānācchokavinivṛttirasti, 'nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' (śve. 6.15) iti śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6782: prakaraṇānte paramātmavivakṣā bhaviṣyati, 'bhūmā tu prāṇa eveti cet' na /
GSP33brssgo1u:6783: 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti sve mahimni' (chā. 7.24.1) ityādinā bhūmna evā prakaraṇasamāpteranukarṣaṇāt
GSP33brssgo1u:6793: nālpe sukhamasti bhūmaiva sukham, tasmānniratiśayasukhārthinā bhūmaiva vicārya iti nāradaṃ prati sanatkumāreṇokte sati nārado brūte-bhūmānamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:6798: 'bahorlopo bhū ca bahoḥ'iti sūtreṇa bahoḥ parasyemanicpratyayasyāderikārasya lepaḥ syāt, bahoḥ sthāne bhūrityādeśaśca syādityukterbhūmanniti śabdo niṣpannaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6801: vākyopakramastha ātmāpi svapratipādanāpekṣo dharmitvena bhātīti saṃnihitavyavahitaprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6806: pūrvottarapakṣayoḥ prāṇopāstiḥ brahmajñānaṃ ca phalaṃ krameṇa mantavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:6808: bhūmā tu prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥprakṣaṃ vinaivoktaliṅgena prāṇādabhinna
GSP33brssgo1u:6810: prāṇādbhūya iti na dṛśyata iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6811: nanu 'eṣa tu vā ativadati'iti tuśabdena prāṇaprakaraṇavicchedānna prāṇo
GSP33brssgo1u:6813: nāmādyaśāntānupāsyānatītya prāṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vadatītyativādi prāṇavid taṃ prati ativādyasīti kenacitpraśne kṛte asmīti brūyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:6815: prāṇavidameṣa iti parāmṛśya satyavacanadhyānamananaśraddhādidharmaparamparāṃ vidhāya bhūmopadeśānna prakaraṇavicchedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6817: bhūmno lakṣaṇavacanaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇe praśnapūrvakaṃ yojayatikathaṃ punarityādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:6818: prāṇagrasteṣu prāṇe līneṣu na śṛṇoti suṣuptapuruṣa iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6819: 'gārhapatyo ha vā eṣo 'pāno vyāno 'nvāhāryapacana āhavanīyaḥ prāṇaḥ'iti
GSP33brssgo1u:6820: śruteḥ prāṇā agnaya iha pure śarīre jāgrati savyāpārā eva tiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6825: sarvaṃ samarpitamiti ca sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ prāṇaṃ svīkaroti śrutirityanvayaḥ ata ātmatvaṃ mukhyārthaṃ darśayati-saṃprasāda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6826: sa vā eṣa etasminsaṃprasāde sthitvā punarādravatīti prayogācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:6835: prakṛtaprāṇavitparāmarśaka eṣaśabdo na bhavati, tasya yacchabdaparatantratvena satyavādajivācitvāt
GSP33brssgo1u:6837: satyenātivāditvaṃ viśeṣaḥ, tadvato ya eṣa ityukterna pūrvānukarṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6838: ya eṣa prāṇavidativadatītyanūdya sa satyaṃ vadediti vidhānānna prāṇaprakaraṇaviccheda iti dṛṣṭāntena śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6839: satyaśabdo hyabādhite rūḍho brahmavācakaḥ, tadanyasya mithyātvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:6842: kiñca satyena brahmaṇātivadatīti tṛtīyāśrutyā brahmakaraṇakamativāditvaṃ śrutaṃ, tasya prakaraṇādbādho na yukta ityāha-śrutyā hītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6845: evaṃ satyeneti śrutyā prakaraṇaṃ bādhyamityuktvā tuśabdenāpi
GSP33brssgo1u:6851: yattu praśnaṃ vinoktatvaliṅgādbhūmā prāṇa iti, tanna,
GSP33brssgo1u:6853: praśnabhedādarthabheda iti na niyamaḥ, ekasyātmano maitreyyā bahuśaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:6861: imānyati śravaṇādīni jñeyasya satyasya brahmatve liṅgāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:6862: evaṃ śrutiliṅgaiḥ prāṇasyāvāntaraprakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā prastutaṃ satyaṃ brahma bhūmapadoktabahutvadharmītyāha-tatra yaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6863: kiñca 'saṃnihitādapi vyavahitaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ balīyaḥ'iti nyāyena saṃnihitaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ prāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vākyopakramastha ātmā svapratipādanāya
GSP33brssgo1u:6864: bhūmavākyāpekṣa iha bhūmā grāhya ityāha-evaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6865: kiñca śokasya pāramityupakramya tamasaḥ pāramityupasaṃhārāt, śokasya mūlocchedaṃ vinā taraṇāyogācca, śokapadena mūlatamo gṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:6868: nanvidaṃ caramaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brahmaparamastu, tataḥ prāgukto bhūmā prāṇa iti śaṅkate-prakaraṇānta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6873: apica ye bhūmni śrūyante dharmāste paramātmanyupapadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:6874: 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvajānāti sa bhūmā' iti darśanādivyavahārābhāvaṃ bhūmānyavagamayati
GSP33brssgo1u:6880: yadapi tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sukhamuktaṃ, tadapyātmana eva sukharūpatvavivakṣayoktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:6881: yata āha- 'eṣo 'sya parama ānanda etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni
GSP33brssgo1u:6883: ihāpi 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukhaṃ nālpe sukhamasti bhūmaiva sukham' iti sāmayasukhanirākaraṇena brahmaiva sukhaṃ bhūmānaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:6884: 'yo vai bhūmā tadamṛtam' ityamṛtatvamapīha śrūyamāṇaṃ paramakāraṇaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:6887: tathāca satyatvaṃ svamahimapratiṣṭhitatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ sarvāttmatvamiti caite dharmāḥ śrūyamāṇāḥ paramātmanyevopapadyante nānyatra /
GSP33brssgo1u:6894: yaduktaṃ bhūmno lakṣaṇaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇeṣu yojyamiti tadanūdya vighaṭayati-yo 'pyasāvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:6895: sati buddhyādyupādhāvātmano draṣṭṛtvādiḥ, tadabhāve suṣuptau tadabhāva
GSP33brssgo1u:6902: 'sa evādhastāt sa upariṣṭāt'iti sarvagatatvaṃ, 'sa evedaṃ sarvam'iti
GSP33brssgo1u:6903: sarvātmatvaṃ ca śrutaṃ, tasmādbhūmādhyāyo nirguṇe samanvita iti siddham //9//
GSP33brssgo1u:6910: sa hovācaitadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantyasthūlamanaṇu' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo1u:6912: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimakṣaraśabdena varṇa ucyate kiṃvā parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6913: tatrākṣarasamāmnāya ityādāvakṣaraśabdasya varṇe prasiddhatvāt prasiddhyatikramasya cāyuktatvāt 'oṅkāra evedaṃ sarvam' (chā. 2.23.3)
GSP33brssgo1u:6915: varṇa evākṣaraśabda iti, evaṃ prāpta ucyate- para evātmākṣaraśabdavācyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6918: tatra hi pṛthivyādeḥ samastavikārajātasya kālatrayavibhaktasya 'ākāśa eva tadotaṃ ca protaṃ ca' ityākāśe pratiṣṭhitatvamuktvā 'kasminnu khalvākāśa otaśca protaśca' ityanena praśnenedamakṣaramavatāritam tathācopasaṃhṛtam- 'etasminnu khalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśca' iti
GSP33brssgo1u:6920: yadapi 'oṅkāra evedaṃ sarvam' iti tadapi brahmapratipattisādhanatvātstutyarthaṃ draṣṭavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:6921: tasmānna kṣaratyaśnute ceti nityatvāvyāpitatvābhyāmakṣaraṃ parameva brahma
GSP33brssgo1u:6925: yadbhūtaṃ bhavacca bhaviṣyacca tatsarvaṃ kasminnotamiti gārgyā pṛṣṭhena muninā yājñavalkyenāvyākṛtākāśaḥ kāryamātrāśraya uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6926: ākāśaḥ kasminnota iti dvitīyapraśne sa muniruvāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:6929: yathā satyaśabdo brahmaṇi rūḍha iti brahma bhūmetyuktaṃ tathākṣaraśabdo varṇe rūḍha iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6930: tatra oṅkāropāstiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte nirguṇabrahmadhīriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6933: varṇasya oṅkārasya sarvāśrayatvaṃ kathamityāśaṅkya dhyānārthamidaṃ yathā śrutyantare sarvātmatvamityāha-oṅkāra iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6946: praśāsanaṃ hīha śrūyate- 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' (bṛ. 3.8.9) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:6949: na hyacetanānāṃ ghaṭādikāraṇānāṃ mṛdādīnāṃ ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ praśāsanamasti
GSP33brssgo1u:6954: bhūtākāśasya kāryantaḥpātinaḥ śrutasarvakāryāśrayatvāyogādavyākṛtamajñānamevākāśaḥ pradhānaśabdita iti tadāśrayatvāccākṣaraṃ na pradhānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:6966: etadakṣaraṃ gārgyadṛṣṭaṃ daṣṭraśrutaṃ śrotramataṃ mantravijñātaṃ vijñātṛ'
GSP33brssgo1u:6970: tathā 'nānyadato 'sti draṣṭṛ nānyadatosti śrotṛ nānyadato 'sti mantṛ nānyadato 'sti vijñātṛ' ityātmabhedapratiṣedhāt na śārīrasyāpyupādhimato
GSP33brssgo1u:6980: tarhi śodhito jīva evākṣaraṃ na para ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:6988: 'etadvai satyakāma paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkārastasmādvidvānetenaivāyatanenaikataramanveti iti prakṛtya śrūyate-
GSP33brssgo1u:6995: 'sa tejasi sūrye saṃpannaḥ'' 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' iti ca tadvido deśaparicchinnasya phalasyocyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7010: īkṣatestu tathābhūtameva vastu loke karma dṛṣṭamityataḥ paramātmaivāyaṃ samyagdarśanaviṣayabhūta īkṣatikarmatvena vyadiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7012: nanvabhidhyāne paraḥ puruṣa uktaḥ, īkṣaṇe tu parātparaḥ, kathamitara itaratra pratyabhijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7014: nacātra jīvanaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyate, yena tasmātparātparo 'yamīkṣitavyaḥ puruṣo 'nyaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7018: saindhavakhilyavadyaḥ paramātmano jīvarūpaḥ khilyabhāva upādhikṛtaḥ paraśca viṣayendriyebhyaḥ so 'tra jīvaghana iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7019: apara āha- 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' ityatītānantaravākyanirdiṣṭo yo brahmalokaḥ paraśca lokāntarebhyaḥ so 'trajīvaghana ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7020: jīvānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ sarvakaraṇātmani hiraṇyagarbhe brahmalokanivāsini saṃghātopapatterbhavati brahmaloko jīvaghanaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7021: tasmātparo yaḥ paramātmekṣaṇakarmabhūtaḥ sa evābhidhyāne 'pi karmabhūta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7022: paraṃ puruṣamiti ca viśeṣaṇaṃ paramātmaparigraha evāvakalpate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7023: paro hi puruṣaḥ paramātmaiva bhavati yasmātparaṃ kiñcidanyannāsti,
GSP33brssgo1u:7024: 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' iti ca śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7025: 'paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkāraḥ' iti ca vibhajyānantaramoṅkāreṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyātavyaṃ bruvanparameva brahmaparaṃ puruṣaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7026: 'yathā pādodarastvacā vinirmucyata evaṃ ha vai sa pāpmanā vinirmucyate'
GSP33brssgo1u:7028: atha yaduktaṃ paramātmābhidhyāyino na deśaparicchinnaphalaṃ yujyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7030: brahmalokaprāptiḥ krameṇa ca samyagdarśanotpattiriti kramamuktyabhiprāyametadbhaviṣyatītyadoṣaḥ FN: paraṃ nirviśeṣam, aparaṃ kāryaṃ, āyatanena prāptisādhanena, anveti prāpnoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7032: piṇḍaḥ sthūlo virāṭ tadapekṣayā sūtrasya paratvamti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7038: pippalādo guruḥ satyakāmena pṛṣṭo brūte, he satyakāma, paraṃ nirguṇamaparaṃ saguṇaṃ brahmaitadeva yo 'yaṃ oṅkāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7040: tasmātpraṇavaṃ brahmātmanā vidvānetenaiva oṅkāradhyānenāyatanena prāptisādhanena yathādhyānaṃ paramaparaṃ vānveti prāpnotīti prakṛtya madhye ekamātradvimātroṅkārayordhyānamuktvā bravīti-yaḥ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7042: yo hyakārādimātrātraye ekasyā mātrāyā akārasya ṛṣyādikaṃ jāgradādivibhūtiṃ ca jānāti tena samyagjñātā ekā mātrā yasyoṅkārasya sa ekamātraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7044: tamoṅkāraṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'bhidhyāyīta sa oṅkāravibhūtitvena dhyātaiḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7045: sāmabhiḥ sūryadvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā paramātmānaṃ puruṣamīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7048: pūrvatra pūrvapakṣatvenokte oṅkāre buddhisthaṃ dhyātavyaṃ niścīyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7049: yadvā pūrvatra varṇe rūḍhasyākṣaraśabdasya liṅgādbrahmaṇi vṛttiruktā,
GSP33brssgo1u:7050: tadvadatrāpi brahmalokaprāptiliṅgatparaśabdasya hiraṇyagarbhe vṛttiriti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tatrāparamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:7053: sūrye saṃpannaḥ praviṣṭaḥ nanu vasudāna īśvara iti dhyānādvindate vasvityalpamapi phalaṃ brahmopāsakasya śrutamityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7056: na cātra paraprāptirevokteti vācyaṃ, parasya sarvagatatvādatraiva prāptisaṃbhavena sūryadvārā gativaiyarthyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7059: piṇḍaḥ sthūlo virāṭ tadapekṣayā sūtrasya paratvamiti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7060: sūtre saśabda īśvarapara iti pratijñatatvena taṃ vyācaṣṭe-parameveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7061: sa upāsaka etasmādviraṇyagarbhātparaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmāhamitīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7063: nanvīkṣaṇaṃ pramātvādviṣayasatyatāmapekṣata iti bhavatu satyaḥ para īkṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7064: dhyātavyastvasatyo 'paraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-sa eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7065: śrutibhyāṃ pratyabhijñānātsa evāyamiti sautraḥ saśabdo vyākhyātaḥ atraivaṃ sūtrayojanā-oṅkāre yo dhyeyaḥ sa para evātmā, vākyaśeṣe īkṣaṇīyatvokteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7073: dhyānasya tatphalekṣaṇasya ca loke samānaviṣayatvāddhyeya evekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7076: saṃnihitataro brahmalokasvāmī parāmṛśyata iti praśnapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe-kastarhītyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:7079: khilyavadalpo bhāvaḥ paricchedo yasya sa khilyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7080: etatpadena brahmaloko vā parāmṛśyata ityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7082: vyaṣṭikaraṇābhimānināṃ jīvānāṃ ghanaḥ saṃghāto yasminsarvakaraṇābhimānini sa jīvaghanaḥ tatsvāmikatvātparaṃparāsaṃbandhena loko lakṣya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7084: parapuruṣaśabdasya paramātmani mukhyatvācca sa eva dhyeya
GSP33brssgo1u:7086: yasmātparaṃ nāparamasti kiñcit sa evaṃ mukhyaḥ paraḥ na tu piṇḍātparaḥ sūtrātmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7087: kiñca paraśabdenopakrame niścitaṃ paraṃ brahmaivātra vākyaśeṣe
GSP33brssgo1u:7091: oṅkāre parabrahmopāsanayā sūryadvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā parabrahmekṣitvā tadeva śāntamabhayaṃ paraṃ prāpnotītyavirodhamāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7092: evamekavākyatāsamarthanaprakaraṇānugṛhītaparapuruṣaśrutibhyāṃ parabrahmapratyabhijñayā brahmalokaprāptiliṅgaṃ bādhitvā vākyaṃ praṇavadhyeye brahmaṇi samanvitamiti siddham //13//
GSP33brssgo1u:7098: 'atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśastasminyadantastadanveṣṭavyaṃ tadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam' /
GSP33brssgo1u:7100: tatra yo 'yaṃ dahare hṛdayapuṇrīke dahara ākāśaḥ śrutaḥ sa kiṃ bhūtākāśo 'thavā vijñānātmā'thavā paramātmeti saṃśayyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7103: ākāśaśabdo hyayaṃ bhūtākāśe parasmiṃśca prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7104: tatra kiṃ bhūtākāśa eva daharaḥ syātkiṃvā para iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7105: tathā brahmapuramiti kiṃ jīvo 'tra brahmanāmā tasyedaṃ puraṃ śarīraṃ brahmapuramathavā parasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ brahmapuramiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7106: tatra jīvasya parasya vānyatarasya purasvāmino daharākāśatve saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7107: tatrākāśaśabdasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvādbhūtākāśa eva daharaśabda iti prāptam
GSP33brssgo1u:7109: 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśaḥ' iti ca bāhyāyantarabhāvakṛtabhedasyopamānopameyabhāvaḥ dyāvāpṛthivyādi ca
GSP33brssgo1u:7111: athavā jīvo dahara iti prāptam, brahmapuraśabdāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7115: nahi parasya brahmaṇaḥ śarīreṇa svasvāmibhāvaḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7116: tatra purasvāminaḥ puraikadeśe 'vasthānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā rājñaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7117: manaupādhikaśca jīvaḥ, manaśca prāyeṇa hṛdaye pratiṣṭhitamityato jīvasyaivedaṃ hṛdaye 'ntaravasthānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7122: ata uttaraṃ brūmaḥ- parameśvara evātra daharākāśo bhavitumarhati na bhūtākāśo jīvo vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7126: ityupakramya 'kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam'
GSP33brssgo1u:7128: 'sa brūyādyavānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite' (chā. 8.1.3) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7129: tatra puṇḍarīkadaharatvena prāptadaharatvasyākāśasya prasiddhākāśaupamyena daharatvaṃ nivartayanbhūtākāśatvaṃ daharasyākāśasya nivartayatīti gamyate
GSP33brssgo1u:7130: yadyapyākāśaśabdo bhūtākāśe rūḍhastathāpi tenaiva tasyopamā nopapadyata iti bhūtākāśaśaṅkā nivartitā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7134: apica kalpayitvāpi bhedamupamānopameyabhāvaṃ varṇayataḥ paricchinnatvādabhyantarākāśasya na bāhyākāśaparimāṇatvamupapadyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:7141: satyasaṃkalpaḥ' iti cātmatvāpahatapāpmatvādayaśca guṇā na bhūtākāśe saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7142: yadyapyātmaśabdo jīve saṃbhavati tathāpītarebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo jīvāśaṅkāpi nivartitā bhavati
GSP33brssgo1u:7143: nahyupādhiparicchinnasyārāgropamitasya jīvasya puṇḍarīkaveṣṭhanakṛtaṃ daharatvaṃ śakyaṃ nivartayitum
GSP33brssgo1u:7145: yadātmatayā jīvasya sarvagatatvādi vivakṣyeta tasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ sākṣātsarvagatatvādivivakṣyatāmiti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7146: yadapyuktaṃ brahmapuramiti jīvena parasyopalakṣitatvādrājña iva jīvasyaivedaṃ purasvāminaḥ puraikadeśavartitvamastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7147: atra brūmaḥ- parasyaivedaṃ brahmaṇaḥ puraṃ saccharīraṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7150: 'sa etasmājjīvaghanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣamīkṣate' (praṃ 5.5) 'sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣu puriśayaḥ' (bṛ. 2.5.18) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7152: yathā śālagrāme viṣṇaḥ saṃnihita iti tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:7153: 'tadyatheha karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyata evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate'
GSP33brssgo1u:7154: (chā. 8.1.6) iti ca karmaṇāmantavatphalamuktvā 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajatyetāṃśca satyānkāmānsteṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' iti prakṛtadaharākāśavijñānasyānantaphalatvaṃ vadanparamātmatvamasya sūcayati
GSP33brssgo1u:7156: śrutaṃ, paraviśeṣaṇatvenopādānāditi atra brūmaḥ- yadyākāśo nānveṣṭavyatvenoktaḥ syāt 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśaḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:7159: 'taṃ cedbrūyuryadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ kiṃ tadatra vidyate yadanveṣṭavyaṃ yadbhāva vijijñāsitavyam' ityākṣipya parihārāvasara ākāśaupamyopakrameṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:7162: evaṃ hi sati yadantaḥsamāhitaṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādi tadanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ cokta syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7165: dyāvāpṛthivyādisamādhānādhāramākāśamākṛṣya 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyetāṃśca satyānkāmān' iti samuccayārthena caśabdenātmānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7168: sahāntaḥsthaiḥ samāhitaiḥ pṛthivyādibhiḥ satyaiśca kāmairvijñeya ukta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7170: FN: brahmapuraṃ śarīraṃ, daharaṃ sūkṣmaṃ, puṇḍarīkaṃ tadākāratvātprakṛtaṃ hṛdayameva /
GSP33brssgo1u:7177: pūrṣu śarīreṣu, puri hṛdaye vā śete iti puruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7184: asmin yatprasiddhaṃ daharamalpaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ tasminhṛdaye yadantarākāśaśabditaṃ brahma tadanveṣṭavyaṃ vicārya jñeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7185: atrākāśo jijñāsyaḥ, tadantaḥsthaṃ veti prathamaṃ saṃśayaḥ kalpyaḥ /
