GSP33brssgo1u:7193: tathehāpyākāśapadasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvādbhūtākāśo dhyeya iti dṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brssgo1u:7195: daharavākyasyānantaraprajāpativākyasya ca saguṇe nirguṇe ca samanvayokteḥ śrutyādisaṃgatayaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7196: pūrvapakṣe bhūtākāśādyupāstiḥ, siddhānte saguṇabrahmopāstyā nirguṇadhīriti phalabhedaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7200: nanu bhūtākāśasyālpatvaṃ kathaṃ, ekasyopamānatvamupameyatvaṃ ca kathaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7204: hṛdayāpekṣayā alpatvaṃ, dhyānārthaṃ kalpitabhedātsādṛśyaṃ, svata ekatvātsarvāśrayatvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7205: nanu 'eṣa ātmā'ityātmaśabdo bhūte na yukta ityarūcerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7214: nanu jīvasyākāśapadārthatvamayuktamityāśaṅkya tarhi bhūtākāśa eva daharo
GSP33brssgo1u:7219: anveṣyatvādeḥ paraviśeṇatvena grahaṇāddarahasya brahmatve liṅgaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7222: tamācāryaṃ prati yadi brūyuḥ, hṛdayameva tāvadalpaṃ tatratyākāśo
GSP33brssgo1u:7223: 'lpataraḥ kiṃ tadatrālpe vidyate yadvicāryā jñeyamiti, tadā sa ācāryo
GSP33brssgo1u:7231: dṛṣṭeticet, na abhede sādṛśyasyānanvayena yuddhasya nirūpamatve tātparyādayamananvayālaṅkāra iti kāvyavidaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7237: kiñca hārdākāśasyāntaratvātyāge alpatvena vyāpakabāhyākāśasādṛśyaṃ na yuktamityāha-apiceti
GSP33brssgo1u:7239: nanu hārdākāśasyālpatvanivṛttau tāvattve ca tātparyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-ubhayeti
GSP33brssgo1u:7243: vigatā jighatsā jagdhumicchā yasya so 'yaṃ vijighatsaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7245: prathamaśrutabrahmaśabdena tatsāpekṣacaramaśrutaṣaṣṭhīvibhaktyarthaḥ saṃbandho neyaḥ, na tu brahmaṇaḥ puramiti ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ svasvāmibhāvo
GSP33brssgo1u:7246: grāhyaḥ 'nirapekṣeṇa tatsāpekṣaṃ bādhyam'iti nyāyādityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7247: śarīrasya brahmaṇa tadupalabdhisthānatvarūpe saṃbandhe mānamāha-sa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7248: pūrṣu śarīreṣu, puri hṛdaye śaya iti puruṣa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7249: nanu brahmaśabdasya jīve 'pyannādinā śarīravṛddhihetau mukhyatvānna ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ kathañcinneya ityata āha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7250: bṛṃhayati dehamiti brahma jīvaḥ tatsvāmike pure hṛdayaṃ brahmaveśma bhavatu, rājapure maitrasadbhavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7252: atha karmaphalādvaurāgyānantaramiha jīvadaśāyāmātmānaṃ daharaṃ tadāśritāṃśca satyakāmādiguṇān ācāryopadeśamanuvidya dhyānenānubhūya ye paralokaṃ gacchanti teṣāṃ sarvalokeṣvanantamaiśvaryaṃ svecchayā saṃcalanādikaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7253: dahare uktaliṅgānyanyathāsiddhāni teṣāṃ tadantaḥsthaguṇatvādiyuktaṃ smārayitvā dūṣayati-yadapītyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:7259: sarvanāmabhyāṃ daharākāśamākṛṣyātmatvādiguṇānuktvā guṇaiḥ saha tasyaiva dhyeyatvaṃ vākyaśeṣo brūte tadvirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7266: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca |
GSP33brssgo1u:7269: itaśca parameśvara eva daharaḥ, yasmāddaharavākyaśeṣe parameśvarasyaiva pratipādakau gatiśabdau bhavataḥ- 'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya
GSP33brssgo1u:7271: tatra prakṛtaṃ daharaṃ brahmalokaśabdenābhidhāya tadviṣayā gatiḥ prajāśabdavācyānāṃ jīvānāmabhidhīyamānā daharasya brahmatāṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7272: tathā hyaharaharjīvānāṃ suṣuptavasthāyāṃ brahmaviṣayaṃ gamanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7273: śrutyantare- 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) ityevamādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:7274: loke 'pi kila gāḍhaṃ suṣuptamācakṣate brahmībhūto brahmatāṃ gata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7275: tathā brahmalokaśabdo 'pi prakṛte dahare prayujyamāno jīvabhūtākāśaśaṅkāṃ nivartayanbrahmatāmasya gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7277: gamayedyadi brahmaṇo loka iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsavṛttyā vyutpādyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:7278: sāmānādhikaraṇavṛttyā tu vyutpādyamāno brahmaiva loko brahmaloka iti parameva brahma gamayiṣyati
GSP33brssgo1u:7279: etadeva cāhararbrahmalokagamanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brahmaśabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyavṛttiparigrahe liṅgam
GSP33brssgo1u:7280: nahyaharaharimāḥ prajāḥ kāryabrahmalokaṃ satyalokākhyaṃ gacchantīti śakyaṃ kalpayitum // 15
GSP33brssgo1u:7282: prajā jīvā etaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ daharaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ lokamaharahaḥ pratyahaṃ svāpe gacchantyastadātmanā sthitā apyanṛtājñānenāvṛtāstaṃ na jānanti ataḥ punaruttiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7283: nanvetatpadaparāmṛṣṭadaharasya svāpe jīvagamyatve 'pi brahmatve kimāyātamityaśaṅkya 'tathā hi dṛṣṭam'iti vyācaṣṭe-tathā hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7291: tatra niṣādānāṃ sthapatiḥ svāmīti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsena traivarṇiko grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7293: na tu niṣādaścāsau sthapatiriti karmadhārayeṇa niṣādo grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7295: niṣāda eva sthapatiḥ syāt, niṣādaśabdasya niṣāde śaktatvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:7296: tasyāśrutaṣaṣṭhyarthasaṃbandhalakṣakatvalpanāyogāt śrutadvitīyāvibhakteḥ pūrvapadasaṃbandhakalpanāyāṃ lāghavāt, ato niṣādasyeṣṭisāmarthyamātraṃ kalpyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7306: tasminsarvasamādhānamuktvā tāṃ sminneva cātmaśabdaṃ prayujyāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇayogaṃ copaduśya
GSP33brssgo1u:7312: evamiha prakṛte dahare vidhāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ mahimānaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7313: ayaṃ ca mahimā parameśvara eva śrutyantarādupalabhyate 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' ityādeḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7314: tathānyatrāpi niścite parameśvaravākye śrūyate- 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya' iti
GSP33brssgo1u:7315: evaṃ dhṛteśca hetoḥ parameśvara evāyaṃ daharaḥ // 16 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7318: nanvathaśabdāddaharaprakaraṇaṃ vicchidya śrutā dhṛtirna daharaliṅgamiti śaṅkate-kathamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:7321: sūtre tu mahimaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyāddhṛtiśabdaḥ ktinnanto vidhāraṇaṃ brūte, 'striyāṃ ktin'iti bhāve ktino vidhānāditi vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7325: dhṛteśca daharaḥ paraḥ asya dhṛtirūpasya niyamanasya ca mahimno 'sminparamātmanyeva śrutyantara upalabdheriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7334: 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā' (chā. 8.1.4), 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni
GSP33brssgo1u:7336: jīve tu na kvacidākāśaśabdaḥ prayujyamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7337: bhūtākāśastu satyāmapyākāśaśabdaprasiddhāvupamānopameyabhāvādyasaṃbhavānna grahītavya ityuktam FN: ā samāntātkāśate dīpyata ityākāśaḥ svayañjyotirīśvaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7338: ā samantātkāśate dīpyata iti svayañjyotiṣi brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya vibhutvaguṇato vā prasiddhiḥ prayogaprācuryam //17//
GSP33brssgo1u:7342: yadi vākyaśeṣabalena dahara iti parameśvaraḥ parigṛhyetāstītarasyāpi jīvasya vākyaśeṣe parāmarśaḥ - 'atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo
GSP33brssgo1u:7343: 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirūpasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca' (chā. 8.3.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7344: atra hi saṃprasādaśabdaḥ śrutyantare suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ dṛṣṭatvāttadavasthāvantaṃ jīvaṃ śaknotyupasthāpayituṃ nārthāntaram /
GSP33brssgo1u:7350: tasmāditaraparāmarśāt 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśa' ityatra sa eva jīva ucyate iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:7358: FN: samyakprasīdatyasmiñjīvo viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanitaṃ kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti suṣuptiḥ saṃprasādo jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7365: ya eṣa saṃprasādo jīvo 'smātkāryakaraṇasaṃghātātsamyagutthāya ātmānaṃ tasmādvivicya viviktamātmānaṃ svena brahmarūpeṇābhiniṣpadya sākṣātkṛtya
GSP33brssgo1u:7367: yathā mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitīti vākyaṃ suptvā mukhaṃ vyādatte iti vyākhyāyate tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:7372: nanu kvāpyākāśaśabdo jīve na dṛṣṭa ityāśaṅkyoktāvasthotthānaliṅgabalātkalpya ityāha-yathā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7373: niyāmakābhāvājjīvo daharaḥ kiṃ na syāditi prāpte
GSP33brssgo1u:7384: athedānīṃ mṛtasyevāmṛtasekātpunaḥ samutthānaṃ jīvāśaṅkāyāḥ kriyate uttarasmātprajāpatyādvākyāt
GSP33brssgo1u:7385: tatrahi 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā' ityapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānamanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca pratijñāya 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmā'
GSP33brssgo1u:7387: 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi' (chā. 8.9.3) iti ca tameva punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśya 'ya eṣa svapne mahīyamānaścaratyeṣa ātmā' (chā. 8.10.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:7388: iti 'tadyatraitatsuptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyeṣa ātmā'
GSP33brssgo1u:7391: nāhaṃ khalvayamevaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti no evemāni
GSP33brssgo1u:7393: tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi no evānyatraitasmāt iti copakramya śarīrasaṃbandhanindāpūrvakaṃ 'eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ' iti jīvameva śarīrātsamutthitamuttamapuruṣaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7395: ataḥ 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' iti jīva evokta iti cetkaścidbrūyāt, taṃ prati brūyāt- 'āvirbhūtasvarūpastu' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7402: etaduktaṃ bhavati- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi ityakṣilakṣitaṃ draṣṭāraṃ nirdiśyodaśarāvabrāhmaṇenainaṃ śarīrātmatāyā vyutthāpya 'etaṃ tveva te'
GSP33brssgo1u:7404: 'paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' iti yadasya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ paraṃ brahma tadrūpatayainaṃ jīvaṃ vyācaṣṭe na jaivena rūpeṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:7406: taccāpahatapāpmatvādidharmakaṃ, tadeva ca jīvasya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ 'tattvamasi' ityādiśāstrebhyaḥ, netaradupādhikalpitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7407: yāvadeva hi sthāṇāviva puruṣabuddhiṃ dvaitalakṣaṇāmavidyāṃ nivartayankūṭasthanityadṛksvarūpamātmānamahaṃ brahmāsmīti na pratipadyate tāvajjīvasya jīvatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7408: yadā tu dehendriyamanobuddhisaṃghātādvyutthāpya śrutyā pratibodhyate, nāsi tvaṃ dehendriyamanobuddhisaṃghātaḥ, nāsi saṃsārī, kiṃ tarhi tadyatsatyaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7409: sa ātmā caitanyamātrasvarūpastattvamasīti, tadā kūcasthanityadṛksvarūpamātmānaṃ pratibudadhyāsmāccharīrādyabhimānātsamuttiṣṭhansa eva kūṭasthanityadṛksvarūpa ātmā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7410: 'sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' (muṇḍa. 3.2.1)
GSP33brssgo1u:7412: tadeva cāsya pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ yena śarīrātsamutthāya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7413: kathaṃ punaḥ svaṃ ca rūpaṃ svenaiva niṣpadyata iti saṃbhavati kūṭasthanityasya suvarṇādīnāṃ tu dravyāntarasaṃparkādabhibhūtasvarūpāṇāmanabhivyaktāsādhāraṇaviśeṣāṇāṃ kṣāraprakṣepādibhiḥ śodhyamānānāṃ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7415: natu tathātmacaitanyajyotiṣo nityasya kenacidabhibhavaḥ saṃbhavatyasaṃsargitvādvyomna iva, dṛṣṭavirodhācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:7417: tacca śarīrādasamutthitasyāpi jīvasya sadā niṣpannameva dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7418: sarvo hi jīvaḥ paśyanśṛṇvanmanvāno vijānanvyavaharatyanyathā vyavahārānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7420: ataḥ kimātmakamidaṃ śarīrātsamutthānaṃ, kimātmikā vā svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7423: yathā śuddhasya sphaṭikasya svācchyaṃ śauklyaṃ ca svarūpaṃ prāgvivekagrahaṇādraktanīlādyupādhibhiraviviktamiva bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7424: pramāṇajanitavivekagrahaṇāttu parācīnaḥ sphaṭikaḥ svācchyena śauklyena ca svenarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata ityucyate prāgapi tathaiva san /
GSP33brssgo1u:7425: tathā dehādyupādhyaviviktasyaiva sato jīvasya śrutikṛtaṃ vivekavijñānaṃ śarīrātsamutthānaṃ vivekavijñānaphalaṃ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ kevalātmasvarūpāvagatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7428: kaunteya na karoti na lipyate' (gī.13.31) iti ca saśarīratvāśarīratvaviśeṣābhāvasmaraṇāt
GSP33brssgo1u:7431: evaṃ mithyājñānakṛta eva jīvaparameśvarayorbhedo na vastukṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7436: yo 'kṣiṇi prasiddho draṣṭā draṣṭṛtvena vibhāvyate so 'mṛtābhayalakṣaṇādbrahmaṇo 'nyaścetsyāttato
GSP33brssgo1u:7440: tathā dvitīye 'pi paryāye 'ya eṣaḥ svapne mahīyamānaścarati' iti na prathamaparyāyanirdiṣṭādakṣipuruṣāddraṣṭuranyo nirdiṣṭaḥ, 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi' ityupakramāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:7441: kiñcāhamadya svapne hastinamadrākṣaṃ nedānīṃ taṃ paśyāmīti dṛṣṭameva pratibuddhaḥ pratyācaṣṭe
GSP33brssgo1u:7442: draṣṭāraṃ tu tameva pratyabhijānāti ya evāhaṃ svapnamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhaṃ jāgaritaṃ paśyamīti
GSP33brssgo1u:7443: tathā tṛtīye 'pi paryāye 'nahi khalvayamevaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti no evemāni bhūtāni iti suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7445: yattu tatra 'vināśamevāpīto bhavati' iti tadapi viśeṣavijñānavināśābhiprāyameva na vijñātṛvināśābhiprāyam
GSP33brssgo1u:7447: tathā caturthe 'pi paryāye 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmi no
GSP33brssgo1u:7448: evānyatraitasmāt' ityupakramya 'maghavanmartyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram' ityādinā prapañcena śarīrādupādhisaṃbandhapratyākhyānena saṃprasādaśabdoditaṃ jīvaṃ 'svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' iti brahmasvarūpāpannaṃ darśayanna
GSP33brssgo1u:7450: kecittu paramātmavivakṣāyāṃ 'etaṃ tveva te' iti jīvākarṣaṇamanyāyyaṃ manyamānā etameva vākyopakramasūcitamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānaṃ te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmīti kalpayanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7453: 'etaṃ tveva te' iti ca pratijñāya prākcaturthātparyāyādanyamanyaṃ vyācakṣāṇasya prajāpateḥ pratārakatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:7454: tasmādyadavidyāpratyupasthāpitapāramārthikaṃ jaivaṃ rūpaṃ kartṛbhoktṛrāgadveṣādidoṣakaluṣitamanekānarthayogi tadvilayanena tadviparītamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ svarūpaṃ vidyayā
GSP33brssgo1u:7456: apare tu vādinaḥ pāramārthikameva jaivaṃ rūpamiti manyante 'smadīyāśca
GSP33brssgo1u:7459: eka eva parameśvaraḥ kūṭasthanityo vijñānadhāturavidyayā māyayā māyāvivadanekadhā vibhāvyate nānyo vijñānadhāturastīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7462: tatrāyamabhiprāyaḥ - nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāve kūṭasthanitye ekasminnasaṅge paramātmani tadviparītaṃ jaivaṃ rūpaṃ vyomnīva
GSP33brssgo1u:7465: jīvasya tu na parasmādanyatvaṃ pratipipādayiṣati kiṃ tvanuvadatyevāvidyākalpitaṃ lokaprasiddhaṃ jīvabhedam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7466: evaṃ hi svābhāvikakartṛtvabhoktṛtvānuvādena pravṛttāḥ karmavidhayo na virudhyanta iti manyate
GSP33brssgo1u:7468: vāmadevavat' (bra. 1.1.30) ityādināvarṇiścāsmābhirvidvadbhedena karmavidhivirodhaparihāraḥ FN: mahīyamāno vāsanāmayairviṣayaiḥ pūjyamāna iti svapnaparyāye,
GSP33brssgo1u:7469: tadyatreti suṣuptiparyāye ca jīvameva prajāpatirvyācaṣṭa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7472: udaśarāveti udakapūrṇe śarāve pratibimbātmānaṃ dehaṃ svasyājñātaṃ yattanmahyaṃ vācyamityuktaḥ śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7480: ayaṃ suṣuptaḥ, saṃprati suṣuptau, ahaṃ ātmānaṃ ahaṅkārāspadamātmānaṃ na jānāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7490: yadyapyupakrame jīvaśabdo nāsti tathāpyapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānamupakramya tasya jāgradādyavasthātrayopanyāsādavasthāliṅgena jīvaniścayāttasyaiva te guṇāḥ saṃbhavantīti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7494: mahīyamānaḥ vāsanāmayairviṣayaiḥ pūjyamāna iti svapnaparyāye, yadyatreti suṣuptiparyāye ca jīvameva prajāpatirvyācaṣṭa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7495: tatra kāle tadetatsvapanaṃ yathā syāttathā suptaḥ, samyak asto nirastaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7496: karaṇagrāmo yasya sa samastaḥ, ata evopahṛtakaraṇatvāttatkṛtakāluṣyahīnaḥ saṃprasannaḥ, svapnaṃ prapañcamajñānamātratvena vilāpayati ato 'jñānasattvāt muktādvilakṣaṇaḥ prājña eṣa svacaitanyena kāraṇaśarīrasākṣī tasya sākṣyasya sattāsphūrtipradatvādātmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7497: caturthaparyāye brahmoktestasyaivāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇā ityāśaṅkya tasyāpi paryāyasya jīvatvamāha-nāheti
GSP33brssgo1u:7499: khidyamāno hīndra uvāca, na khalu suptaḥ pumānayaṃ saṃprati suṣuptyavasthāyāmayaṃ devadatto 'hamityevamātmānaṃ jānāti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7500: no eva naivemāni bhūtāni jānāti kintu vināśameva prāpto bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:7501: nāhamatra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti doṣamupalabhya punaḥ prajāpatimupasasāra /
GSP33brssgo1u:7503: etasmātprakṛtādātmano 'nyatrānyaṃ na vyākhyāsyāmītyupakramya 'maghavanmartyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram'iti nindāpūrvakaṃ jīvameva darśayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7508: tarhi sūtre puṃliṅgena jīvoktiḥ kathaṃ, jñānena jīvatvasya nivṛttatvādityata āha-bhūtapūrveti
GSP33brssgo1u:7509: jñānātpūrvamavidyātatkāryapratibimbitatvarūpaṃ jīvatvamabhūditi kṛtvā jñānānantaraṃ brahmarūpo 'pi jīvanāmnocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7514: pratyuvāca, udaśarāva ātmānamavekṣya yadātmano rūpaṃ na vijānīthastanme
GSP33brssgo1u:7516: udakapūrṇe śarāve pratibimbātmānaṃ dehaṃ dṛṣṭvā svasyājñātaṃ yattanmahyaṃ vācyamityuktaśrutyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7520: jīvatvarūpeṇa jīvaṃ na vyācaṣṭe lokasiddhatvāt kintu tamanūdya parasparavyabhicāriṇībhyo 'vasthābhyo vivicya brahmasvarūpaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33brssgo1u:7521: ato yadbrahma tadevāpahatapāpmatvādidharmakaṃ na jīva ityuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:7529: avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ jīvatvaṃ, vākyotthaprabhodhāttannivṛttau tannivṛttirityāvidyakaṃ tadityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7534: manaḥsaṅgino hi kriyayā malanāśādabhivyaktirna tu kūṭasthasyāsaṅgina
GSP33brssgo1u:7542: taccaitanyaṃ cakṣurādijanyavṛttivyaktaṃ dṛṣṭyādipadavācyaṃ sat vyavahārāṅgaṃ jīvasya svarūpaṃ bhavatīti tasyābhibhūtatve dṛṣṭo vyavahāro virudhyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:7547: svarūpaṃ cejjñānina eva vyañjyeta jñānātpūrvaṃ vyavahārocchittirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7559: saśarīratvasya satyatvātsamutthānamutkrāntiriti vyākhyeyaṃ na viveka ityāśaṅkyāha-tathā viveketi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7563: nanu svakarmārjite śarīre bhogasyāparihāryatvātkathaṃ jīvata eva svarūpāvirbhāva ityata āha-śarīrastho 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7573: etadbhedasya satyatvameva nāstīti kuta ityanvayaḥ chāyāyāṃ brahmadṛṣṭiparamidaṃ vākyaṃ nābhedaparamityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7574: yasya jñānātkṛtakṛtyatā sarvakāmaprāptistamātmānamanvicchāva iti pravṛttayorindravirocanayoryadyanātmacchāyāṃ prajāpatirbrūyāttadā mṛṣāvādi syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7575: prathamavat dvitīyādiparyāye vyāvṛttāsvavasthāsu unusyūtātmā brahmatvenokta ityāha-tatheti
GSP33brssgo1u:7587: tava tu upakrāntaparamātmanaścaturtha evoktestadbāda ityāha-bhūya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7593: ye tu saṃsāraṃ satyamicchanti teṣāmidaṃ śārīrakamevottaramityāha-apare
GSP33brssgo1u:7598: brahmaivāvidyayā saṃsarati na tato 'nyo jīva iti śārīrakārtha ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7599: tarhi sūtrakāraḥ kimiti bhedaṃ brūte, tatrāha-yasttviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7609: advaitamajānataḥ kalpitadvaitāśrayā vidhayo na viduṣa iti sarvamupapannamityarthaḥ //19//
GSP33brssgo1u:7613: atha yo daharavākyaśeṣe jīvaparāmarśo darśitaḥ - 'atha ya eṣa saṃprasādaḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:7614: (chā. 8.3.4) ityādi, sa dahare parameśvare vyākhyāyamāne na jīvopāsanopadeśo na prakṛtaviśeṣopadeśa ityarthakatvaṃ prāpnotīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7615: ata āha- anyārtho 'yaṃ jīvaparāmarśau na jīvasvarūpaparyavasāyī kiṃ tarhi parameśvarasvarūpaparyavasāyī
GSP33brssgo1u:7617: saṃprasādaśabdodito jīvo jāgaritavyavahāre dehendriyapañjarādhyakṣo bhūtvā tadvāsanānirmitāṃśca svapnānnāḍīcaro 'nubhūya śrāntaḥ śaraṇaṃ prepsurubhayarūpādapi śarīrābhimānātsamutthāya suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ paraṃ jyotirākāśaśabditaṃ paraṃ brahmopasaṃpadya viśeṣavijñānavattvaṃ ca
GSP33brssgo1u:7619: yadasyopasaṃpattavyaṃ paraṃ jyotiryena svena rūpeṇāyamabhiniṣpadyate sa eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇa upāsya ityevamartho 'yaṃ jīvaparāmarśaḥ parameśvaravādino 'pyupapadyate // 20 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7620: evaṃ prajāpativākye jīvānuvādena brahmaṇa evāpahatapāpmatvādyukterjīve tadasaṃbhavānna jīvo dahara ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7628: yadapyuktam, 'daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' ityākāśasyālpatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ parameśvare nopapadyate, jīvasya tvārāgropanimitasyālpatvamavakalpata iti
GSP33brssgo1u:7630: ukto hyasya parihāraḥ parameśvarasyāpekṣikamalpatvamavakalpata iti 'arbhakaukastvāttadvyapadeśācca neti cenna nicāyyatvādevaṃ vyomavacca'
GSP33brssgo1u:7637: evaṃ daharavākyaṃ prajāpativākyaṃ ca saguṇe nirguṇe ca samanvitamiti siddham //21//
GSP33brssgo1u:7642: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yamāgniḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7643: tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' (mu. 2.210)
GSP33brssgo1u:7645: yatra yaṃ bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ yasya ca bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti sa kiṃ tejodhātuḥ kaściduta prājña ātmeti vicikitsāyāṃ tejodhāturiti tāvatprāptam
GSP33brssgo1u:7647: tejaḥsvabhāvakaṃ hi candratārakādi tejaḥsvabhāvaka eva suryo bhāsamāne
GSP33brssgo1u:7649: tathā saha sūryeṇa sarvamidaṃ candratārakādi yasminna bhāsate so 'pi
GSP33brssgo1u:7654: tasmāttejodhātuḥ kaścidityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prājña evātmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7663: samatvācca tejodhātūnāṃ sūryādīnāṃ na tejodhātumanyaṃ pratyapekṣāsti yaṃ bhāntamanubhāyuḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7668: yathā sutapto 'yaḥpiṇḍo 'gnyanukṛtiragniṃ dahantamanudahati, bhaumaṃ vā rajo vāyuṃ vahantamanuvahantīti
GSP33brssgo1u:7670: tasya ceti caturthaṃ pādamasya ślokasya sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7671: 'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti tadhetukaṃ bhānaṃ sūryāderucyamānaṃ prājñamātmānaṃ gamayati
GSP33brssgo1u:7673: tejontareṇa suryāditejo vibhātītyaprasiddhaṃ viruddhaṃ ca, tejontareṇa tejontarasya pratidhātāt
GSP33brssgo1u:7674: athavā na sūryādīnameva ślokaparipaṭhitānāmidaṃ taddhetukaṃ vibhānamucyate
GSP33brssgo1u:7675: kiṃ tarhi 'sarvamidam' ityaviśeṣaśruteḥ sarvasyaivāsya nāmarūpakriyākārakaphalajātasya yābhivyaktiḥ sā brahmajyotiḥsattānimittā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7677: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti ca tatraśabdamāharanprakṛtagrahaṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:7680: anantaraṃ ca 'hiraṇmaye pare kośe virajaṃ brahma niṣphalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7682: kathaṃ tajjyotiṣāṃ jyotirityata idamutthitam-'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7684: tatra tu sa eva tejodhāturanyo na saṃbhavatītyupapāditam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7686: yato yadupalabhante tatsarvaṃ brahmaṇaiva jyotiṣopalabhyate, brahma tu nānyena jyotiṣopalabhyate svayaṃ jyotiḥsvarūpatvāt, yena sūryādayastasminbhāyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7690: FN: tatra tārakāntarāṇi candrādi ca na bhāti taṃ na bhāsayatīti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:7697: tasmin brahmaṇi viṣaye na bhāti, taṃ na bhāsayatīti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:7698: yadā candrabhāskarādirna bhāsayati tadā alpadīpteragneḥ kā
GSP33brssgo1u:7702: tatreti saptamyāḥ sati viṣaye ca sādhāraṇyātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7704: tathehāpi satisaptamībalādvartamānārthatyāgena yasminsati sūryādayo na bhāsyanti sa tejoviśeṣa upāsya iti bhaviṣyadarthe vṛttirāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7705: adhunā bhāsamāne sūryādau na bhātīti virodhāditi dṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brssgo1u:7710: yasminsati yanna bhāti tadanu tadbhātīti viruddhamityata
GSP33brssgo1u:7713: mukhyasaṃbhave vivakṣānupapatteḥ mukhyānubhānaliṅgātsarvabhāsakaḥ paramātmā svaprakāśako 'tra grāhya iti siddhāntamāha-prājña iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7719: yo 'yamanukaroti sa tajjātīya iti niyamo nāstītyāha-nāyamekānta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7729: tatreti sarvanāmaśrutyā prakṛtaṃ brahma grāhyamityāha-na tatra sūrya iti
GSP33brssgo1u:7732: hiraṇmaye jyotirmaye annamayādyapekṣayā pare kośe ānandamayākhye pucchaśabditaṃ brahma virajaṃ āgantukamalaśūnyaṃ, niṣkalaṃ niravayavaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:7735: sūryādyabhibhāvakatejodhātau prāmāṇike tasyeha grahaṇaśaṅkā syāt, na tatra pramāṇamastītyāha-tatreti
GSP33brssgo1u:7737: satisaptamīpakṣe na bhātīti śrutaṃ vartamānatvaṃ tyaktvā tasminsati na bhāsyantītyaśrutabhaviṣyattvaṃ kalpanīyaṃ pratyakṣavirodhanirāsāya /
GSP33brssgo1u:7738: viṣayasaptamīpakṣe tu na bhāsayatītyaśrutaṇijadhyāhāramātraṃ kalpyaṃ na śrutatyāga iti lāghavaṃ, ato brahmaṇi viṣaye sūryāderbhāsakatvaniṣedhena brahmabhāsyatvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7739: yenānyābhāsyatvena hetunā sūryādayastasminbrahmaṇi viṣaye bhāsakāḥ syustathā tu brahmānyena nopalabhyate svaprakāśatvāditi yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7747: tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅ ko na pāvakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7748: yadgatvā na nivartante taddhāma paramaṃ mama' (15.6) iti, 'yadādityagataṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7750: yaccandramasi yaccāgnau tattejo viddhi māmakam' (15.12) iti ca // 23 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7760: 'aṅguṣṭamātraḥ puruṣaḥ madhya ātmani tiṣṭhati' iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7762: īśāno bhūtabhavyasya sa evādya sa u śva etadvai tat' (kā. 2.4.13) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:7763: tatra yo 'yamaṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣaḥ śrūyate sa kiṃ vijñānātmā kiṃvā
GSP33brssgo1u:7772: nahi parameśvaro balādyamena niṣkraṣṭuṃ śakyastena tatra saṃsāryaṅguṣṭhamātro niścitaḥ sa evehāpītyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ -
GSP33brssgo1u:7779: anyatra bhūtācca bhavyācca yattatpaśyasi tadvada' (kā. 1.2.14) iti śabdādevetyabhidhānaśrutereveśāna iti parameśvaro 'yaṃ gamyata ityarthaḥ // 24 //
GSP33brssgo1u:7780: kathaṃ punaḥ sarvagatasya paramātmanaḥ parimāṇopadeśa ityatra brūmaḥ -
GSP33brssgo1u:7790: yo 'ṅguṣṭhamātro jīvaḥ sa vastuto nirdhūmajyotirvannirmalaprakāśarūpa iti tamarthaṃ saṃśodhya tasya brahmatvamāha-īśāna iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7795: yathānubhānādiliṅgāt ṇijadhyāhareṇa sūryādyagocaro brahmetyuktaṃ tathā prathamaśrutaparimāṇaliṅgājjīvapratītāvīśāno 'smīti dhyāyediti vidhyadhyāhareṇa dhyānaparaṃ vākyamiti pūrvapakṣayati-tatra parimāṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7796: pūrvapakṣe brahmadṛṣṭyā jīvopāstiḥ, siddhānte tu pratyagbrahmaikyajñānaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7806: bhūtabhavyasvetyupapadādbādhakābhāvācca īśāna itīśatvaśabdānniraṅkuśamīśitā bhātīti śrutyā liṅgaṃ bādhyāmiti siddhāntayati-paramātmaiveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7816: na cānyaḥ paramātmana iha grahaṇamarhatīśānaśabdādibhya ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7817: nanu pratiprāṇibhedaṃ hṛdayānāmanavasthitatvādapekṣamapyaṅguṣṭhamātratvaṃ nopapadyata ityata uttaramucyate- manuṣyādhikāratvāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7823: iti, tatpratyucyate- 'sa ātmā tattvamasi' ityādivatsaṃsāriṇa eva sato
GSP33brssgo1u:7825: dvirūpā hi vedāntavākyānāṃ pravṛttiḥ, kvacitparamātmasvarūpanirūpaṇaparā kvacidvijñānātmanaḥ paramātmaikatvopadeśaparā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7827: etamevārthaṃ pareṇa sphuṭīkariṣyati- 'aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo 'ntarātmā sadā janānāṃ hṛdaye saṃniviṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7832: 'śūdro yajñe 'navakḷptaḥ' iti paryudāsāt, upanīyata, tamadhyāpayīta, iti śūdrādhikāravāraṇam
GSP33brssgo1u:7836: mukhyāṅguṣṭhamātro jīvo gṛhyatāṃ kiṃ gauṇagrahaṇenetyata āha-na cānya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7838: atra tu śrutivirodhādasaṃbhava iti gauṇagraha ityartha /
GSP33brssgo1u:7845: arthitvādityanena niṣkāmānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ cādhikāro vāritaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7846: tatra mumukṣūṇāṃ śudyarthitve nityādiṣvadhikāro na kāmyeṣu /
GSP33brssgo1u:7847: śuddhacittānāṃ mokṣārthitve śravaṇādiṣu vyañjakeṣvadhikāro na karmasviti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7853: 'svargakāmo yajeta'ityādiśāstrasyāviśeṣaṇa sarvānphalārthinaḥ prati pravṛttatvāt, prāṇimātrasya sukhārthitvācca phalārthe karmaṇi paśvādīnāmapyadhikāra ityāśaṅkyoktarityāteṣāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:7854: śaktatvādyabhāvātsvargakāmapadaṃ manuṣyaparatayā saṃkocya manuṣyādhikāratve sthāpite caturvarṇyādhikāritvamāśaṅkya
GSP33brssgo1u:7860: saṃprati tacchabdenāṅguṣṭhamātraṃ jīvamanūdyāyamīśāna iti brahmābhedo bodhya iti vaktumanuvadati-yadapīti
GSP33brssgo1u:7867: dvividhetyādibhāṣyāttu jīvamuddiśya brahmatvabodhanamiti pratīyata iti sūtrārthāsparśitvādbhāṣyamanupapannamiti cet, na,
GSP33brssgo1u:7870: tatrāvāntaratātparyamupāsye brahmaṇi, mahātātparyaṃ ca jñeye brahmaṇi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7872: ata evopāsanāphalaṃ kaṭhavallyāmeva-'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya
GSP33brssgo1u:7874: ata eva caturthādhyāye dvitīyacaraṇe 'tadokaḥ'iti sūtre hārdavidyāṃ prakṛtya samāmananti iti bhāṣyakāraiḥ prathamavākyasya upāsye brahmaṇi tātparyamiti prakaṭīkṛtam /
GSP33brssgo1u:7879: taṃ jīvaṃ pravṛhetpṛthakkuryāt, dhairyeṇa balavadindriyanigrahādinā, taṃ viviktamātmānaṃ śuklaṃ svaprakāśamamṛtaṃ kūṭasthaṃ brahma
GSP33brssgo1u:7891: teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāmupariṣṭādye devādayastānapyadhikaroti śāstramiti bādarāyaṇa ācāryo manyante
GSP33brssgo1u:7896: tathā sāmarthyamapi teṣāṃ saṃbhavati, mantrārthavādetihāsapurāṇalokebhyo vigrahavattvādyavagamāt
GSP33brssgo1u:7900: apicaiṣāṃ vidyāgrahaṇārthaṃ brahmacaryādi darśayati- 'ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavānprajāpatau brahmacaryamuvāsa' (chā. 8.11.3), 'bhṛgurvai
GSP33brssgo1u:7911: FN: devānāṃ karmasu nādhikāraḥ, devatāntarāṇāmuddeśyānāmabhāvāditi prathamasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7918: atra manuṣyādhikāratvoktyā smṛtānāṃ devādināṃ vedāntaśravaṇādāvadhikāro 'sti na veti saṃdehe bhogāsaktānāṃ vairāgyādyasaṃbhavānneti prāpte
GSP33brssgo1u:7921: atra pūrvapakṣe devādināṃ jñānānadhikārāddevatvaprāptidvārā kramamuktiphalāsu daharādyupāsanāsu kramamuktyarthināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapravṛttiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tu pravṛttiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7922: upāsanābhirdevatvaṃ prāptānāṃ śravaṇādinā jñānānmuktisaṃbhavāditi saphalo 'yaṃ vicāraḥ nanu bhogāsaktānāṃ teṣāṃ mokṣārthitvābhāvānnādhikāra ityata āha-arthitvaṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:7923: vikāratvenānṛtaviṣayasukhasya kṣayāsūyādidoṣaddaṣṭyā niratiśayasukhamokṣārthitvaṃ sattvaprakṛtīnāṃ devānāṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7924: nanvindrāya svāhetyādau caturthyantaśabdātiriktā vigrahavatī devatā nāsti, śabdasya cāsāmarthyānnādhikāra ityata āha--tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7928: nanu vigrahavattvena dṛṣṭasāmarthye satyapyupanayanābhāvācchāstrīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāstītyata āha-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7929: janmāntarādhyayanabalātsvayameva pratibhātāḥ smṛtā vedā yeṣāṃ te tathā tadbhāvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:7930: bālādiṣu praviṣṭapiśācādīnāṃ vedodghoṣadarśanāddevayonīnāṃ janmāntarasmaraṇamastīti smṛtavedāntānāmarthavicāro yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7931: devānāmṛṣīṇāṃ ca vidyādhikāre kāraṇamarthitvādikamuktvā śrautaṃ gurukulavāsādiliṅgamāha-apiceti
GSP33brssgo1u:7940: 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇām'itivākyabādho 'pyanumānasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7943: ataḥ śrutiṣu teṣāṃ nādhikāra ityata āha-devādyadhikāre 'pīti //26//
GSP33brssgo1u:7947: syādetat, yadi vigrahavattvādyabhyupagamena devādīnāṃ vidyāsvadhikāro varṇyeta vigrahavattvādṛtvigādindrādīnāmapi svarūpasaṃnidhānena karmāṅgabhāvo 'bhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:7958: tathāhi-'kati devāḥ' ityupakramya 'trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca
GSP33brssgo1u:7959: sahasrā' iti nirucya 'katama te' ityasyāṃ pṛcchāyām 'mahimāna evaiṣāmete trayastriṃśattveva devāḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.1,2) iti nirbruvatī śrutirekaikasya
GSP33brssgo1u:7961: tathā trayastriṃśato 'pi ṣaḍādyantarbhāvakrameṇa 'katama eko deva iti
GSP33brssgo1u:7962: prāṇaḥ' iti prāṇaikarūpatāṃ devānāṃ darśayantī tasyaikasya prāṇasya
GSP33brssgo1u:7964: tathā smṛtirapi- 'ātmano vai śarīrāṇi bahūni bharatarṣabha //
GSP33brssgo1u:7965: yogī kuryādbalaṃ prāpya taiśca sarvairmahīṃ caret //
GSP33brssgo1u:7970: anekarūpapratipattisaṃbhavāccaikaikā devatā bahubhī rūpairātmānaṃ pravibhajya bahuṣu yāgeṣu yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gacchatīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7973: kvacideko 'pi vigrahavānanekatra yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ na gacchati, yathā bahubhirbhojayadbhirnaiko brāhmaṇo yugapadbhojyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7974: kvaciccaiko 'pi vigrahavānanekatra yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gacchati, yathā bahubhirnamaskurvāṇaireko brāhmaṇo yugapannamaskriyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:7975: tadvadihoddeśaparityāgātmakatvādyāgasya vigrahavatīmapyekāṃ devatāmuddiśya bahavaḥ svaṃ svaṃ dravyaṃ yugapatparityakṣyantīti vigrahavattve 'pi
GSP33brssgo1u:7978: vaiśvadevaśāstrasya hi nividi kati devā ityupakramya śākalyāya yājñavalkyena trayaścettyuttaram
GSP33brssgo1u:7982: prākamyaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca tatra kāmāvasāyitā' ityaṇimādyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7984: nanu mantrādīnāṃ pratīyamānavigrahavattve tātparyaṃ kalpayitvā devādīnāmadhikāra uktaḥ, sa cāyuktaḥ, anyaparāṇāṃ teṣāṃ pratyakṣādivirodhena svārthe tātparyakalpanānupapatterityākṣipya
GSP33brssgo1u:7988: abhyupagame pratyakṣeṇa devatā dṛśyeta, naca dṛśyate, ato yogyānupalabdhyā devatāyā vigrahavatyā abhāvātsaṃpradānakārakābhāvena karmaniṣpattirna syādityāha-tadā ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:7989: vigrahasyāṅgatvamupalabdhibādhitaṃ yuktyā ca na saṃbhavatītyāha-na ceti
GSP33brssgo1u:7990: tasmādarthopahitaśabda eva devatā, tasyā acetanatvānna vidyādhikāra iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:7993: ato na karmaṇi virodha iti vyācaṣṭe-kasmādityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:7994: vaiśvadevaśastre śasyamānadevāḥ katīti śākalyena pṛṣṭo yājñavalkyo nividā 'trayaśca'ityādirūpayottaraṃ dadau /
GSP33brssgo1u:7996: ṣaḍadhikāni trīṇi śatāni trīṇi sahasrāṇīti saṃkhyoktau
GSP33brssgo1u:7997: saṃkhyeyasvarūpapraśne, mahimāno vibhūtayaḥ sarve devā eṣāṃ trayastriṃśaddevānāmato 'ṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityā indraḥ prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśadevāste 'pi
GSP33brssgo1u:7999: ṣaṭ devāstriṣu lokeṣu trayaśca dvayorannaprāṇayordvai ca ekasminprāṇe hiraṇyagarbhe 'ntarbhavata iti darśitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8001: darśanaṃ śrautaṃ vyākhyāya smārtaṃ vyācaṣṭe-tathā smṛtiriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8015: tasya loke darśanāditi vaktuṃ vyatirekamāha-kvacideka iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8019: śabda iti cen nātaḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām |
GSP33brssgo1u:8020: mā nāma vigrahavattve devādīnāmabhyupagamyamāne karmaṇi kaścidvirodhaḥ prasañji /
GSP33brssgo1u:8023: autpattikaṃ hi śabdasyārthena saṃbandhamāśritya 'anapekṣatvāt' iti vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ sthāpitam
GSP33brssgo1u:8024: idānīṃ tu vigrahavatī devatābhyupagamyamānā yadyapyaiśvaryayogādyugapadanekakarmasaṃbandhīni havīṃṣi bhuñjīta tathāpi vigrahayogādasmadādivajjananamaraṇavatī seti nityasya śabdasya nityenārthena nitye saṃbandhepratīyamāne yadvaidike śabde prāmāṇyaṃ sthitaṃ tasya virodhaḥ syāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:8029: nanu janmādyasya yataḥ (bra. 1.1.2) ityatra brahmaprabhavatvaṃ jagato
GSP33brssgo1u:8031: apica yadi nāma vaidikācchabdādasya prabhavo 'bhyupagataḥ, kathametāvatā virodhaḥ śabde parihṛtaḥ yāvatā vasavo rudrā ādityā viśvedevā maruta
GSP33brssgo1u:8033: tadanityatve ca tadvācināṃ vaidikānāṃ vasvādiśabdānāmanityatvaṃ kena nivāryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8034: prasiddhaṃ hi loke devadattasya putra utpanne yajñadatta iti tasya nāma kriyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8047: tataśca yo yastattatsthānamadhirohati sa sa indrādiśabdairabhidhīyata iti na doṣo bhavati
GSP33brssgo1u:8049: kathaṃ tarhi sthite vācakātmanā nitye śabde nityārthasaṃbandhini śabdavyavahārayogyārthavyaktiniṣpattirataḥ prabhava ityucyate kathaṃ punaravagamyate śabdātprabhavati jagaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:8054: 'ete iti vai prajāpatirdevānasṛjatāsṛgramiti manuṣyānindava iti pitṛṃstiraḥ pavitramiti grahānāśava iti stotraṃ viśvānīti
GSP33brssgo1u:8056: tathānyatrāpi 'sa manasā vācaṃ mithunaṃ samabhavat' (bṛ. 1.2.4) ityādinā tatratatra śabdapūrvikā sṛṣṭiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8058: ādau vedamayī divyā yataḥ sarvā pravṛttayaḥ' // iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8060: utsargo 'pyayaṃ vācaḥ saṃpradāyapravartanātmako draṣṭavyaḥ, anādinidhanāyā anyādṛśasyotsargasyāsaṃbhavāt
GSP33brssgo1u:8061: tathā 'nāma rūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravartanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8064: ' sarveṣāṃ tu sa nāmāni karmāṇi ca pṛthakpṛthak /
GSP33brssgo1u:8067: apica cikīrṣitamarthamanutiṣṭhaṃstasya vācakaṃ śabdaṃ pūrvaṃ smṛtvā paścāttamarthamanuṣṭhatīti sarveṣāṃ naḥ pratyakṣametat /
GSP33brssgo1u:8068: tathā prajāpaterapi sraṣṭuḥ sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ vaidikāḥ śabdā manasi prādurbabhūvuḥ, paścāttadanugatānarthānsasarjeti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8070: ityevamādikā bhūrādiśabdebhya eva manasi prādurbhūtebhyo bhūrādilokānsṛṣṭāndarśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8073: varṇapakṣe hi teṣāmutpannapradhvaṃsitvānnityebhyaḥ śabdebhyo devādivyaktīnāṃ prabhava ityanupapannaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8076: tathāhi- adṛśyamāno 'pi puruṣaviśeṣo 'dhyayanadhvaniśravaṇādeva viśeṣato nirdhāryate devadatto 'yamadhīte yajñadatto 'yamadhīte iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8087: kāryapratyāyitaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ sahito 'ntyo varṇorthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyatīti cet
GSP33brssgo1u:8091: sa caicaikavarṇapratyayāhitasaṃskārabīje 'ntyavarṇapratyayajanitapari pāke pratyayinyekapratyayaviṣayatayā jhaṭiti pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8097: varṇā eva tu na śabdaḥ iti bhagavānupavarṣaḥ.
GSP33brssgo1u:8106: yadi hi pratyuccāraṇaṃ gavādivyaktivadanyā anyā varṇavyaktayaḥ pratīyeraṃstata ākṛtinimittaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8109: dvirgośabda uccārita iti hi pratipattirna tu dvau gośabdāviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8110: nanu varṇā apyuccāraṇabhedena bhinnaḥ pratīyante devadattayajñadattayoradhyayanadhvaniśravaṇādeva bhedapratīterityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8115: tadvaraṃ varṇavyaktiṣveva paropādhiko bhedapratyayaḥ svarūpanimittaṃ ca pratyabhijñānamiti kalpanālāghavam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8116: eṣa eva ca varṇaviṣayasya bhedapratyayasya bādhakaḥ pratyayo yatpratyabhijñānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8117: kathaṃ hyekasminkālaṃ bahūnāmuccārayatāmeka eva sangakāro yugapadanekarūpaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8119: athavā dhvanikṛto 'yaṃ pratyayabhedo na varṇakṛta ityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8123: tannibandhanāścodāttādayo viśeṣā na varṇasvarūpanibandhanāḥ, varṇānāṃ pratyuccārāṇaṃ pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt
GSP33brssgo1u:8125: itaradhā hi varṇānāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānānāṃ nirbhedatvātsaṃyogavibhāgakṛtā udāttādiviśeṣāḥ kalperan /
GSP33brssgo1u:8126: saṃyogavibhāgānāṃ cāpratyakṣatvācca tadāśrayā viśeṣā varṇeṣvadhyavasituṃ śakyanta ityato nirālambanā evaita udāttādipratyayāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8127: apica naivaitadabhiniveṣṭavyamudāttādibhedena varṇānāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānānāṃ bhedo bhavediti
GSP33brssgo1u:8132: ekaikavarṇagrahaṇāhitasaṃskārāyāṃ buddhau jhaṭiti pratyava ūbhāsanāditi cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:8137: yato 'syāmapi buddhau gakārādayo varṇā anuvartante natu dakārādayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8138: yadi hyasyā buddhergakārādibhyor'thāntaraṃ sphoṭo viṣayaḥ syāttato
GSP33brssgo1u:8143: tatpratibrūmaḥ - saṃbhavatyanekasyāpyekabuddhiviṣayatvaṃ, paṅ ktirvanaṃ senā daśa śataṃ sahasramityādidarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8144: yā tu gaurityeko 'yaṃ śabda iti buddhiḥ, sā bahuṣveva varṇeṣvekārthāvacchedanibandhanaupacārikī vanasenādibuddhivadeva /
GSP33brssgo1u:8145: atrāha- yadi varṇā eva sāmastyenaikabuddhiviṣayatāmāpadyamānāḥ padaṃ syustato jārā rājā kapiḥ pikaḥ ityādiṣu padaviśeṣapratipattirna syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8146: ta eva hi varṇā itaratra cetaratra ca pratyavabhāsanta iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8147: atra vadāmaḥ - satyapi samastavarṇapratyavamarśe yathā kramānurodhinya eva pipīlikāḥ paṅ ktibuddhimārohanti, evaṃ kramānurodhana eva varṇāḥ padabuddhimārokṣyanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8149: vṛddhavyavahāre ceme varṇāḥ kramādyanugṛhītā gṛhītārthaviśeṣasaṃbandhāḥ santaḥ svavyavahāro 'pyekaikavarṇagrahaṇānantaraṃ samastapratyavamarśinyāṃ buddhau tādṛśā eva pratyavabhāsamānāstaṃ tamarthamavyabhicāreṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:8152: varṇāśceme krameṇa gṛhyamāṇāḥ sphoṭaṃ vyañjayanti sa sphoṭor'thaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8153: vyanaktīti garīyasī kalpanā syāt, athāpi nāma pratyuccāraṇamanye 'nye
GSP33brssgo1u:8154: varṇāḥ syuḥ, tathāpi pratyabhijñālambanabhāvena varṇasāmānyānāmavaśyābhyupagantavyatvādyā varṇeṣvarthapratipādanaprakriyā racitā sā sāmānyeṣu saṃcārayitavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8155: tataśca nityebhyaḥ śabdebhyo devādivyaktīnāṃ prabhava ityaviruddham // 28
GSP33brssgo1u:8157: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ cikīrṣitāṃ vyakti buddhāvālikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanaṃ, tadidaṃ tatprabhavatvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8162: tatra saṃnihitavācakaitacchabdo devānāṃ karaṇeṣvanugrāhakatvena saṃnihitānāṃ smārakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8165: pavitraṃ somaṃ svāntavistaraskurvatāṃ grahāṇāṃ tiraḥpavitraśabdaḥ smārakaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8166: ṛ.(?).ucośnuvatāṃ stotrāṇāmāśuśabdaḥ stotrānantaraṃ prayogaṃ viśatāṃ śastrāṇāṃ viśvaśabdaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8170: sphuṭate varṇairvyajyata iti sphoṭo varṇābhivyaṅgyor'thastasya vyañjako gavādiśabdo nityastamabhipretyedamucyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8172: ekaiketi yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo gakārādyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte tasmin antyavarṇakṛtapratyayena janitaḥ paripāko 'ntyaḥ saṃskāro yasminpratyayini citte ekaṃ gauriti padamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā
GSP33brssgo1u:8174: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktam, bhedadhīvirodhāt
GSP33brssgo1u:8178: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8180: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8192: autpattikasūtre śabdārthayoranādyoḥ saṃbandhasyānāditvādvedasya svārthe mānāntarānapekṣatvena prāmāṇyamuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8193: idānīmanityavigrahavyaktyabhyupagame tatsaṃbandhasyāpyanityatvānmānāntareṇa vyaktiṃ jñātvā śabdasya saṃketaḥ puṃsā kartavya iti mānāntarāpekṣatvātprāmāṇyasya virodhaḥ syādityāha-kathamityādinā kiṃ śabdānāmanityatayā saṃbandhasya kāryatvamāpadyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:8199: śabdasya nimittatvena brahmasahakāritvādavirodha ityāśaṅkya dvitīyaṃ kalpamutthāpayati-apiceti
GSP33brssgo1u:8204: nityaḥ syāditi vācyaṃ, ubhayāśritasaṃbandhasyānyatarābhāve sthityayogena dṛṣṭāntāsidveriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8205: yathā gotvādayo gavādiśabdavācyāstathā vasutvādyākṛtayo vasvādiśabdārthā na vyaktya iti pariharati-netyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:8206: śabdānāṃ tadarthānāṃ jātīnāṃ ca nityatvāttatsaṃbandho 'pi nitya iti pratipādayati-nahītyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:8208: naca gotvāvacchedena vyaktiṣu śaktiḥ sugraheti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8209: sāmānyasyāpratyāsattitvena sarvavyaktyupasthityabhāvāt, gotvaṃ śakyatāvacchedakamiti grahāpekṣayā gotvaṃ śakyamiti lāghavāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:8211: yadvā kevala vyaktiṣu śaktiratra nirasyate, anupapattijñānaṃ, vinaiva vyakteḥ śabdaśaktyāyattajātijñānaviṣayatvenobhayaśakterāvaśyakatvāt
GSP33brssgo1u:8214: ata eva vākyavṛttau tattvamasyādivākye bhāgalakṣaṇoktā yujyate,
GSP33brssgo1u:8217: kevalavyaktivacanāḥ khalu ḍitthādiśabdā arthānantarabhāvinaḥ sāṃketikāḥ gavādiśabdāstu vyaktiprabhavahetutvena prāgevasandhīti na vyaktimātravacanāḥ sāṃketikāḥ kintu sthūlasūkṣmabhāvenānusyūtavyaktyavinābhūtasāmānyavacanā iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8221: nanu kā sā vyaktiḥ, yadanugatendratvādijātiḥ śabdārthaḥ syādityata
GSP33brssgo1u:8234: asṛgrudhiraṃ tatpradhāne dehe ramanta iti asṛgrā manuṣyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8236: pavitraṃ somaṃ svāntastiraskurvatāṃ grahāṇāṃ tiraḥ pavitraśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8241: sa prajāpatirmanasā vācaṃ trayīṃ mithunaṃ samabhavat manovāgrūpaṃ mithunaṃ saṃbhāvitavān /
GSP33brssgo1u:8246: yā prajāpatisṛṣṭiḥ sā śabdapūrvikā, sṛṣṭitvāt, pratyakṣaghaṭādivaditi
GSP33brssgo1u:8250: tatra varṇānāmanityatvātsphoṭasya cāsattvānna jagaddhetutvamityākṣepe dvitīyapakṣaṃ vaiyākaraṇo gṛhṇāti-sphoṭamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8251: sphuṭyate varṇairvyajyata iti sphoṭovarṇābhivyaṅgyor'thastasya vyañjako gavādiśabdo nityastamabhipretyedamucyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8255: tāratvamandratvādiviruddhadharmavattvena tāro gakāro mandro gakāra iti pratīyamānagakārasya bhedānumānātpratyabhijñāgatvajātiviṣayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8256: nanu viruddhadharmajñānaṃ dhvanyupādhikaṃ bhrama ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8257: tathāca varṇānāmanityatvānna jagaddhetutvamiti bhāvaḥ kiñca teṣāmarthabodhakatvāyogātsphoṭo 'ṅgīkārya ityāha-naca varṇebhya ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8260: tarhi varṇānāṃ samudāyo bodhaka ityāśaṅkya kṣaṇikānāṃ sa
GSP33brssgo1u:8262: varṇānāṃ svataḥ sāhityābhāve 'pi saṃskāralakṣaṇāpūrvadvārā sāhityamāgneyādiyāgānāmiveti śaṅkate-pūrveti
GSP33brssgo1u:8263: kimayaṃ saṃskāro varṇairjanito 'pūrvākhyaḥ kaścit, uta varṇānubhavajanito bhāvanākhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8269: dvitīye kiṃ pratyakṣeṇa jñāta uta kāryaliṅgena /
GSP33brssgo1u:8272: kāryamarthadhīstasyāṃ jātāyāṃ saṃskārapratyayaḥ tasmiñjāte seti parasparāśrayeṇa dūṣayati-neti
GSP33brssgo1u:8273: padārthasmaraṇasyāpi padajñānāntarabhāvitvāttena saṃskārasahitāntyavarṇātmakapadasya jñānaṃ na yuktamityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8277: na cāntyavarṇasāhityādarthadhīhetutvaṃ, kevalasaṃskārasya tu varṇasmṛtihetutvamiti vācyaṃ, arthadhīpūrvakāle bhāvanāyā jñānābhāvenārthadhīhetutvāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8283: yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo gakāradyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte tasmin antyavarṇakṛtapratyayena janitaḥ paripāko 'ntyaḥ saṃskāroyasmiṃstasminpratyayini citte ekaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8286: nacaikasmādvarṇātsamyak sphoṭābhivyaktiḥ, yena varṇāntaravaiyarthyaṃ kintu ratnavadbahupratyayasaṃskṛte citte samyaksphoṭābhivyaktirityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8295: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8297: sa evāyaṃ varṇa iti dhīstu pramaiva, bādhakābhāvādityāha-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8301: yattvayā pītaṃ jalaṃ tadeva mayā pītamityādau /
GSP33brssgo1u:8302: na tatheha vyaktibhedaḥ siddha iti pariharati-na /
GSP33brssgo1u:8311: anantā gakārādivyaktayastāsu pratyabhijñānārthaṃ gatvādijātayastāsu codāttatvādibhedasyaupādhikatvamiti kalpanādvaraṃ varṇavyaktibhedamātrasyaupādhikatvakalpanamiti vyaktyānantyasya jātīnāṃ ca kalpanamayuktamityarthaḥ nanu bhedasya bādhakābhāvānnaupādhikatvamityata āha-eṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8315: nanu vāyusaṃyogāderatīndriyatvānna tadgatavaicitryasyodāttatvādervarṇeṣu pratyakṣāropaḥ saṃbhavatītyaruciṃ vadiṣyansvamatamāha-athaveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8324: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8325: anyathā vācike jape varṇeṣvavyakteṣu dhvanibuddhiḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:8326: dundubhyādidhvanau śabdatvamātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe ayamavyakto varṇa iti dhīḥ syāditi mantavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:8327: evaṃ dhvanyupādhikatve svamate guṇaṃ vadanvāyūpādhikatve pūrvoktāmaruciṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8332: evaṃ viruddhadharmakadhvanīnāṃ bhede 'pi na teṣvanugatā varṇā bhidyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8334: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8337: yadvā udāttatvādibhedaviśiṣṭatayā pratyabhijñāyamānatvādvarṇānāṃ bheda ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntena nirasyati-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8338: varṇānāṃ sthāyitvaṃ prasādhya teṣāmeva vācakatvaṃ vaktuṃ sphoṭaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8341: cakṣuṣā darpaṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau mukhavacchrotreṇa varṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau vinaiva hetvantaraṃ sphoṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityāha-jhaṭitīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8342: yasyāṃ saṃvidi yor'tho bhāsate sā tatra pramāṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8343: ekapadamiti buddhau varṇā eva sphuranti nātiriktasphoṭa iti na sā sphoṭe
GSP33brssgo1u:8346: nanu gopadabuddheḥ sphoṭo viṣayo gakārādīnāṃ tu vyañjakatvādanuvṛttirityata āha--yadi hīti
GSP33brssgo1u:8351: nanu tatraikadeśādirūpādhirasti, prakṛte ka upādhirityata āha--yā tviti
GSP33brssgo1u:8352: ekārthe śaktamekaṃ padaṃ, pradhānārtha ekasmin tātparyavadekaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8354: na caikapadatve jñāte ekārthajñānaṃ, asmiñjñāte tadityanyonyāśraya iti
GSP33brssgo1u:8359: nanu nityavibhūnāṃ varṇānāṃ kathaṃ kramaḥ kathaṃ vā
GSP33brssgo1u:8361: vyutpattidaśāyāmuccāraṇakrameṇopalabdhikramamupalabhyamānavarṇeṣvāropyaite varṇā etatkramaitatsaṃkhyāvanta etadarthaśaktā iti gṛhītāḥ santaḥ śrotuḥ pravṛttikāle tathaiva smṛtyārūḍhāḥ svasvārthaṃ bodhayantītyarthaḥ sthāyivarṇavādamupasaṃharati-varṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8365: sthirāṇi gatyādisāmānyāni kramaviśeṣavanti gṛhītasaṃgatikānyarthabodhakānīti kḷpteṣu sāmānyeṣu prakriyā saṃcārayitavyā na tvakḷptaḥ sphoṭaḥ kalpanīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8370: svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādibhiḥ sthite vedasya nityatve devādivyaktiprabhavābhyupagamena tasya virodhamāśaṅkya 'ataḥ prabhavāt'
GSP33brssgo1u:8371: iti parihṛtyedānīṃ tadeva vedanityatvaṃ sthitaṃ draḍhayati- ata eva ca
GSP33brssgo1u:8373: ata eva niyatākṛterdevāderjagato vedaśabdaprabhavatvādvedaśabde nityatvamapi pratyetavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:8374: tathāca mantravarṇaḥ - 'yajñena vācaḥ padavīyamāyāntāmanvavindannṛṣiṣu praviṣṭām (ṛ.sa. 10.71.3) iti sthitāmeva vācamanuvinnāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8377: FN: yajñena pūrvasukṛtena karmaṇā vāco vedasya padavīyaṃ mārgayogyatāṃ grahaṇayogyatāṃ āyannāptavantaḥ, tataḥstāṃ vācamṛṣiṣu praviṣṭāṃ vidyamānāṃ anvavindannanulabdhavanto yājñikā itiyāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:8381: pūrvatantrasiddhameva vedasya nityatvaṃ devādivyaktisṛṣṭau tadvācakaśabdasyāpi sṛṣṭerasiddhamityāśaṅkya nityākṛtivācakācchabdādvyaktijanmoktyā sāṃketikatvaṃ nirasya vedo
GSP33brssgo1u:8383: yajñena pūrvasukṛtena vāco vedasya lābhayogyatāṃ prāptāḥ santo yājñikāstāmṛṣiṣu sthitāṃ labdhavanta iti mantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8392: yadā tu khalu sakalaṃ trailokyaṃ parityaktanāmarūpaṃ nirlepaṃ pralīyate prabhavati cābhinavamiti śrutismṛtivādā vadanti tadā kathamavirodha iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8397: anādau ca saṃsāre yathā svāpaprabodhayoḥ pralayaprabhavaśravaṇe 'pi
GSP33brssgo1u:8398: pūrvaprabodhavaduktaprabodhe 'pi vyavahārānna kaścidvirodhaḥ, evaṃ kalpāntaraprabhavapralayayoriti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8399: svāpaprabodhayośca pralayaprabhavau śrūyete- 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na
GSP33brssgo1u:8400: kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati tadenaṃ vāksarvairnābhiḥ sahāpyeti cakṣuḥ sarvai rūpaiḥ sahāpyeti śrotraṃ sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ sahāpyeti manaḥ sarvairdhyānaiḥ sahāphayeti sa yadā pratibudhyate yathāgnerjjvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭherannevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇā yathātanaṃ vipratiṣṭante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokāḥ (kau. 3.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8405: satyapi sarvavyavahārocchedini mahāpralaye parameśvarānugrahādīśvarāṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ kalpāntaravyavahārānusaṃdhānopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8406: yadyapi prākṛtāḥ prāṇino na janmāntaravyavahāramanusamadadhānā dṛśyanta
GSP33brssgo1u:8408: tathāhi prāṇitvāviśeṣe 'pi manuṣyādistambaparyanteṣu jñānaiśvaryādipratibandhaḥ pareṇa pareṇa bhūyānbhavandṛśyate, tathā manuṣyādistambaparyanteṣu hiraṇyagarbhaparyanteṣu
GSP33brssgo1u:8409: jñānaiśvaryādyabhivyaktirapi pareṇa pareṇa bhūyasī bhavatītyetacchrutismṛtivādeṣvasakṛdanuśrūyamāṇaṃ na śakyaṃ vaditum /
GSP33brssgo1u:8410: tataścātītakalpānuṣṭhitaprakṛṣṭajñānakarmaṇāmīśvarāṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ vartamānakalpādau prādurbhavatāṃ parameśrānugṛhītānāṃ suptapratibuddhatvakalpāntaravyavahārānusaṃdhānopapattiḥ tathāca śrutiḥ - 'yo brahmaṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai /
GSP33brssgo1u:8411: taṃ ha devamātmabuddhiprakāśaṃ mumukṣurvai śaraṇamahaṃ prapadye' (śve,
GSP33brssgo1u:8416: śrutirapyṛṣijñānapūrvakameva mantreṇānuṣṭhānaṃ darśayati- 'yo havā aviditārṣeyacchandodaivatabrāhmaṇena mantreṇa yajayati vādhyāpayati vā
GSP33brssgo1u:8417: sthāṇuṃ vacrchati gartaṃ vā pratipadyate'' (sarvānu. pari.) ityupakramya tasmādetāni mantre mantre vidyāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8420: dṛṣṭānuśravikasukhaduḥkhaviṣayau ca rāgadveṣau bhavato na vilakṣaṇaviṣayāvityato dharmādharmaphalabhūtottarā sṛṣṭirniṣpadyamānā pūrvasṛṣṭisadṛśyeva niṣpadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8421: smṛtiśca bhavati- 'teṣāṃ ye yāni karmāṇi prāksṛṣṭyāṃ pratipedire /
GSP33brssgo1u:8422: tānyeva te prapadyante sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ //
GSP33brssgo1u:8434: ataśca sarvakalpānāṃ tulyavyavahāratvātkalpāntavyavahārānusaṃdhānakṣamatvācceśvarāṇāṃ samānanāmarūpā eva pratisargaṃ viśeṣāḥ prādurbhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8437: samānanāmarūpatāṃ ca śrutismṛtī darśayataḥ - 'sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat
GSP33brssgo1u:8438: divaṃ ca pṛthivī cāntarikṣamatho svaḥ' (ṛ.saṃ. 10. 190.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8439: yathā pūrvasminkalpe sūryācandramaḥprabhṛti jagatkḷptaṃ tathāsminnapi kalpe parameśvaro 'kalpayadityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8442: 3.1.4.1) iti nakṣatreṣṭividhau yo 'gnirniravapadyasmai vāgnaye niravapattayoḥ samānanāmarūpatāṃ darśayatītyevañjātīyakā śrutirihodāhartavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8446: dṛśyante tāni tānyeva tathā bhāvā yugādiṣu //
GSP33brssgo1u:8453: prāṇaḥ paramātmā tatra jīva ekībhavati enaṃ prāṇaṃ sa jīvaḥ tadaitīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8459: ṛgvedo daśamaṇḍalātmakaḥ maṇḍalānāṃ daśatayamātrāstīti tatra bhavā ṛco dāśatayyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8460: arṣeya ṛṣiyogaḥ, chando gāyatryādi, daivatagnyādi, brāhmaṇaṃ viniyogaḥ etānyaviditāni yasminmantre, sthāṇuṃ sthāvaraṃ, gartaṃ narakam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8474: vyavahārāvicchedājjñāyate ceti vedasyānapekṣatvena prāmāṇye na kaścidvirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8475: nirlepalaye tu saṃbandhanāśāt punaḥ sṛṣṭau kenacitpuṃsā saṃketaḥ kartavya iti puruṣabuddhisāpekṣatvena
GSP33brssgo1u:8478: tathāca saṃskārātmanā śabdārthatatsaṃbandhānāṃ satāmeva punaḥ sṛṣṭāvabhivyakternānityatvam
GSP33brssgo1u:8480: viṣamasṛṣṭau hi saṃketāpekṣā na tulyasṛṣṭāviti pariharati-tatredamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8483: nanvastvanādisaṃsāre saṃbandhasyānāditvaṃ tathāpi mahāpralayavyavadhānādasmaraṇe kathaṃ vedārthavyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8487: atha tadā suṣuptau prāṇe paramātmani jīva ekībhavati enaṃ prāṇaṃ sa jīvaḥ tadaitīti śeṣaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8491: svapnavatkalpitasyājñātasattvābhāvāt darśanaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ adarśanaṃ laya iti dṛṣṭisṛṣṭipakṣaḥ śrutyabhipreta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8496: iti yadyapi tathāpi na prākṛtavaditi yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8497: jñānādernikarṣavadutkarṣo 'pyaṅgīkāryaḥ, bādhābhāvāditi nyāyānugṛhītaśrutyādibhiḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaṃ bādhyamityāha-yathā
GSP33brssgo1u:8504: pūrvaṃ kalpādau sṛjati tasmai brahmaṇe prahiṇoti gamayati tasya buddhau vedānāvirbhāvayati yastaṃ devaṃ svātmākāraṃ mahāvākyotthabuddhau prakāśamānaṃ śaraṇaṃ paramamabhayasthānaṃ niḥśreyasarūpamahaṃ prapadya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8505: na kevalamekasyaiva jñānātiśayaḥ kintu bahūnāṃ śākhādraṣṭṛṇāmiti
GSP33brssgo1u:8511: ārṣeya ṛṣiyogaḥ, chando gāyatryādi, daivatamagnyādi, brāhmaṇaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8514: tathāca jñānādhikaiḥ kalpāntaritaṃ vedaṃ smṛtvā vyavahārasya pravartitatvādvedasyānāditvamanapekṣatvaṃ cāvirūddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8517: aihikāmuṣmikaviṣayasukharāgakṛtarmasya phalaṃ paśvādikaṃ dṛṣṭapaśvādisadṛśyamiti yuktaṃ, visadṛśe kāmābhāvena hetvabhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8525: karmaṇi vihitaniṣiddhatvākāreṇāpūrvaṃ, kriyātvena saṃskāraṃ ca janayanti
GSP33brssgo1u:8530: sa eva svabhāvaḥ prakṛtirvāsaneti ca gīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8531: evaṃ karmaṇāṃ sṛṣṭisādṛśyamuktvā svopādāne līnakāryasaṃskārarūpaśaktibalādapi sādṛśyamāha-pralīyamānamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:8534: avidyāyāṃ līnakāryātmakasaṃskārādanyāḥ śaktayo na kalpyāḥ manābhāvādrauravācca /
GSP33brssgo1u:8540: yathā suptotthitasya pūrvacakṣurjātīyameva cakṣurjāyate tacca pūrvarūpajātīyameva rūpaṃ gṛhṇāti na rasādikaṃ, evaṃ bhogya lokā
GSP33brssgo1u:8541: bhogāśrayāḥ prāṇinikāyā bhogahetukarmāṇi saṃskārabalātpūrvalokāditulyānyeveti niyama ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8550: bhāvidṛṣṭyā yajamāno 'gniḥ annādo 'ragnirahaṃ syāmiti kāmayitvā kṛttikānakṣatrābhimānidevāyāgnaye aṣṭasu kapāleṣu pacanīyaṃ havirniruptavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8554: evaṃ 'rudro vā akāmayata''viṣṇurvā akāmayata'ityatrāpi tathā vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8569: iha devādīnāmapi brahmavidyāyāmastyadhikāra iti yatpratijñātaṃ tatparyāvartyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8576: 'asau vā ādityo devamadhu' (chā. 3.1.1) ityatra manuṣyā ādityaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8579: punaścādityavyapāśrayāṇi pañca rohitādīnyamṛtānyupakramya vasavo rudrā ādityā marutaḥ sādhyāśca pañca devagaṇāḥ krameṇa tattatamṛtamupajīvantītyupadiśya 'sa ya etadevamamṛtaṃ veda vasūnāmevaiko bhūtvāgninaiva mukhenaitadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati' ityādinā vasvādyupajīvyānyamṛtāni vijānatāṃ vasvādimahimaprāptiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8582: 'tathā agniḥ pādo vāyuḥ pāda ādityaḥ pādo diśaḥ pādaḥ' (chā. 3.18.2),
GSP33brssgo1u:8584: ityādiṣu devatātmopāsaneṣu na teṣāmeva devatātmānamadhikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8588: FN: pañceti caturvedokarmāṇi praṇavaścati pañca kusumāni tebhyaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8589: somājyādidravyāṇi hutāni rohitādīni lohitaṃ, śuklaṃ, kṛṣṇaṃ, paraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8590: madhye kṣobhata iva, ityuktāni pañca rohitādīnyamṛtāni tattanmantrabhāgaiḥ prāgādyūrdhvāntapañcadigavasthitābhirādityaraśmināḍībhirmadhvaṣūpasthitacchidrarūpābhirādityamaṇḍalamānītāni yaśastejaindriyavīryānnātmanā pariṇatāni pañcadikṣu
GSP33brssgo1u:8595: dyulokākhyavaṃśadaṇḍe antarikṣarūpe madhvapūpe sthita ādityo devānāṃ modanānmadhviva madhvityāropya dhyānaṃ kāryam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8598: astu vasvādīnāṃ tatrādhikāra ityāśaṅkya teṣāmapi tatra dhyeyatvātprāpyatvācca na dhyātṛtvamityāha-punaśceti
GSP33brssgo1u:8599: caturvedoktakarmāṇi praṇavaśceti pañca kusumāni, tebhyaḥ somājyādidravyāṇi hutāni lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaparaḥ kṛṣṇagopyākhyāni pañcāmṛtāni tattanmantrabhāgaiḥ prāgādyūrdhvāntarapañcādigavasthitābhirādityaraśmināḍībhirmadhvapūpasthitacchidrarūpābhirādityamaṇḍalamānītāni yaśastejaindriyavīryānnātmanā pariṇatāni pañcadikṣu sthitairvasvādibhirūpajīvyānīti dhyāyato vasvādiprāptiruktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8601: ākāśabrahmaṇaścatvāraḥ pādāḥ, dvau karṇau, dve netre, dve nāsike, ekā vāgiti saptasvindriyeṣu śiraścamasatīrastheṣu saptarṣidhyānaṃ kāryamityāha-tathemāveveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8602: atha dakṣiṇaḥ karṇaḥ gautamaḥ, vāmo bhāradvājaḥ, evaṃ dakṣiṇanetranāsike viśvāmitravasiṣṭhau, vāme jamadagnikaśyapau, vāgatrirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8608: yadidaṃ jyotirmaṇḍalaṃ dyusthānamahorātrābhyāṃ bambhramajjagadavabhāsayati tasminnādityādayo devatāvacanāḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:8610: naca jyotirmaṇḍalasya hṛdayādinā vigraheṣu cetanayārthitvādinā vā yogo
GSP33brssgo1u:8617: pratyakṣādibhya eva hyavicāritaviśeṣebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ prasiddhyanartho lokātprasidhyatītyucyate
GSP33brssgo1u:8620: arthavādā api vidhinaikavākyatvātstutyarthāḥ santo na pārthagarthyena devādīnāṃ vigrahādisadbhāve kāraṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:8621: mantrā api śrutyādiviniyuktāḥ prayogasamavāyino 'bhidhānārthā na kasyacidarthasya pramāṇamityācakṣate
GSP33brssgo1u:8625: yamaṃ daṇḍahastaṃ, indraṃ vajrahastaṃ, likhantīti vigrahādipañcakasadbhāvādanadhikāradoṣo nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8628: kiñca vigrahābhāvāddevādīnāṃ na kvāpyadhikāra ityāha-jyotiṣi bhāvācceti
GSP33brssgo1u:8629: ādityaḥ sūryaścandraḥ śukro 'ṅgāraka ityādiśabdānāṃ jyotiḥpiṇḍeṣu prayogasya bhāvātsattvānna vigrahavāndevaḥ kaścidastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8640: loke 'pi yamaṃ daṇḍahastaṃ likhanti, indraṃ vajrahastamiti vigrahādipañcakasadbhāvādhanadhikāradoṣo nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8641: vigraho haviṣāṃ bhoga aiśvaryaṃ ca prasannatā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8647: vrīhyādivadprayogavidhigṛhītā mantrāḥ prayogasaṃbanddhābhidhānārthā nājñātavigrahādiparā iti mīmāṃsakā ācakṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8658: manuṣyāṇāmapi na sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ sarveṣu rājasūyādiṣvadhikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8660: brahmavidyāṃ ca prakṛtya bhavati darśanaṃ śrautaṃ devādyadhikārasya
GSP33brssgo1u:8661: sūcakam- 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8663: 'te hocurhanta tamātmānamanvicchāmo yamātmānamanviṣya sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmān' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8664: 'indro ha vai devānāmabhipravrāja virocana'surāṇām' (chā. 8.7.2) ityādi ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:8667: atra brūmaḥ jyotirādiviṣayā api ādityādayo devatāvacanāḥ śabdāścetanāvantamaiśvaryādyupetaṃ taṃ taṃ devatātmānaṃ samarpayanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:8669: asti hyaiśvaryayogāddevatānāṃ jyotirādyātmabhiścāvasthātuṃ yatheṣṭaṃ ca taṃ taṃ vigrahaṃ grahītuṃ sāmarthyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8671: 'medhātithiṃ ha kāṇvāyanamindro meṣo bhūtvā jahāra' (ṣaḍviṃśa. brā. 1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8673: smaryate ca- 'ādityaḥ puruṣo bhūtvā kuntīmupajagāma ha' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8679: atra brūmaḥ - pratyayāpratyayau hi sadbhāvāsadbhāvayoḥ kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8681: tathāhyanyārthamapi prasthitaḥ pathi patitaṃ tṛṇaparṇādyastītyeva pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8683: tatra hi tṛṇaparṇādiviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravṛttamasti yena tadastitvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8684: atra punarvidhyuddeśaikavākyabhāvena stutyarther'thavādena pārthagarthyena vṛttāntaviṣayā pravṛttiḥ śakyādhyavasātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:8685: nahi 'na surāṃ pibet' iti nañvati vākye
GSP33brssgo1u:8690: vidhyuddeśārthavādayostvarthavādasthāni padāni pṛthaganvayavṛttāntaviṣayaṃ pratipadyānantaraṃ kaimarthyavaśena kāmaṃ vidheḥ stāvakatvaṃ pratipadyante
GSP33brssgo1u:8691: yathāhi- 'vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ' ityatra vidhyuddeśavartināṃ vāyavyādipadānāṃ vidhinā saṃbandhaḥ, naivaṃ 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati'
GSP33brssgo1u:8693: nahi bhavati vāyurvā ālabheteti kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vā ālabhetetyādi /
GSP33brssgo1u:8694: vāyusvabhāvasaṃkīrtanena tvavāntaramanvayaṃ pratipadyaivaṃ viśiṣṭadaivatyamidaṃ karmeti vidhiṃ stuvanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8698: yatra tu tadubhayaṃ nāsti tatra kiṃ pramāṇāntarābhāvādguṇavādaḥ syādāhosvitpramāṇāntarāvirodhādvidyamānavāda iti pratītiśaraṇairvidyamānavāda āśrayaṇīyo na guṇavādaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8702: naca cetasyanārūḍhāyai tasyai tasyai devatāyai haviḥ pradātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8703: śrāvayati ca- 'yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ dhyāyedvaṣaṭkariṣyan'
GSP33brssgo1u:8706: tatra yādṛśaṃ mantrārthavādayorindrādīnāṃ svarūpamavagataṃ na tattādṛśaṃ śabdapramāṇakena pratyākhyatuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8707: itihāsapurāṇamapi vyākhyātena mārgeṇa saṃbhavanmantrārthavādamūlatvātprabhavati devatāvigrahādi sādhayitim /
GSP33brssgo1u:8710: tathāca vyāsādayo devādibhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavaharantīti smaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8711: yastu brūyādidānīntanānāmiva pūrveṣāmapi nāsti devādibhirvyavahartuṃ sāmarthyamiti sa jagadvaicitryaṃ pratiṣedhet /
GSP33brssgo1u:8712: idānīmiva ca nānyadapi sārvabhaumaḥ kṣatriyo 'stīti brūyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8718: yogo 'pyaṇimādyaiśvaryarprāptiphalaḥ smaryamāṇo na śakyate sāhasamātreṇa pratyākhyātum /
GSP33brssgo1u:8719: śrutiśca yogamāhātmyaṃ prakhyāpayati- 'pṛthivyaptejo 'nilakhe samutthite pañcātmake yogaguṇe pravṛtte /
GSP33brssgo1u:8720: na tasya rogo na jarā na mṛtyuḥ prāptasya yogāgnimayaṃ śarīram'' (śvaṃ.
GSP33brssgo1u:8722: ṛṣīṇāmapi mantrabrāhmaṇadarśināṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāsmadīyena sāmarthyenopamātuṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8724: lokaprasiddhirapi na sati saṃbhave nirālambanādhyavasātuṃ yuktā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8728: FN: yataḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvatrādhikāro na saṃbhavati tato na cāpodyetetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8736: brahmavidyā devādīnnādhikaroti, vidyātvāt, madhvādividyāvaditi uktaheturaprayojaka ityāha-yadyapīti
GSP33brssgo1u:8737: darśādikaṃ, na brāhmaṇamadhikaroti, karmatvāt, rājasūyādivaditi ābhāsasāmyaṃ vidyātvahetorāha-naceti
GSP33brssgo1u:8738: yatra yasyādhikāraḥ saṃbhavati sa tatrādhikārīti nyāyastulya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8739: yataḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvatrādhikāro na saṃbhavati tato na cāpodyetatyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8740: tadbrahma yo yo devādīnāṃ madhye pratyaktvenābudhyata sa tadbrahmābhavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8741: te ha devā ūcuranyonyaṃ, tata indravirocanau surāsurarājau prajāpatiṃ brahmavidyāpradaṃ jagmaturiti ca liṅgamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8742: kimatra brahmāmṛtamiti gandharvapraśne yājñavalkya uvāca tamiti mokṣadharmeṣu śrutaṃ devādīnāmadhikāraliṅgamityāha-smārtamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:8744: śāstrajñairgolakātiriktendriyāṇi svīkriyante, yathā jyotirādau sūryādiśabdaprayoge 'pi vigrahavaddevatā svīkāryā ityāha-jyotirādīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8751: muniṃ meṣo bhūtvā jahāreti jñāpanārthaṃ meṣa,
GSP33brssgo1u:8755: ādityādau ko jaḍabhāgaḥ kaścetanāṃśa iti, tatrāha-jyotirādestviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8756: mantrādikaṃ padaśaktyā bhāsamānavigrahādau svārthe na pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8758: anyaparādapi vākyādbādhābhāve svārtho grāhya ityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8760: tṛṇādau pratyayo 'sti vigrahādau sa nāstīti vaiṣamyaṃ śaṅkate-atrāheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8768: nañpadamekaṃ yadā surāṃ pibediti padābhyāmanveti tadā padaikavākyamekamevārthānubhavaṃ karoti natu padadvayaṃ pṛthaksurāpānaṃ bodhayati, tasya vidhau niṣedhānupapattervākyārthānubhavaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:8770: arthavādastu bhūtārthasaṃsargaṃ stutidvāraṃ bodhayanvidhinā vākyaikavākyatāṃ bhajata ityasti vigrahādyanubhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8776: yatra 'vajrahastaḥ purandaraḥ'ityādau mānāntarasaṃvādavisaṃvādau na stastatra bhūtārthavāda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8781: na cobhyaparatve vākyabhedaḥ, avāntarārthasya mahāvākyārthatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8783: nanu kleśātmake karmaṇi vidhiḥ phalaṃ vinānupapanna iti bhavatu 'yanna
GSP33brssgo1u:8785: vigrahaṃ vinā vidheḥ kānupapattiḥ, tāmāha-na hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8786: uddiśya tyāgānupapattyā cetasyāroho 'ṅgīkārya ityatra śrutimapyāha-yasyā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8789: kiñca karmaprakaraṇapāṭhādvigrahapramitiḥ prayājavatkarmāṅgatvenāṅgīkāryā, tāṃ vinā karmāpūrvāsiddheḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8790: kiñca suprasannavigrahavaddevatāṃ tyaktvā śabdamātraṃ devateti bhaktirayuktetyāha-naca śabdeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8791: na cākṛtimātraṃ śabdaśakyamastu kiṃ vigraheṇeti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8800: sarvaṃ ghaṭābhinnaṃ, vastutvāt, ghaṭavaditi jagadvaicitryaṃ nāstītyapi
GSP33brssgo1u:8802: tathā kṣatriyābhāvaṃ varṇāśramābhāvaṃ varṇāśramādyavyavasthāṃ ca brūyāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:8808: pādatalādājānorjānorānābhernābherāgrīvaṃ grīvāyāścākeśaprarohaṃ tataścabrahmarandhraṃ pṛthivyādipañcake samutthite dhāraṇayā jite yogaguṇe cāṇimādike pravṛtte yogābhivyaktaṃ tejomayaṃ śarīraṃ prāptasya yogino na rogādisparśa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8812: ekameva devādīnāṃ brahmavidyādhikāre satyeva devatyaprāptidvārā kramamuktiphalānyupāsanāni yujyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:8820: yathā manuṣyādhikāraniyamamapodya devādīnāmapi vidyāsvadhikāra uktastathaiva dvijātyadhikāraniyamāpavādena śūdrasyāpyadhikāraḥ syādityetāmāśaṅkāṃ nivartayitumidamadhikaraṇamārabhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8825: yacca karmasvanadhikārakāraṇaṃ śūdrasyānagnitvaṃ na tadvidyāsvavikārasyāpavādakaṃ liṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8828: saṃvargavidyāyāṃ hi jānaśrutiṃ pautrāyaṇaṃ śuśrūṣuṃ śūdraśabdena
GSP33brssgo1u:8829: parāmṛśati- 'aha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhirastu' (chāṃ 4.2.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8832: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ, vedādhyayanābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8840: yaccedaṃ 'śūdro yajñe 'navakḷptaḥ' iti tannyāyapūrvakatvādvidyāyāmapyanavakḷptatvaṃ dyotayati, nyāyasya sādhāraṇatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8841: yatpunaḥ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdraśabdaśravaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ manyase, na talliṅgaṃ nyāyābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8849: (chā. 4.1.3) ityasmāddhaṃsavākyādātmano 'nādaraṃ śrutavato jānaśruteḥ pautrāyaṇasya śugutpede, tāmṛṣīraikvaḥ śūdraśabdenānena sūcayaṃbabhūvātmanaḥ parokṣajñatākhyāpanāyeti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8851: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8853: śucamabhidudrāva, śucā vābhidudruve, śucā vā raikvamabhidudrāveti śūdraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8858: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa itvāgantā ratho hāretvā saca gobhiḥ saha he śūdra,
GSP33brssgo1u:8864: yugvā gantrī śakaṭī tathā saha sthitaṃ raikvamivaitadvacanamāttha /
GSP33brssgo1u:8867: pūrvatra devādīnāmadhikārasidhyaryaṃ mantrādīnāṃ bhūtārthe vigrahādau samanvayoktyā vedāntānāmapi bhūtārthe brahmaṇi samanvayo dṛḍhīkṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8868: atrāpi śūdraśabdasya śrautasya kṣatriye samanvayoktyā sa dṛḍhīkriyata ityadhikaraṇadvayasya prāsaṅgikasyāsminsamanvayādhyāye 'ntarbhāva iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8869: pūrvapakṣe śūdrasyāpi dvijavadvedāntaśravaṇe pravṛttiḥ, siddhānte tadabhāva iti phalam //
GSP33brssgo1u:8870: atra vedāntavicāro viṣayaḥ, sa kiṃ śūdramadhikīroti na veti saṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-tatra śūdrasyāpītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:8874: jānaśrutiḥ kila ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ rathaṃ ca raikāya gurave nivedya māṃ śikṣayetyuvāca /
GSP33brssgo1u:8877: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa yukta itvā gantā ratho hāretvā sa ca gobhiḥ saha he
GSP33brssgo1u:8878: śūdra, tavaivāstu kimalpenānena mama gārhasthyānupayogineti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8883: adhyayanavidhinā saṃskṛto vedastadutthamāpātajñānaṃ ca vedārthavicāreṣu śāstrīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tadabhāvācchūdrasyārthitvādisaṃbhavanyāyāsiddhernāsti vedāntavicārādhikāra ityarthaḥ yadvādhyayanasaṃskṛtena vedena vidito niścito vedārtho yena tasya vedārtheṣu vidhiṣvadhikāro nānyasya, anadhītavedasyāpi vedārthānuṣṭhānādhikāre 'dhyayanavidhivaiyarthyāpātāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:8899: jānaśrutirnāma rājā nidāghasamaye rātrau prāsādatale suṣvāpa, tadā tadīyānnadānādiguṇagaṇatoṣitā ṛṣayo 'sya hitārthaṃ haṃsā bhūtvā
GSP33brssgo1u:8900: mālārūpeṇa tasyoparyājagmuḥ, teṣu pāścātyo haṃso 'gresaraṃ haṃsamuvāca,
GSP33brssgo1u:8901: bho bho bhadrākṣa, kiṃ na paśyasi jānaśruterasya tejaḥ svargaṃ vyāpya
GSP33brssgo1u:8903: tamagresara uvāca, kamapyenaṃ varākaṃ vidyāhīnaṃ santam, are, sayugvānaṃ yugva gantrī śakaṭī tayā saha sthitaṃ raikvamivaitadvacanamāttha /
GSP33brssgo1u:8904: raikvasya hi brahmiṣṭhasya tejo duratikramaṃ nāsyānātmajñasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8905: asmadvacanakhinno rājā śakaṭaliṅgena raikaṃ jñātvā vidyāvānbhaviṣyatīti haṃsānāmabhiprāyaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:8908: teṣāṃ haṃsānāmanādaravākyaśravaṇādasya rājñaḥ śugutpannā, sā śūdraśabdena raikveṇa sūcyate hīti sūtrānvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8909: śrutayaugikārthalābhe sati ananvitarūḍhyarthastyājya iti nyāyadyotanārtho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8918: yatkāraṇaṃ prakaraṇanirūpaṇena kṣatriyatvamasyottaratra caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā kṣatriyeṇa samabhivyāhārādgamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8919: uttaratra hi saṃvargavidyāvākyaśeṣe caitrarathirabhipratārī kṣatriyaḥ saṃkīrtyate- ' atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kapoyamabhipratāraṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī vibhikṣe' (chā. 4.3.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8921: kāpeyayogo hi citrarathasyāvagataḥ 'etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayan'
GSP33brssgo1u:8923: samānānvayānāṃ ca prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8925: tena kṣatriyeṇābhipratāriṇā saha samānāyāṃ vidyayāyāṃ saṃkīrtanaṃ jānaśruterapi kṣatriyatvaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:8935: śunakasyāpatyaṃ kapigotraṃ purohitamabhipratārināmakaṃ rājānaṃ ca kakṣasenasyāpatyaṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau tau bhoktumupaviṣṭau baṭurbhikṣitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8936: nanvasya caitrarathitvaṃ na śrutamityata āha-caitrarathitvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8937: etena dvirātreṇeti chāndogyaśrutyaiva pūrvaṃ citrarathasya kāpeyayoga uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8939: rājavaṃśyānāṃ hi prāyeṇa purohitavaṃśyā yājakā bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8943: kṣattā sūtastasya raikvānveṣaṇāya preṣaṇaṃ annagodānādikaṃ ca jānaśruteḥ kṣatriyatve liṅgam
GSP33brssgo1u:8947: itaśca na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ, yadvidyāpradeśeṣūpanayanādayaḥ saṃskārāḥ parāmṛśyante- 'taṃ hopaninye' (śa.brā. 11.5.3.13) /
GSP33brssgo1u:8948: ' adhīhi bhagava iti hopasasāda' (chā. 7.1.1) ' brahmaparā brahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā eṣa ha vai tatsarvaṃ vakṣyatīti te ha samitpāṇayo bhagavantaṃ pippalādamupasannāḥ' (pra. 1.1) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:8960: atra śūdraśabdo yaugika eveti na śūdrasyādhikāra iti sthitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:8963: iha vidyāgrahaṇāṅgasyopanayanasaṃskārasya sarvatra parāmarśācchūdrasya tadabhāvānna vidyādhikāraḥ ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8968: brahmaparā vedapāragāḥ saguṇabrahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ nirguṇaṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā eṣa pippalādastajjijñāsitaṃ sarvaṃ vakṣyatīti niścitya te bharadvājādayaḥ ṣaḍ ṛṣayastamupagatā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:8969: nanu vaiśvānaravidyāyāmṛṣīnrājānupanīyaiva vidyāmuvāceti śruteranupanītasyāpyasti vidyādhikāra ityata āha-tānheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8970: te ha samitpāṇayaḥ pūrvāhne praticakramira iti pūrvavākye brāhmaṇā upanayanārthamāgatā iti upanayanaprāptiṃ darśayitvā niṣidhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:8978: yatsatyavacanena śūdratvābhāve nirdhārite jābālaṃ gautama upanetumanuśāsituṃ ca pravavṛte 'naitadbrāhmaṇo vivaktumarhati samidhaṃ somyāharopa tvā neṣye na satyādagāḥ' (chā. 4.4.5) iti śrutiliṅgāt // 37 //
GSP33brssgo1u:8979: FN: nāhaṃ gotraṃ vedmi na mātā vetti parantu tathoktam upanayanārthamācāryaṃ gatvā satyakāmo jābālo 'smīti brūhītyanena satyavacanena /
GSP33brssgo1u:8981: taṃ mātovāca bhartṛsevāvyagratayāhamapi tava piturgotraṃ na jānāmi,
GSP33brssgo1u:8982: jabālā tu nāmāhamasmi satyakāmo nāma tvamasīti etāvajjānāmīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:8983: tataḥ sa jābālo gautamamāgatya tena kiṅgotro 'sīti pṛṣṭa uvāca, nāhaṃ gotraṃ vedmi na mātā vetti parantu me mātrā kathitaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:8986: abrāhmaṇa etatsatyaṃ vivicya vaktuṃ, nārhatīti nirdhārya, he somya,
GSP33brssgo1u:8987: satyāttvaṃ nāgāḥ satyaṃ na tyaktavānasi, atastvāmupaneṣye, tadarthaṃ samidhamāhareti gautamasya pravṛtteśca liṅgānna śūdrasyādhikāra
GSP33brssgo1u:8997: 'padyu ha vā etacchmaśānaṃ yacchūdrastasmācchūdrasamīpe nādhyetavyam' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:8999: yasya hi samīpe 'pi nādhyetavyaṃ bhavati sa kathamaśrutamadhīyīta /
GSP33brssgo1u:9000: bhavati ca vedoccāraṇe jihvācchedo dhāraṇe śarīrabheda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9001: ata eva cārthādarthajñānānuṣṭhānayoḥ pratiṣedho bhavati 'na śūdrasya matiṃ dadyāt' iti, 'dvijātīnāmadhyayanamijyā dānam' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9002: yeṣāṃ punaḥ pūrvakṛtasaṃskāravaśādviduradharmavyādhaprabhṛtīnāṃ jñānotpattisteṣāṃ na śakyate phalaprāptiḥ pratiṣeddhuṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9011: asya śūdrasya dvijaiḥ paṭhyamānaṃ vedaṃ pramādācchṛṇvataḥ sīsalākṣābhyāṃ taptābhyāṃ śrotradvayapūraṇaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9019: siddhānāṃ siddherdurapahnavatve 'pi sādhakaiḥ śūdraiḥ kathaṃ jñānaṃ labdhavyamityata āha-śrāvayediti
GSP33brssgo1u:9028: mahadbhayaṃ vajramudyataṃ ya etadviduramṛtāste bhavanti' (kā. 2.6.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9030: asminvākye sarvamidaṃ jagatprāṇāśrayaṃ spandate, mahacca kiñcidbhayakāraṇaṃ vajraśabditamudyataṃ, tadvijñānāccāmṛtatvaprāptiriti śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9031: tatra ko 'sau prāṇaḥ kiṃ tadbhayānakaṃ vajramityapratipattervicāre kriyamāṇe prāptaṃ tāvatprasiddheḥ pañcavṛttirvāyuḥ prāṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9037: vāyau hi parjanyabhāvena vivartamāne vidyutstanayitruvṛṣṭyaśanayo vivartanta ityācakṣate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9048: tasmiṃllokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tadu nātyeti kaścana' (kā. 2.6.1) iti brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ, tadevehāpi saṃnidhānāt jagatsarvaṃ prāṇa ejatīti ca
GSP33brssgo1u:9052: tathācoktam- 'na prāṇena nāpānena martyo jīvati kaścana /
GSP33brssgo1u:9055: bhayādindraśca vāyuśca mṛtyurdhāvati pañcamaḥ' (kā. 2.6.3) iti brahmaiva nirdekṣyate na vāyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9057: tadevehāpi saṃnidhānānmahadbhayaṃ, vajramudyatamiti ca bhayahetutvapratyabhijñānānnirdiṣṭamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9059: yathāhi vajramudyataṃ mamaiva śirasi nipatedyadyahamasya śāsanaṃ na kuryāmityanena bhayena jano niyamena rājādiśāsane pravartata evamidamagnivāyusūryādikaṃ jagadasmādeva brahmaṇo bibhyanniyamena svavyāpāre pravartata iti bhayānakaṃ vajropamitaṃ brahma /
GSP33brssgo1u:9066: 'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' (śve. 6.15) iti mantravarṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9072: anyatra bhūtācca bhavyācca yattatpaśyasi tadvada (kā. 1.2.14) iti paramātmanaḥ pṛṣṭatvāt // FN: bhīṣā bhītyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9075: 'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati' iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto na tu
GSP33brssgo1u:9081: sarvaṃ jagatprāṇānniḥsṛtaṃ utpannaṃ prāṇe cidātmani prerake sati ejati ceṣṭate, tacca prāṇākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ mahadbrahma vibhetyasmāditi bhayam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9084: ya etatprāṇākhyaṃ brahma nirviśeṣaṃ viduste muktā bhavantītyāha-ya iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9089: tatrāṅguṣṭhavākye jīvānuvādo brahmaikyajñānārtha ityuktaṃ, na tatheha prāṇānuvāda aikyajñānārthaḥ saṃbhavati, prāṇasya svarūpeṇa kalpitasyaikyāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9092: nanu 'ata eva prāṇaḥ'ityādau brahmaṇi liṅgātprāṇaśrutirnītā, atrāpi sarvaceṣṭābhayahetutvaṃ brahmaliṅgamastīti nāsti pūrvapakṣāvasaro gatārthatvāditi, ata āha-vāyośceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9093: pratiṣṭhāya sthitiṃ labdhvā prāṇe vāyau nimitte jagaccalatīti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:9102: tadu nātyeti brahmānāśritaḥ ko 'pi loko nāstyevetyukārārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9105: brahmaṇi vajraśabdaḥ kathamityāśaṅkya gauṇa ityāha-vajraśabda iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9119: tatra saṃśayyate, kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaṃ cakṣurviṣayatamopahaṃ tejaḥ kiṃvā paraṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9126: 1.1.24) ityatra hi prakaraṇājyotiḥśabdaḥ svārthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi
GSP33brssgo1u:9132: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameva brahma jyotiḥśabdam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9135: tasya hīha prakaraṇe vaktavyatvenānuvṛttirdṛśyate, ' ya ātmāpahatapāpmā'
GSP33brssgo1u:9138: 'aśarīraṃ vāvasantaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ'(chā. 8.12.1) iti cāśarīratāyai jyotiḥsaṃpatterasyābhidhānāt
GSP33brssgo1u:9143: nahyātyantike mokṣe gatyutkrāntī sta iti vakṣyāmaḥ // 40 //
GSP33brssgo1u:9144: FN: 'atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ' ityādi nāḍīkhaṇḍaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9151: na tathātra 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā'iti prakaraṇasyānugrāhakaṃ paśyāma iti
GSP33brssgo1u:9154: nanu jyotiradhikaraṇe jyotiḥśabdasya brahmaṇi vṛtteruktatvātkathaṃ pūrvapakṣa ityata āha-jyotiriti
GSP33brssgo1u:9155: tatra gāyatrīvākye prakṛtabrahmaparāmarśakayacchabdasāmānādhikaraṇyājjyotiḥśabdasya svārthatyāgaḥ kṛtaḥ, tathātra svārthatyāge hetvadarśanātpūrvapakṣa
GSP33brssgo1u:9158: 'tā vā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ'iti kaṇḍikayā nāḍīnāṃ raśmīnāṃ ca mithaḥ saṃśleṣamuktvā atha saṃjñālopānantaraṃ yatra kāle etanmaraṇaṃ yathā syāttathotkrāmati atha tadā etairnāḍīsaṃśliṣṭaraśmibhirūrdhvaḥ sannupari
GSP33brssgo1u:9160: tathaivātrāpi śarīrātsamutthāya mṛtvā paraṃ jyotirādityākhyamupasaṃpadya taddvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā svasvarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9163: ato mārgasthasūryopāstyā kramamuktiparaṃ vākyamiti prāpte siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9164: vyākhyeyatvenopakrānta ātmaivātra jyotiḥśabdena vyākhyena iti jyotirvākyenaikavākyatāprayojakaprakaraṇānugṛhītottamarapuruṣaśrutyā vākyabhedakajyotiḥśrutirbādhyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9166: naca sūryaprāptyā krameṇāśarīratvaṃ syāditi vācyaṃ, paratvena viśeṣitasya jyotiṣa eva sa uttama
GSP33brssgo1u:9169: nāḍīkhaṇḍe daharopāsakasya yā sūryaprāptiruktā sa na mokṣa iti yuktā
GSP33brssgo1u:9171: nirguṇavidyāyāmarcirādigatisthasūryasyānanvayādanarthakatvāt śrutivyatyāsena svarūpaṃ sākṣātkṛtya paraṃ jyotistadevopasaṃpadyata iti vyākhyeyamiti bhāvaḥ //40//
GSP33brssgo1u:9177: 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma tadamṛtaṃ sa ātmā' (chā. 8.14.1) iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9178: tatkimākāśasabdaṃ paraṃ brahma kiṃvā prasiddhameva bhūtākāśamiti vicāre bhūtaparigraho yuktaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9179: ākāśaśabdasya tasminrūḍhatvāt, nāmarūpanirvahaṇasya cāvakāśādānadvāreṇa tasminyojayituṃ śakyatvāt, sraṣṭṛtvādeśca spaṣṭasya brahmaliṅgasyāśravaṇāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:9180: evaṃ prāpta idamucyate- parameva brahmehākāśaśabdaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9185: naca brahmaṇo 'nyannāmarūpābhyāmarthāntaraṃ saṃbhavati' sarvasya vikārajātasya nāmarūpābhyāmeva vyākṛtatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9186: nāmarūpayorapi nirvahaṇaṃ niraṅ kuśaṃ na brahmaṇo 'nyatra saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9193: 'tadbrahma tadamṛtaṃ sa ātmā' (chā. 8.14) iti ca brahmavādasya liṅgāni /
GSP33brssgo1u:9195: FN: nāmarūpe śabdāthā tadantaḥpātinastadbhinnatvaṃ tatkartṛtvaṃ cāyuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9203: vai nāmeti prasiddhiliṅgasyākāśaśruteśca vākyaśeṣagatābhyāṃ brahmātmaśrutibhyāmanekaliṅgopetābhyāṃ bādho yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9204: yatra bahupramāṇasaṃvādastatra vākyasya tātparyamiti nirṇayāditi siddhāntayati-paramevetyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:9212: atrākāśaśabdasya brahmaṇi vṛttiṃ siddhavatkṛtya tatra saṃśayādipravṛtteruktatvāditi na paunaruktyamiti bhāvaḥ //41//
GSP33brssgo1u:9219: bṛhadāraṇyake ṣaṣṭe prapāṭhake 'katama ātmeti yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 4.3.7) ityupakramya bhūyānātmaviṣayaḥ prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9226: upasaṃhāre ca sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo1u:9227: 4.4.22) iti tadaparityāgāt, madhye 'pi buddhāntādyavasthopanyāsena tasyaiva prapañcanāditi
GSP33brssgo1u:9228: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameśvaropadeśaparamevedaṃ vākyaṃ na
GSP33brssgo1u:9232: suṣuptau tāvat 'ayaṃ puruṣaḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana
GSP33brssgo1u:9233: veda nāntaram' (bṛ. 4.3.21) iti śārīrādbhedena parameśvaraṃ vyapadiśati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9241: tasmātsuṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena vyapadeśātparameśvara evātra vivakṣata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9243: atra brūmaḥ - upakrametāvat 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu iti na saṃsārisvarūpaṃ vivakṣitaṃ kiṃ tarhyanūdya saṃsārisvarūpaṃ pareṇa brahmaṇāsyaikatāṃ vivakṣati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9245: tathopasaṃhāre 'pi yathopakramamevopasaṃharati- 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9246: yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu saṃsārī lakṣyate sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā
GSP33brssgo1u:9248: yastu madhye buddhāntādyavasthopanyāsātsaṃsārisvarūpavivakṣāṃ manyante, na prācīmapi diśaṃ prasthāpitaḥ pratīcīmapi diśaṃ pratiṣṭheta /
GSP33brssgo1u:9249: yato na buddhāntādyavasthopanyāsenāvasthāvattvaṃ saṃsāritvaṃ vā vivakṣati,
GSP33brssgo1u:9252: yat 'ata ūrdhve vimokṣāyaiva brūhi' iti pade pade pṛcchati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9253: yacca 'ananvāgatastena bhavatyasaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 4.3.14,15) iti pade pade prativakti
GSP33brssgo1u:9254: 'ananvāgataṃ puṇyenānanvāgataṃ pāpena tīrṇo hi tadā sarvāñśokānhṛdayasya
GSP33brssgo1u:9268: ahandhīgamyeṣu katama ātmeti janakapraśne yājñavalkya āha-yo 'yamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9286: puruṣaḥ śarīraṃ prājño jīva iti bhrāntiṃ vārayati-tatra puruṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9287: dehasya vedanāprasakterniṣedhāyogātpuruṣo jīva eva, prājñastu rūḍhyā para evetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9291: vastutaḥ sarvavikriyāśūnya ityukterna saṃsāriṇi tātparyamityāha-yata iti
GSP33brssgo1u:9301: hi yasmādātmā suṣuptau sarvaśokātītaḥ tasmādhṛdayasyaiva sarve śokā iti śrutyarthaḥ //42//
GSP33brssgo1u:9306: yadasminvākye patyādayaḥ śabdā asaṃsārisvarūpapratipādanaparāḥ saṃsārisvabhāvapratiṣedhanāśca bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9308: 'sa na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānno evāsādhunā kanīyān' ityevañjātīyakāḥ saṃsārisvabhāvapratiṣedhanāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9310: iti śrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ FN: vaśī svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9320: iti śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brssgo1u:9324: veditanyaṃ priyaṃ vande prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ param //1//
GSP33brssgo1u:9330: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca |
GSP33brssgo1u:9335: gatismānyaṃ ca vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmakāraṇavādaṃ prati vidyate na pradhānakāraṇavādaṃ pratīti prapañcitaṃ gatena granthena /
GSP33brssgo1u:9336: idaṃ tvidānīmavaśiṣṭamāśaṅkṣyate- yaduktaṃ pradhānasyāśabdatvaṃ tadasiddhaṃ, kāsucicchāsvāsu pradhānasamarpaṇābhāsānāṃ śabdanāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9338: ataḥ pradhānasya kāraṇatvaṃ vedasiddhameva mahadbhiḥ paramarṣibhiḥ kapilaprabhṛtibhiḥ parigṛhītamiti prasajyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9339: tadyāvatteṣāṃ śabdānāmanyaparatvaṃ na pratipādyate tāvatsarvajñaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇamiti pratipāditamapyākulībhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:9342: kāṭhake hi paṭhyate- 'mahataḥ paramavyaktamavyaktātpuruṣaḥ paraḥ' (1.3.11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9344: tatra ya eva yannāmāno yatkramācca mahadavyaktapuruṣāḥ smṛtiprasiddhāsta eveha pratyabhijñāyante
GSP33brssgo1u:9348: tadeva ca jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ śrutismṛtinyāyaprasiddhibhya iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:9351: nahyatra yādṛśaṃ smṛtiprasiddhaṃ svatantraṃ kāraṇaṃ triguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ tādṛśaṃ pratyabhijñāyate
GSP33brssgo1u:9353: sa ca śabdo na vyaktamavyaktamiti yaugikatvādanyasminnapi sūkṣme sudurlakṣye ca prayujyate
