GSP33brssgo1u:9355: yā tu pradhānavādināṃ rūḍhiḥ sā teṣāmeva pāribhāṣikī satī na vedārthanirūpaṇe kāraṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9358: prakaraṇanirūpaṇāyāṃ cātra na paraparikalpitaṃ pradhānaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9364: darśayati- 'ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu /
GSP33brssgo1u:9365: buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca //
GSP33brssgo1u:9370: saṃyataistvadhvanaḥ pāraṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamāpnoti darśayitvā, kiṃ tadadhvanaḥ pāraṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamityasyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ, tebhya eva prakṛtebhya indriyādibhyaḥ paratvena paramātmānamadhvanaḥ pāraṃ viṣṇoḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9371: paramaṃ padaṃ darśayati- 'indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā arthebhyaśca paraṃ manaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9374: puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' (kā. 1.3.10,11) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9375: tatra ya evendriyādayaḥ pūrvasyāṃ ratharūpakakalpanāyāmaśvādibhāvena prakṛtāsta eveha parigṛhyante prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriyāparihārāya /
GSP33brssgo1u:9377: arthā ye śabdādayo viṣayā indriyahayagocaratvena nirdiṣṭāsteṣāṃ cendriyebhyaḥ paratvam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9382: buddherātmā mahānparaḥ, yaḥ sa 'ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi' iti rathitvenopakṣiptaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9389: ' iti smṛteḥ, 'yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti
GSP33brssgo1u:9391: 6.18) iti ca śruteryā prathamajasya hiraṇyagarbhasya buddhiḥ sā sarvāsāṃ buddhīnāṃ parā pratiṣṭhā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9393: sā ca pūrvatra buddhigrahaṇenaiva gṛhītā satī hirugīhopadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9395: etasmiṃstu pakṣe paramātmaviṣayeṇaiva pareṇa puruṣagrahaṇena rathina ātmano grahaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:9398: itarāṇīndriyādīni prakṛtānyeva paramapadadidarśayiṣayā samanukrāmanpariśiṣyamāṇenehāntyenāvyaktaśabdena pariśiṣyamāṇaṃ prakṛtaṃ śarīraṃ darśayatīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9399: śarīrendriyamanobuddhiviṣayavedanāsaṃyuktasya hyavidyāvato bhoktuḥ śarīrādīnāṃ rathādirūpakakalpanayā saṃsāramokṣagatinirūpaṇena pratyagātmabrahmāvagatiriha vivakṣitā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9400: tathāca 'eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhātmā na prakāśate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9402: (kā. 1.3.12) iti vaiṣṇavasya paramapadasya duravagamatvamuktvā tadavagamārthaṃ yogaṃ darśayati- 'yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñastadyacchejjñāna ātmani /
GSP33brssgo1u:9409: tāmapi buddhiṃ mahatyātmani bhoktaryagryāyāṃ vā buddhau sūkṣmatāpādanena niyacchet /
GSP33brssgo1u:9410: mahāntaṃ tvātmānaṃ śānta ātmani prakaraṇavati parasminpuruṣe parasyāṃ kāṣṭhāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayediti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9415: apiśabdādekaśabdācca brahmāṅgīkāreṇa pūrvapakṣo vicāraścāyaṃ kvācitka iti sūcitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9437: īkṣatyadhikaraṇe gatisāmānyamaśabdatvaṃ ca pratijñātam, tatra brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ gatisāmānyaṃ prapañcitaṃ, adhunā pradhānasyāśabdatvamasiddhamityāśaṅkya nirūpyata ityākṣepasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9438: tenāśabdatvanirūpaṇena brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvayo dṛḍhīkṛto bhavatītyadhyāyasaṃgatirapyadhikaraṇatrayasya jñeyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9440: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ pūrvoktaśarīraparaṃ veti smṛtiprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvamaprasiddhabrahmaparatvaṃ yathā ṣaṣṭhādhyāyasya darśitaṃ tadvadavyaktapadamapriddhapradhānaparamiti pūrvapakṣayati-ānumānikamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:9442: tathā ca brahmapradhānayorvikalpena kāraṇatvāt brahmaṇyeva vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti niyamāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte niyamasiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9454: nanu śabdapratyabhijñāyāmartho 'pi pratyabhijñāyata ityāśaṅkya yaugikācchabdāsati niyāmake nārthaviśeṣadhīrityāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9455: rūḍhyā taddhīrityāśaṅkya rūḍhiḥ kiṃ laukikī smārtā vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9459: yattu smārtakramapratyabhijñayā kramikārthaḥ smārta eveti, tatrāha-naca
GSP33brssgo1u:9462: pūrvajñātarūpārthasya sthāne tadviruddhārthajñāne sati tasya dhīrnāstītyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-na hīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9466: tasya pūrvavākye ātmabuddhyormadhyasthānapaṭhitasyātrāpi madhyasthenāvyaktaśabdena grahaṇānna pradhānasya vaidikatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9467: smārtakramaḥ kimiti tyaktavya ityāśaṅkya śrautakramasya prakaraṇādyanugraheṇa balavattvādityāha-kuta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9472: yadyavivekī tadā manoraśanābaddhāṃstān pravartayatīti manasaḥ pragrahatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9475: nanu svataścidātmano bhogasaṃbhavāt kiṃ rathādinetyata āha-ātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9476: ātmā dehaḥ, dehādisaṅkakalpanayā bhoktṛtvaṃ na svato 'saṅgatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9486: tato grahebhyaḥ śreṣṭhā atigrahā viṣayā iti bṛhadāraṇyake śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9488: savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ manaḥ, nirvikalpakaṃ niścayātmikā buddhiḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9489: ātmaśabdāt sa eva buddheḥ paraḥ, pratyabhijñāyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9491: mananaśaktiḥ, vyāpinī, bhāviniścayaḥ, brahmā ātmā, bhogyavargāśrayaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9495: nanvaprakṛtā sā kathamucyate, taduktau ca pradhānena kimaparāddhamityata
GSP33brssgo1u:9498: pūrvaṃ vyaṣṭibuddhyabhedenoktātra tato bhedena paratvamucyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9499: tarhi ratharathinau dvau pariśiṣṭau syātāṃ, netyāha-etasmiṃstviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9505: kiñca brahmātmaikatvaparatve granthe bhedavādināṃ pradhānasyāvakāśo nāstītyāha-śarīretyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:9507: kāṭhakagranthasyaikyatātparye gūḍhatvajñeyatvajñānahetuyogavidhaye liṅgāni santītyāha-tathā caiṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9516: ata uttaramucyate- sūkṣmaṃ tviha kāraṇātmanā śarīraṃ vivakṣyate sūkṣmasyāvyaktaśabdārhatvāt
GSP33brssgo1u:9517: yadyapi sthūlamidaṃ śarīraṃ na svayamavyaktaśabdamarhati, tathāpi tasya tvārambhakaṃ bhūtasūkṣmamavyaktaśabdamarhati
GSP33brssgo1u:9520: tarhyavyākṛtamāsīt' (bṛ. 1.4.7) itīdameva vyākṛtanāmarūpavibhinnaṃ jagatprāgavasthāyāṃ parityaktavyākṛtanāmarūpaṃ bījaśaktyavasthamavyaktaśabdayogaṃ darśayati // 2 //
GSP33brssgo1u:9522: gobhirgovikāraiḥ payobhiḥ matsaraṃ somaṃ śrīṇīta miśritaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9523: tat ha kila tarhi prāgavasthāyāmidaṃ jagadavyākṛtaṃ avyaktamāsīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9536: prāgavasthamavyaktaśabdārhamabhyupagamyeta, tadātmanā ca śarīrasyāpyavyaktaśabdārhatvaṃ pratijñāyeta, sa eva tarhi
GSP33brssgo1u:9539: atrocyate- yadi vayaṃ svatantrāṃ kāñcitprāgavasthāṃ jagataḥ kāraṇatvenābhyupagacchema, prasañjyema tadā pradhānakāraṇavādam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9540: parameśvarādhīnā tviyamasmābhiḥ prāgavasthā jagato 'bhyupagamyate na svatantrā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9543: nahi tayā vinā parameśvarasya sraṣṭṛtvaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9548: avidyātmikā hi bījaśaktiravyaktaśabdanirdeśyā parameśvarāśrayā māyāmayī mahāsuptiḥ, yasyāṃ svarūpapratibodharahitāḥ śerate saṃsāriṇo jīvāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9549: tadetadavyaktaṃ kvacidākāśaśabdanirdiṣṭam- 'etasminnu khalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśca' (bṛ. 3.8.11) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9551: kvacinmāyeti sūcitam- 'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram'
GSP33brssgo1u:9554: tadidaṃ 'mahataḥ paramavyaktam' ityuktamavyaktaprabhavatvānmahataḥ, yadā hairaṇyagarbhī buddhirmahān
GSP33brssgo1u:9555: yadā tu jīvo mahāṃstadāpyavyaktādhīnatvājjīvabhāvasya mahataḥ paramavyaktamityuktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9557: avidyāvattvenaiva jīvasya sarvaḥ saṃvyavahāraḥ saṃtato vartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9559: satyapi śarīravadindriyādīnāṃ tadvikāratvāviśeṣe śarīrasyaivābhedopacārādavyaktaśabdena grahaṇaṃ, indriyādīnāṃ svaśabdaireva gṛhītatvātpariśiṣṭatvācca śarīrasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:9560: anye tu varṇayanti- dvividhaṃ hi śarīraṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9562: sūkṣmaṃ yaduttaratra vakṣyate- 'tadantarapratipattau raṃhati saṃpariṣvaktaḥ praśnanirūpaṇābhyām' (bṛ. 3.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9568: taistvetadvaktavyaṃ, aviśeṣeṇa śarīradvayasya pūrvatra rathatvena saṃkīrtitatvātsamānayoḥ prakṛtapariśiṣṭatvayoḥ kathaṃ sūkṣmameva śarīramiha gṛhyate na punaḥ sthūlamapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9570: āmnātaṃ cāvyaktapadaṃ sūkṣmameva pratipādayituṃ śaknoti netaradvyaktatvāttasyeti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:9573: nahīme pūrvottare āmnāte ekavākyatāmanāpadya kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayataḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9576: tatrāvaśiṣṭāyāṃ śarīradvayasya grāhyatvākāṅkṣāyāṃ yathākāṅkṣaṃ saṃbandhe 'nabhyupagamyamāna ekavākyataiva bādhitā bhavati kuta āmnātasyārthapratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9581: anantaranirdiṣṭatvāttu kiṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamitīdamiha vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9583: sarvathāpi tvānumānikanirakaraṇopapattestathā nāmāstu, na naḥ kiñcicchidyate // 3 //
GSP33brssgo1u:9593: dṛṣṭā bībhatsā ghṛṇā yasmin tasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9602: yannāśānmuktiḥ sā svīkāryā, tāṃ vinaiva sṛṣṭau muktānāṃ punarbandhāpatterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9620: avyaktasya paratve 'pi śarīrasya kiṃ jātaṃ, tadāha-tacceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9627: kathaṃ tasya mahato jīvātparatvamityāśaṅkya dvitīyasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tadadhīnatvācceti
GSP33brssgo1u:9631: avyaktapadabalāt prakṛtamapi sthūlaṃ tyajyata iti śaṅkate-āmnātasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9633: tava mate tasyā abhāvātkutor'thabodha iti samādhatte-neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9634: tāṃ vināpyarthathīḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9635: śarīraśabdena rūḍhyā sthūlaṃ prakṛtaṃ tasya hāniraprakṛtasya bhūtasūkṣmasyāvyaktapadena grahaṇamanyāyyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9638: ākāṅkṣayā vākyaikavākyatve sati prakṛtaṃ śarīradvayamavyaktapadena grāhyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9642: sthūlasya dṛṣṭadaurgandhyādinā laśunādivadanātmatvadhīvairāgyayoḥ sulabhatvāditi śaṅkate-na ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9643: dṛṣṭā bībhatsā ghṛṇā yasmin tasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9645: vairāgyāyaśuddhiratra na vivakṣitā, vidhyabhāvāt, kintu vaiṣṇavaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ vivakṣitamiti taddarśanārthaṃ prakṛtaṃ sthūlamevāvyaktapadena grāhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9646: kiñca sūkṣmasya liṅgāntaḥpātina indriyādigrahaṇenaiva grahaṇānna pṛthagavyaktaśarīrapadābhyāṃ grahaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9654: jñeyatvena ca sāṃkhyaiḥ pradhānaṃ smaryate guṇapuruṣāntarajñānātkaivalyamitivadbhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9655: nahi guṇasvarūpamajñātvā guṇebhyaḥ puruṣasyāntaraṃ śakyaṃ jñātumiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9662: asmākaṃ tu ratharūpakakḷptaśarīrādyanusaraṇena viṣṇoreva paramaṃ padaṃ darśayitumayamupanyāsa ityanavadyam // 4 //
GSP33brssgo1u:9665: nahi śakyamiti ca vadadbhiḥ pradhānaṃ jñeyatvena smaryata iti saṃbandhaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9666: na kevalaṃ bhedapratiyogitvena pradhānasya jñeyatvaṃ tairiṣṭaṃ kintu tasyopāsanayāṇimādiprāptaye 'pītyāha-kvacicceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9669: upadiṣṭaṃ hi jñānaṃ phalavaditi jñātuṃ śakyaṃ niṣphalasyopadeśāyogādavyaktasya ca jñānānupadeśātphalavajjñānagamyatvāsiddhirityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9672: nanu śarīrasyāpi jñeyatvānukteḥ kathamiha grahaṇaṃ, tatrāha-asmākaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9674: asmanmate viṣṇavākhyapadasyaikasyaiva jñeyatvāttaddarśanārthamavyaktapadena śarīropanyāso yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9675: sādhāraṇaśabdamātrānna pradhānasya pratyabhijñā smārtaliṅgasyānuktyā niyāmakābhāvāditi tātparyam
GSP33brssgo1u:9678: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt |
GSP33brssgo1u:9683: anādyanantaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ dhruvaṃ nicāyya taṃ mṛtyumukhātpramucyate' //
GSP33brssgo1u:9685: atra hi yādṛśaṃ śabdādihīnaṃ pradhānaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ smṛtau nirūpitaṃ tādṛśameva nicāyyatvena nirdiṣṭaṃ, tasmātpradhānamevedaṃ, tadeva cāvyaktaśabdanirdiṣṭamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9686: atra brūmaḥ - neha pradhānaṃ nicāyyatvena nirdiṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9687: prājño hīha paramātmā nicāyyatveta nirdiṣṭaṃ iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9691: 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' ityādinirdeśāt, 'eṣa
GSP33brssgo1u:9692: sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhotmā na prakāśate' iti ca durjñātatvavacanena tasyaiva jñeyatvākāṅkṣaṇāt
GSP33brssgo1u:9693: 'yacchedvāṅmanasī prājñaḥ' iti ca tajjñānāyaiva vāgādisaṃyamasya vihitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9695: nahi pradhānamātraṃ nicāyya mṛtyumukhātpramucyata iti sāṃkhyairiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9705: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca |
GSP33brssgo1u:9710: tatra tāvat 'sa tvamagniṃ svargyamadhyeṣi mṛtyo prabrūhi taṃ śraddadhānāya
GSP33brssgo1u:9718: prativacanamapi 'lokādimamagniṃ tamuvāca tasmai yā iṣṭakāyāvatīrvā yathā vā' (kā. 1.1.15) ityagniviṣayam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9719: 'hanta ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9720: yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya ātmā bhavati gautama /
GSP33brssgo1u:9724: 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' (kā. 1.2.18) ityādibahuprapañcaṃ paramātmaviṣayam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9727: atrāha- yo 'yamātmaviṣayaḥ praśno yeyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye 'stīti,
GSP33brssgo1u:9728: kiṃ sa evāyam 'anyatra dharmādanyatrādharmāt' iti punaranukṛṣyate, kiṃvā tato 'nyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśna utthāpyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9730: sa evāyaṃ praśnaḥ punaranukṛṣyata iti yadyucyeta, dvayorātmaviṣayayoḥ praśnayorekatāpatteragniviṣaya ātmaviṣayaśca dvāveva praśnāvityato na
GSP33brssgo1u:9732: athānyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśnaḥ utthāpyata ityucyeta tato yathaiva varapradānavyatirekeṇa praśnakalpanāyāmadoṣa evaṃ praśna vyatirekeṇāpi pradhānopanyāsakalpanāyāmadoṣaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:9733: atrocyate- naivaṃ vayamiha varapradānavyatirekeṇa praśnaṃ kañcitkalpayāmo vākyopakramasāmarthyāt
GSP33brssgo1u:9734: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥsaṃvādarūpā vākyapravṛttirāsamāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate
GSP33brssgo1u:9735: mṛtyuḥ kila nāciketase pitrā prahitāya trīnvarānpradadau /
GSP33brssgo1u:9736: naciketāḥ kila teṣāṃ prathamena vareṇa saumanasyaṃ vavre /
GSP33brssgo1u:9739: tatra yadyanyatra dharmādityanyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśna utthāpyeta tato
GSP33brssgo1u:9743: yoyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye 'sti nāstīti vicikitsābhidhānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9755: iha cānyatra dharmādityasya praśnasya prativacanaṃ 'na jāyate mriyate vā
GSP33brssgo1u:9758: sati hi prasaṅge pratiṣedho bhāgī bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9759: prasaṅgaśca janmamaraṇayoḥ śarīrasaṃsparśācchārīrasya bhavati na parameśvarasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:9761: mahāntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati //
GSP33brssgo1u:9762: (kā. 2.4.4) iti svapnajāgaritadṛśo jīvasyaiva mahattvavibhutvaviśeṣaṇasya mananena śokavicchedaṃ darśayanna prājñādanyo jīva iti darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9765: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9767: tathā jīvavīṣayasyāstitvanāstitvapraśnasyānantaram 'anyaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣva' ityārabhya mṛtyunā taistaiḥ kāmaiḥ pralobhyamāno 'pi naciketā yadā na cacāla, tadainaṃ mṛtyurabhyudayanīḥśreyasavibhāgapradarśanena vidyāvidyāvibhāgapradarśanena ca 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye na tvā kāmā bahavo 'lolupanta' (kā.1.2.4) iti praśasya praśnamapi tadīyaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9770: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti //
GSP33brssgo1u:9771: ' (kā.1.2.12) iti, tenāpi jīvaprājñayorabheda eveha vivakṣata iti gamyate
GSP33brssgo1u:9772: yatpraśnanimittāṃ ca praśaṃsāṃ mahatīṃ mṛtyoḥ pratyapadyata naciketā yadi taṃ vihāya praśaṃsānantaramanyameva praśnamupakṣipedasthāna eva sā sarvā praśaṃsā prasāritā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9773: tasmāt 'yeyaṃ prete' ityasyaiva praśnasyaitadanukarṣaṇam 'anyatra dharmāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9777: pūrvatra hi dehādivyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvaṃ pṛṣṭamuttaratra tu tasyaivāsaṃsāritvaṃ pṛcchyata iti yāvaddhyavidyā na nivartate
GSP33brssgo1u:9778: tāvaddharmādigocaratvaṃ jīvasya jīvatvaṃ ca na nivartate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9779: tannivṛttau tu prājña eva tattvamasīti śrutyā pratyāyyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9781: yathā kaścitsaṃtamase patitāṃ kāñcidrajjumahiṃ manyamāno bhīto vepamānaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9782: palāyate, taṃ cāparo brūyānmā bhaṣīrnāyamahī rajjureveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9783: sa ca tadupaśrutyāhikṛtaṃ bhayamutsṛjedvepathuṃ palāyanaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:9784: natvahibuddhikāle tadapagamakāle ca vastunaḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9786: tataśca 'na jāyate mriyate vā' ityevamādyapi bhavatyastitvapraśnasya prativacanam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9792: pradhānakalpanāyāṃ tu na varapradānaṃ na praśno na prativacanamiti vaiṣamyam // 6 //
GSP33brssgo1u:9793: FN: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃprati trīnvarānavṛṇīṣvetyuktestrayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9795: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagnimadhyeṣi smarasi /
GSP33brssgo1u:9797: dehādanyo 'sti naveti saṃśayo.'sti ata etadātmatattvamasaṃdigdhaṃ jānīyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9804: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tamātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9810: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃ prati trīnvarānvṛṇīṣvetyukteḥ trayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9814: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagni smarasi /
GSP33brssgo1u:9820: yāḥ svarūpato yāvatīḥ saṃkhyāto yathā vā krameṇāgniścīyate tatsarvamuvācetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9821: hantedānīṃ brahma vakṣyāmīti brahmavākyena jīvapraśnādvyavahitanamapi 'yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya'ityādi vākyaṃ jīvaviṣayamuttaraṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:9823: vākyārthastu ātmā maraṇaṃ prāpya yathā bhavati tathā vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9828: evaṃ ca trayāṇāmevopanyāsaḥ praśnaśca yataḥ ato na pradhānamavyaktamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9830: ekaḥ praśnaḥ dvau praśnau veti pakṣadvaye phalitaṃ pṛcchati-kiñcāta iti
GSP33brssgo1u:9833: praśnaikye sūtrāsaṃgatiḥ bhede pradhānasya śrautatvasiddhiriti pūrvavādyāha-sa evetyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:9840: itaḥ punaḥ martyalokaṃ prāptasya mama pitā yathāpūrvaṃ sumanāḥ syāditi prathamaṃ vavre /
GSP33brssgo1u:9841: nanu dvitīyavaro jīvavidyā tṛtīyo brahmavidyeti praśnabhedaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-yeyamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:9842: prete ityupakramya tṛtīyatvoktiliṅgājjīvātmavidyaiva tṛtīyo vara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9843: evaṃ vākyopakrame sati praśnāntaraṃ na yuktamityāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9844: maraṇadharmādyasparśaliṅgābhyāṃ praṣṭavyayorjīveśvarayorbhedāt praśnabhedasiddhervākyabādho yukta iti śaṅkate-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9846: na kevalaṃ praṣṭavyabhedāt praśnabhedaḥ kintu praśnavākyayoḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9849: kiñca brahmāpraśne janmādiniṣedhena jīvasvarūpaṃ vadan yamastayoraikyaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9857: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tāmātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9860: kiñcābhedamuktvā bhedasya ninditatvādabheda eva satya ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9862: evamihākhaṇḍaikarase brahmaṇi yo nāneva mithyābhedaṃ paśyati sa bhedadarśī maraṇānmaraṇaṃ prāpnoti saṃsārabhayānna mucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9863: kiñca jīvapraśnānantaraṃ 'taṃ durdarśam'iti yaduttaramuvāca tenāpyuttareṇābhedo gamyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9866: putrādikaṃ vṛṇīṣvetyukte 'pi viṣayāṃstucchīkṛtyātmajñānānna cacāla 'nānyaṃ tasmānnaciketā vṛṇīte'iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9868: bhogāpavargamārgayorvailakṣaṇyaṃ pratijñāya 'dūramete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyā'iti darśitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9869: preyaḥ priyatamaṃ svargādikaṃ, viṣūcī viruddhaphale, avidyā karma, vidyā tattvadhīḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9870: vidyābhīpsinaṃ vidyārthinaṃ tvāmahaṃ manye, yataḥ tvā tvāṃ bahavo 'pi
GSP33brssgo1u:9871: kāmāḥ putrādayo mayā dīyamānā durlabhā api nālolupanta lobhavantaṃ na kṛtavanta iti praṣṭāraṃ stutvā praśnamapi 'tvādṛṅgo bhūyānnaciketaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9873: iyaṃ praśaṃsā praśnabhedapakṣe na ghaṭata ityāha-yatpraśneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9874: yatpraśnena stutiṃ labdhavāṃstaṃ praśnaṃ vihāya yadyanyamevotthāpayet tarhyanavasare stutīḥ kṛtā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9880: avidyānāśānantaraṃ brahmatvaṃ cedāgantukamanityaṃ ca syādityata āha-na
GSP33brssgo1u:9882: jīvasya brahmatve svābhāvike sati brahmapraśnasya yaduttaraṃ tajjīvapraśnasyāpi bhavatīti lābhaṃ darśayati-tataśca na jāyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9889: yathā mahacchabdaḥ sāṃkhyaiḥ sattāmātre 'pi prathamaje prayukte na tameva vaidike 'pi prayoge 'bhidhatte /
GSP33brssgo1u:9898: na cākāśādiśabde vyabhicāraḥ, ākāśādermatāntarasādhāraṇatvena sāṃkhyāsādhāraṇatvāsiddheḥ sādhyasyāpi sattvāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:9902: ātmā mahānityātmaśabdaprayogāt, taṃ matvā na śocati, 'tamasaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:9913: mantravarṇāt- 'ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9914: ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ' (śve. 4.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9921: na jāyata iti cājā syāt, 'mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtiḥ' ityabhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9924: sā tu rūḍhiriha nāśrayituṃ śakyā, vidyāprakaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:9926: tāṃ prakṛtimaja ekaḥ puruṣo juṣamāṇaḥ prīyamāṇaḥ sevamāno vānuśete /
GSP33brssgo1u:9929: anyaḥ punarajaḥ puruṣe utpannavivekajñāno virakto jahātyenāṃ prakṛtiṃ bhuktabhogāṃ kṛtabhogāpavargāṃ parityajati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9932: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nānena mantreṇa śrutimattva sāṃkhyavādasya śakyamāśrayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:9933: nahyayaṃ mantraḥ svātantryeṇa kañcidapi vādaṃ samarthayitumutsahate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9937: yathāhi arvāgbalaścamasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ (bṛ. 2.2.3) ityasminamantre svātantryeṇāyaṃ nāmāsau camaso 'bhipreta iti na śakyate nirūpayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:9941: tatra tu 'idaṃ tacchira eṣa hyarvāgbilaścamasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ' iti vākyaśeṣāccamasaviśeṣapratipattirbhavati
GSP33brssgo1u:9944: FN: ajāmekāṃ- na jāyata ityajā tāṃ mulaprakṛtiṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9945: rajaḥsatvamoguṇāṃ sarūpāstriguṇātmikāḥ prajā janayantīṃ eko 'jo jīvastāṃ śabdādiviṣayarūpatāpannāṃ juṣamāṇaḥ sannanuśete nirantaraṃ muhyati /
GSP33brssgo1u:9946: jīvena bhukto bhogo yasyāṃ yasyā vā tāṃ jīvena bhujyamānāmanyaḥ paramātmā jahāti nāsyāmāsaktiṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9947: avayavāḥ pradhānasya raja ādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayastaiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9954: atrājāpadaṃ viṣayaḥ, tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ māyāparaṃ veti rūḍhyarthāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvatrāvyaktaśabdamātreṇa
GSP33brssgo1u:9957: phalaṃ pūrvapakṣe brahmaṇi samanvayāsiddhiḥ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti pūrvavaddraṣṭavyam
GSP33brssgo1u:9960: avayavāḥ pradhānasya rajādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayaḥ tairnimittairlohitādiśabdaiḥ pradhānamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9974: māyādāvapi sādhāraṇānmantrādviśeṣārthagraho na yuktaḥ, viśeṣagrahahetoḥ prakaraṇāderabhāvāditi hetuṃ vyākhyāya dṛṣṭāntaṃ vyācaṣṭe-camasavaditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:9978: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke |
GSP33brssgo1u:9979: parameśvarādutpannā jyotiḥpramukhā tejobannalakṣaṇā caturvidhasya bhūtagrāmasya prakṛtibhūteyamajā pratipattavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:9984: rohitādirūpatāmāmananti- 'yadagre rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejastadrūpaṃ yacchukraṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:9986: rohitādīnāṃ ca śabdānāṃ rūpaviśeṣeṣu mukhyatvādbhāktatvācca guṇaviṣayatvasya /
GSP33brssgo1u:9987: asaṃdigdhena ca saṃdigdhasya nigamanaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:9989: kiṅkāraṇaṃ brahma' (śve. 1.1) ityupakramya 'te dyānayogānugatā apaśyandevātmaśaktiṃ svaguṇairnigūḍhām'
GSP33brssgo1u:9991: vākyaśeṣe 'pi 'māyāṃ tu prakṛti vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram' iti 'yo yoniṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:9992: yonimadhitiṣṭhatyekaḥ' (śve. 4.10,11) iti ca tasyā evāvagamānna svatantrā kācitprakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ nāmajāmantreṇāmnāyata iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo1u:9993: prakaraṇāttu saiva daivī śaktiravyākṛtanāmarūpā nāmarūpayoḥ prāgavasthānenāpi mantreṇāmnāyata ityucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:9996: te brahmavādino 'nayā rītyā vimṛśya dyānayogenānugatāḥ paramātmānamanu praviṣṭāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:9997: avidyāśaktiryoniḥ sā ca pratijīvaṃ nānetyuktamato vīpsopapannā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10005: kiñca lohitādiśabdairapi dravyalakṣaṇā nyāyyā avyavadhānāt na tu rañjanīyatvādiguṇavyavahitā sattvādiguṇalakṣaṇetyāha-lohitādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10006: nanu śākhāntareṇa śākhāntarasthamantrasya nirṇayaḥ kathamityata āha-asaṃdigdheneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10008: yathā śākhāntaravākyānna pradhānagrahastathehāpi śvetāśvataropaniṣadi māyāprakaraṇānna tadbrahma ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10010: brahmavādino dhyānākhyayogena paramātmānamanupraviṣṭāḥ santaḥ tatraiva devasyātmabhūtāmaikyenādhyastāṃ śaktiṃ paratantrāṃ māyāṃ sattvādiguṇavatīṃ brahmaṇaḥ sahāyamapaśyannityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10011: māyāyā ekatve 'pi tadaṃśānāṃ jīvopādhīnāṃ tattasaṃghātayonīnāmavidyākhyānāṃ bhedādvīpsā
GSP33brssgo1u:10019: kathaṃ punastejobannātmanā trairūpyeṇa trirūpājā pratipattuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10028: yathāhi loke yadṛcchayā kācidajā rohitaśuklakṛṣṇaṇavarṇā syādbahubarkarā sarūpabarkarā ca tāṃ ca kaścidajo juṣamāṇo 'nuśayīta, kaściccaināṃ bhuktabhogāṃ juhyāt, evamiyamapi tejobannalakṣaṇā bhūtaprakṛtistrivarṇā
GSP33brssgo1u:10029: bahu sarūpaṃ carācaralakṣaṇaṃ vikārajātaṃ janayati aviduṣā ca kṣetrajñenopabhujyate viduṣā ta parityajata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10030: nacedamāśaṅkitavyamekaḥ kṣetrajño 'nuśete 'nyo jahātītyataḥ kṣetrajñabhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pareṣāmiṣṭaḥ prāpnotīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10046: kiṃ tejobannetvajāśabdo rūḍho, na jāyata iti yaugiko vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10061: naca yogasya mukhyavṛttitvāttena pradhānagraho nyāyya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10064: tathāca rohitādiśabdasamabhivyāhārānugṛhītayā rūḍhyāśritayā guṇavṛttyā pradhāne yogaṃ bādhitvāvāntaraprakṛtirajāśabdena grāhya, yathā madhvādiśabdaiḥ prasiddhamadhvādyāśritaguṇalakṣaṇaya ādityādayo gṛhyante tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10074: asminmantre pañca pañcajanā iti pañcasaṃkhyāviṣayāparā pañcasaṃkhyā śrūyate pañcadvayaśabdadarśanāt
GSP33brssgo1u:10076: tathā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā yāvantaḥ saṃkhyeyā ākāṅkṣyantelatāvantyeva ca tattvāni sāṃkhyaiḥ saṃkhyāyante- 'mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtirmahadādyāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10078: ṣoḍaśakaśca vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ' (sāṃkhyakā. 3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10079: tayā śrutiprasiddhayā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā teṣāṃ smṛtiprasiddhānāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānāmupasaṃgrahātprāptaṃ punaḥ śrutimattvameva pradhānādīnām /
GSP33brssgo1u:10080: tato brūmaḥ - na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ śrutimattvaṃ pratyāśā kartavyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10084: naiṣāṃ pañcaśaḥ pañcaśaḥ sādhāraṇo dharmo 'sti, yena pañcaviṃśaterantarāle parāḥ pañca pañcasaṃkhyā niveśeran /
GSP33brssgo1u:10087: sapta ca varṣāṇi na vavarṣa śatakratuḥ' iti dvādaśavārṣikīmanāvṛṣṭiṃ kathayanti tadvaditi
GSP33brssgo1u:10090: paraścātra pañcaśabdo janaśabdena samastaḥ pañcajanā iti, pāribhāṣikeṇa svareṇaikapadatvaniścayāt
GSP33brssgo1u:10095: naca pañcasaṃkhyāyā ekasyāḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā parayā viśeṣaṇaṃ pañca pañcakā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10097: nanvāpannapañcasaṃkhyakā janā eva punaḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā viśeṣyamāṇāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ pratyeṣyante
GSP33brssgo1u:10098: yathā pañca pañcapūlya iti pañcavaṃśatipūlāḥ pratīyante tadvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10100: yuktaṃ yatpañcapūlīśabdasya samāhārābhiprāyatvātkatīti satyāṃ bhedākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañca pañcapūlya iti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10101: iha tu pañca pañca janā ityādita eva bhedopādānātkatītyasatyāṃ bhedākāṅkṣāyāṃ na pañca pañcajanā iti viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo1u:10102: bhavadapīdaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ pañcasaṃkhyāyā eva bhavet, tatra cokto doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10110: sa ca pañcaviṃśatāvantargata eveti na tasyaivādhāratvamādheyatvaṃ ca yujyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10115: kathaṃ ca saṃkhyāmātraśravaṇe satyaśrutānāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānāmupasaṃgrahaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10119: ucyate- 'diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām' (pā. sū. 2.1.50) iti viśeṣaṇasmaraṇātsaṃjñāyāmeva pañcaśabdasya janaśabdena samāsaḥ tataśca
GSP33brssgo1u:10120: rūḍhatvābhiprāyeṇaiva kecitpañcajanā nāma vivakṣyante na sāṃkhyatattvābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssgo1u:10122: pañcajanā nāma ye kecitte ca pañcaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10136: pañcajanaśabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaparo 'nyaparo veti yogarūḍhyoraniścayāt saṃśaye yathā tattvavidyādhikāre chāgāyāṃ tātparyābhāvādajāpade rūḍhityāgastathā pañcamanuṣyeṣu tātparyābhāvātpañcajanaśabdena rūḍhiṃ tyaktvā tattvāni grāhyāṇītidṛṣṭāntasaṃgatiṃ sūcayan mantramudāhṛtya
GSP33brssgo1u:10140: tatra catvāraḥ sūtraṃ annaṃ virāṭ tayoḥ kāraṇamavyākṛtamākāśaśca yasminnadhyastāstamevātmānamamṛtaṃ brahma manye /
GSP33brssgo1u:10142: nanvastu pañcatvaśiṣṭeṣu pañcajaneṣu punaḥ pañcatvānvayāt pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītiḥ, tāvatā kathaṃ sāṃkhyatattvagraha ityāśaṅkya saṃkhyāyā dharmyākāṅkṣāyāṃ tattvāni grāhyāṇītyāha-tatheti jagato mūlabhūtā prakṛtistriguṇātmakaṃ pradhānamanāditvādavikṛtiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10146: ahaṅkārastāmasaḥ pañcatanmātrāṇāṃ śabdādīnāṃ prakṛtiḥ, sāttvika ekādaśendriyāṇām /
GSP33brssgo1u:10147: pañca tanmātrāśca pañcānāṃ sthūlabhūtānāmākāśādīnāṃ prakṛtayaḥ pañca sthūlabhūtānyekādaśendriyāṇi ceti ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyāko gaṇo vikāra eva na
GSP33brssgo1u:10155: yadyapi jñānakarmendriyeṣu daśasu jñānakaraṇatvaṃ karmakaraṇatvaṃ ca pañcakadvaye 'sti, pañcatanmātrāsu pañcasu sthūlaprakṛtitvaṃ ca, tathāpi yasminnityātmana ākāśasya ca pṛthagukteḥ sattvarajastamomahadahaṅkārāḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10156: pañca kartavyāḥ, manaścatvāri bhūtāni ca pañca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10166: pañcaśabdadvayena svavācyanyūnasaṃkhyādvāreṇa tadvyāpyā mahāsaṃkhyaiva lakṣyata iti sadṛṣṭāntaṃ śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10167: mukhyārthasya vakṣyamāṇatvāllakṣaṇā na yukteti pariharati-tadapi neti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10174: tathāca na dvitīyapañcaśabdajanaśabdayoḥ samāsaṃ vināntyasyākārasyodāttatvaṃ pūrveṣāmanudāttatatvaṃ ca ghaṭate 'samāsasya'iti sūtreṇa samāsasyāntodāttavidhānāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10175: 'anudāttaṃ padamekavarjam'iti ca sūtreṇa yasminpade udāttaḥ svarito vā
GSP33brssgo1u:10176: yasya varṇasya vidhīyate tamekaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭaṃ tatpadamanudāttaṃ bhavatīti vidhānādeva māntrikāntodāttasvareṇaikapadatvaniścayaḥ bhāṣikākhye tu śatapathabrahmaṇasvaravidhāyakagranthe 'svarito 'nudātto
GSP33brssgo1u:10177: vā'iti sūtreṇa yo mantradaśāyāmanudāttaḥ svarito vā sa
GSP33brssgo1u:10181: tathā cāntyanakārāduparitana ākāra ākāśaścetyanena śliṣṭatayā paṭhyamāno
GSP33brssgo1u:10182: 'nudātto bhavati, ayamantānudāttasvaraḥ pāribhāṣikastena brāhmaṇasvareṇaikapadatvaṃ niścīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10185: antānudāttaṃ hi samāmnātāraḥ pañcajanaśabdamadhīyata iti pāṭhakaprasiddhirasiddheti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10186: tathā ca pañca pañcajanā iti māntrikāntodāttaḥ svaraḥ, yasmin pañca pañcajanā ityantānudātto brāhnasvara iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10189: ājya, tvā tvāṃ pañcānāṃ pañcajanānāṃ devaviśeṣāṇāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi ityājyagrahaṇamantraśeṣaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10190: devatānāṃ karmaṇi yantradavasthitaṃ śarīraṃ tadeva dhartraṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10194: janapañcakamekaṃ pañcakānāṃ pañcakaṃ dvitīyamiti pañcakadvayaṃ tasya pañcapañceti grahaṇaṃ netyakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10196: parasparānvayaḥ, kiṃ vā tayoḥ śuddhajanairanvayaḥ, athavā pañcatvaviśiṣṭairjanairaparapañcatvasyānvayaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10207: pañcānāṃ pūlānāṃ samāhārā ityatra 'saṃkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ'iti samāso vihitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10208: tato 'dvigoḥ'iti sūtreṇa ṅīpo vidhānāt samāhārapratītau samāhārāḥ katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ pañcetipadāntarānvayo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10209: pañcajanā ityatra tu ṅībantatvābhāvena samāhārasyāpratīteḥ janānāṃ cādita eva pañcatvopādānātsaṃkhyākāṅkṣāyā asattvātpañceti padāntaraṃ nānveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10212: nanu janānāṃ nirākāṅkṣatve 'pi tadviśeṣaṇībhūtapañcatvāni katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañcatvāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatvityāśaṅkate-bhavadapīti
GSP33brssgo1u:10213: nopasarjanasyopasarjanāntareṇānvayaḥ kintu pradhānenaiveti nopasarjanyāyavirodha ukta iti pariharati-tatra ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10221: naca sattvarajastamasāṃ pṛthaggaṇanayā seṣṭeti vācyam, ākāśasya
GSP33brssgo1u:10222: pṛthaguktivaiyarthyāt, yasminnityātmani tattvānāṃ pratiṣṭhoktivirodhāttava mate svatantrapradhānasyaivānādhāratvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:10224: kiṃ ca pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītāvapi na sāṃkhyatattvānāṃ grahaṇamityāha-kathaṃ ceti
GSP33brssgo1u:10229: pañca ca te janāśceti karmadhārayādisamāsāntarātsaṃjñāsamāsasyāptoktyā balavattvaṃ tāvadāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10230: vigvācinaḥ saṃkhyāvācinaśca śabdāḥ saṃjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ subantetottarapadena samasyante
GSP33brssgo1u:10238: prāṇādayaḥ pañca nirdiṣṭāḥ - 'prāṇasya prāṇamuta cakṣuṣaścakṣuruta śrotrasya śrotramannasyānnaṃ manaso ye mano viduḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10242: samāne tu prasiddhyatikrame vākyaśeṣavaśātprāṇādaya eva gpahītavyā bhavanti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10244: janavacanaśca puruṣaśabdaḥ prāṇeṣu prayuktaḥ 'te vā ete pañca
GSP33brssgo1u:10246: 'prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo ha mātā' (chā.7.15.1) ityādi ca brāhmaṇam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10250: prasiddhārthasaṃnidhāne hyaprasiddhārthaḥ śabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ samabhivyāhārāttadviṣayo niyamyate, yathā 'udbhidā yajeta' 'yūpaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10252: tathāyamapi pañcajanaśabdaḥ samāsānvākhyānādavagatasaṃjñābhāvaḥ saṃjñyākāṅkṣī vākyaśeṣasamabhivyāhṛteṣu prāṇādiṣu vartiṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10253: kaiścittu devāḥ pitaro gandharvā asurā rakṣāṃsi ca pañca pañcajanā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10261: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10262: janavācakaḥ śabdo janaśabdaḥ pañcajanaśabda iti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10267: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10268: pañcajanaśabdasya prāṇādiṣu kayā vṛttyā prayoga iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10270: yathā tava tattveṣu janaśabdasya lakṣaṇaya prayogastathā mama prāṇādiṣu pañcajanaśabdasya lakṣaṇayetyāha-tattveṣviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10278: nanu jāyanta iti janā mahadādayaḥ, janakatvājjanaḥ pradhānamiti yogasaṃbhave kimiti rūḍhimāśritya lakṣaṇāprayāsa ityata āha-samāseti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10279: yathā aśvakarṇaśabdasya varṇasamudāyasya vṛkṣe rūḍhirevaṃ pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhireva nāvayavaśaktyātmako yoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10283: janasaṃbandhācceti pūrvabhāṣye nareṣu pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhimāśritya prāṇādiṣu lakṣaṇoktā
GSP33brssgo1u:10284: iha tu prauḍhivādena prāṇādiṣu rūḍhirucyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10286: 'udbhidā yajeta paśukāmaḥ'ityatrodbhitpadaṃ vidheyaguṇārthakaṃ karmanāmadheyaṃ veti saṃśaye khanitrādāvudbhitpadasya prasiddheryāganāmatve prasiddhivirodhājjyotiṣṭome guṇavidhiriti prāpte
GSP33brssgo1u:10288: tataśṭodbhidetyaprasiddhasya tṛtīyāntasya yāgenetyanena prasiddhārthakena sāmānādhikaraṇyena tannāmatvaṃ niścīyate, udbhinatti paśūnsādhayatīti prasiddheravirodhādaperakṛtajyotiṣṭome guṇavidhyayogāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:10290: tathā chinattīti prasiddhārthacchedanayogyārthakaśabdasamabhivyāhārāddāruviśeṣo yūpaśabdārthaḥ karotīti samabhivyāhārādvediśabdārthaḥ saṃskārayogyasthaṇḍilaviśeṣa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10291: tathā prasiddhārtakaprāṇādiśabdasamabhivyāhārāt pañcajanaśabdaḥ prāṇādyarthaka iti niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10295: pāñcajanyayā prajayā viśatīti viṭ tayā viśāpuruṣarūpayendrasyāhvānārthaṃ ghoṣāḥ sṛṣṭā iti yattadyuktaṃ, ghoṣātirekeṇendrāhvānāyogāditi śrutyanusāreṇa prajāmātragrahe 'pi na virodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10302: kāṇvānāṃ tu kathaṃ prāṇādayaḥ pañcajanā bhaveyurye 'nnaṃ prāṇādiṣu nāmanantīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10305: asatyapi kāṇvānāmanne jyotiṣā teṣāṃ pañcasaṃkhyā pūryeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10308: kathaṃ punarubhayeṣāmapi tulyavadidaṃ jyotiḥ paṭhyamānaṃ samānamantragatayā pañcasaṃkhyayā keṣāñcidgrṛhyate keṣāñcinneti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10318: jyotiṣāṃ sūryādīnāṃ jyotistadbrahma devā upāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10320: tatkāṇvānāṃ pañacatvapūraṇāya gṛhyate nānyeṣāmiti vikalpo na yukta iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10322: yathā atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti iti vākyabhedādvikalpastadvacchākhābhedenānnapāṭhāpāṭhābhyāṃ jyotiṣo vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10323: nanu kriyāyāṃ vikalpo yukto na vastunīti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:10325: atrāpi śākhāmedena sānnā jyotiḥsahitā vā pañca prāṇādayo yatra pratiṣṭhitāstanmanasānudraṣṭavyamiti dhyānakriyāyāṃ vikalpopapattirityanavadyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10335: tatredamaparamāśaṅkate- na janmādikaraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo brahmaviṣayaṃ vā gatisāmānyaṃ vedāntavākyānāṃ pratipattuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10342: kvacitprāṇādikā- 'sa prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhām' (pra. 6.4) iti kvacidakrameṇaiva lokānāmutpattirāmnāyate- sa imāṃllokānasṛjata /
GSP33brssgo1u:10344: tathā kvacidasatpūrvikā sṛṣṭiḥ paṭhyate- 'asadvā idamagra āsīttato vai
GSP33brssgo1u:10348: āhurasadevedamagra āsīt' ityupakramya 'kutastu khalu somyaivaṃ syāditi
GSP33brssgo1u:10349: hovāca kathamasataḥ sajjāyeteti sattveva somyedamagra āsīt' (chā. 6.2.1,2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10353: evamanekadhā vipratipattirvastuni ca vikalpasyānupapatterna vedāntavākyānāṃ jagatkāraṇāvadhāraṇaparatā nyāyyā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10355: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - satyapi prativedāntaṃ sṛjyamāneṣvākāśādiṣu
GSP33brssgo1u:10362: atra tāvajjñānaśabdena pareṇa ca tadviṣayeṇa kāmayitṛtvavacanena cetanaṃ brahma nyarūpayadaparaprayojyatveneśvaraṃ kāraṇamabravīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10363: tadviṣayeṇaiva pareṇātmaśabdena śarīrādikośaparaṃparayā cāntaranupraveśanena sarveṣāmantaḥ pratyagātmānaṃ niradhārayat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10366: tathā 'idaṃ sarvamasṛjata yadidaṃ kiñca' (tai.2.6) iti samastajagatsṛṣṭinirdeśena prākhsṛṣṭeradvitīyaṃ sraṣṭāramācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssgo1u:10367: tadatra yallakṣaṇaṃ brahma kāraṇatvena vijñātaṃ tallakṣaṇamevānyatrāpi
GSP33brssgo1u:10368: vijñāyate- 'sadeva semyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti
GSP33brssgo1u:10370: tathā 'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīnnānyakiñcana miṣat /
GSP33brssgo1u:10371: sa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjai' (ai.u. 4.1.1,2) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10373: kāryaviṣayaṃ tu vigānaṃ dṛśyate kvacidākāśādikā sṛṣṭiḥ kvacittejādiketyevañjātīyakam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10374: naca kāryaviṣayeṇa vigānena kāraṇamapi brahma sarvavedānteṣvavigītamadhigamyamānamavivakṣitaṃ bhavitumarhatīti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssgo1u:10379: nahi tatpratibaddhaḥ kvacitpuruṣārtho dṛśyate śrūyate vā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10380: naca kalpayituṃ śakyate, upakramopasaṃhārābhyāṃ tatra tatra
GSP33brssgo1u:10382: darśayati ca sṛṣṭyādiprapañcasya brahmapratipattyarthatām- 'annena somya śuṅgenāpo mūlamanvicchadbhiḥ somya śuṅgena tejo mulamanviccha tejasā somya
GSP33brssgo1u:10384: mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiśca kāryasya kāraṇenābhedaṃ vadituṃ sṛṣṭyādiprapañcaḥ śrāvyata iti gamyate
GSP33brssgo1u:10411: adhikaraṇatrayeṇa pradhānasyāśrautatvoktyā jagatkāraṇatvalakṣaṇena brahmaṇa eva buddhisthatā, tasminneva buddhisthe nirviśeṣe brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti sādhitaṃ pūrvasūtrasaṃdarbheṇa tatra lakṣaṇasamanvayayorasiddhireva, śrutīnāṃ virodhadarśanādityākṣeparūpāṃ tenāsya saṃgatimāha-tatreti
GSP33brssgo1u:10412: na cāvirodhacintāyā dvitīyādhyāye saṃgatirnāsminnadhyāya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo1u:10414: dvitīyādhyāyārthatvāt, tatpadavācyajagatkāraṇavādiśrutīnāṃ mitho virodhādvācyārthānirṇayena lakṣye samanvayāsiddhau prāptāyāṃ tatsādhakāvirodhacintāyā atraiva saṃgatatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10415: na caivaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmapyavirodho 'traiva cintanīya iti vācyam,
GSP33brssgo1u:10417: kimarthaṃ tarhi dvitīye taccintanaṃ, sthūlabuddhisamādhānārthamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10418: iha tu sūkṣmadṛśāṃ vākyārthe samanvayajñānāya tatpadārthaśrutivirodhaḥ parihriyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10419: tadyapi tvaṃpadārthaśrutivirodho 'tra parihartavyaḥ tathāpi prathamasūtreṇa bandhamithyātvasūcanādavirodhaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10422: tāḥ kiṃ brahmaṇi mānaṃ na veti saṃśaye 'nnajyotiṣoḥ saṃkhyādṛṣṭikriyāyāṃ vikalpe 'pi kāraṇe vastunyasadvā sadvā
GSP33brssgo1u:10426: pūrvapakṣe samanvayāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ, siddhānte tatsiddhiriti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10445: tadidaṃ jagaddha kila tarhi prākkāle 'vyākṛtaṃ kāraṇātmakāmāsīt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10449: tatra sṛṣṭau virodhamaṅgīkṛtya sraṣṭari virodhaṃ pariharati-satyapīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10450: ākāśādiṣu brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatve virodho naivāstīti pratijñāyāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10459: yathā taittirīyake sarvajñatvādikaṃ kāraṇasya tathā chāndogyādāvapi dṛśyata ityāha-tadatra yallakṣaṇamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10462: tathāpi kārye virodhātkāraṇe 'pi virodhaḥ syādityāśaṅkya niṣedhati-kāryaviṣayaṃ tvityādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:10463: svapnasṛṣṭīnāṃ pratyahamanyathātvena so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyamāne draṣṭaryapi nānātvaṃ prasajyetetyāha-atiprasaṅgāditi
GSP33brssgo1u:10468: phalavadbrahmavākyaśeṣatvena sṛṣṭivākyānāmarthavattvasaṃbhavānna svārthe pṛthakphalaṃ kalpyaṃ, vākyabhedāpatterityāha-naca kalpayitumiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10470: śuṅgena kāryeṇa liṅgena kāraṇabrahmajñānārthatvaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmuktvā kāraṇasyādvayatvajñānaṃ phalāntamāha-mṛdādīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10471: evaṃ niṣphalāyāmanyārthāyāṃ sṛṣṭau tātparyābhāvādvirodho na doṣa ityatra
GSP33brssgo1u:10481: yatpunaḥ kāraṇaviṣayaṃ vigānaṃ darśitam- 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' ityādi tatparihartavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10489: santamenaṃ tato viduḥ' ityasadvādāpavādenāstitvalakṣaṇaṃ brahmānnamayādikośaparamparayā pratyagātmānaṃ nirdhārya 'so 'kāmayata' iti tameva prakṛtaṃ samākṛṣya saprapañcāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ tasmācchrāvayitvā
GSP33brssgo1u:10490: 'tatsatyamityācakṣate' iti copasaṃhṛtya 'tadapyeṣa śloko bhavati' iti tasminneva prakṛter'the ślokamimamudāharati- 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10493: tasmānnāmarūpavyākṛtavastuviṣayaḥ prāyeṇa sacchabdaḥ prasiddha iti tadvyākaraṇābhāvāpekṣayā prāgutpatteḥ sadeva brahmāsadivāsīdityupacaryate
GSP33brssgo1u:10501: jagato vyākaraṇaṃ kathyate, 'sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ānakhāgrebhyaḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:10503: niradhyakṣe vyākaraṇābhyupagame hyanantareṇa prakṛtāvalambanā sa ityanena sarvanāmnā kaḥ kāryānupraveśitvena samākṛṣyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10505: praviṣṭasya cetanatvaśravaṇāt 'paśyaṃścakṣuḥ śṛṇvañśrotraṃ manvāno manaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10507: apica yādṛśamidamadyatve nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākriyamāṇaṃ jagatsādhyakṣaṃ vyākriyata evamādisarge 'pīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10511: vyākriyata ityapi karmakartari lakāraḥ satyeva parameśvare vyākartari saukaryamapekṣya draṣṭavyaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10512: yathā lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti satyeva pūrṇake lavitari /
GSP33brssgo1u:10520: evaṃ sṛṣṭidvārakaṃ virodhamutsūtraṃ samādhāya kāraṇasya sadasattvādinā sākṣācchrutivirodhanirāsārthaṃ sūtramādatte-yatpunariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10521: yato 'stitvalakṣaṇaṃ brahma nirdhārya tasminneva ślokamudāharati, ato
GSP33brssgo1u:10523: tat tatra sadātmani śloko mantro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10530: nanvasatpadalakṣaṇā na yuktā, śrutibhireva svamatabhedenoditānuditahomavadvikalpasya darśitatvādityata
GSP33brssgo1u:10532: eke śākhina ityartho na bhavati, kintu anādisaṃsāracakrasthā vedabāhyā
GSP33brssgo1u:10534: śūnyanirāsena śrutibhiḥ sadvādasyaiveṣṭatvāttāsāṃ virodhasphūrtinirāsāya lakṣaṇā yukteti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10537: nanu kartrabhāva eva parāmṛśyata ityata āha-cetanasya cāyamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10538: cakṣurdraṣṭā, śrotraṃ śrotā, mano mantetyucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10541: nanu karmakārakādanyasya kartuḥ sattve karmaṇa eva kartṛvācilakāro viruddha ityata āha-vyākriyata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10544: vyākriyate jagatsvayameva niṣpannamiti vyākhyāya kenacidvyākṛtamiti vyācaṣṭe-yadveti
GSP33brssgo1u:10551: kauṣītakibrāhmaṇe bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvāde śrūyate- 'yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10552: kartā yasya vai tatkarma sa veditavyaḥ' (kau. brā. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10553: tatra kiṃ jīvo veditavyatvenopadiśyata uta mukhyaḥ prāṇa uta paramātmeti viśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10559: vākyaśeṣe ca 'athāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' iti prāṇaśabdadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10562: ityevamādayaḥ puruṣā nirdiṣṭāsteṣāmapi bhavati prāṇaḥ kartā prāṇāvasthāviśeṣatvādityādidevatātmanām
GSP33brssgo1u:10563: 'katama eko deva iti prāṇa iti sa brahma tyadityācakṣate (bṛ. 3.9.9) iti śrutyantaraprasiddheḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10565: tasyāpi dharmādharmalakṣaṇaṃ karma śakyate śrāvayitum 'yasya vaitatkarma' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10569: yatkāraṇaṃ veditavyatayopanyastasya puruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāyopetaṃ bālākiṃ prati bubodhayiṣurajātaśatruḥ suptaṃ puruṣamāmantryāmantraṇaśabdāśravaṇātprāṇādīnāmabhoktṛtvaṃ pratibodhya yaṣṭighātotthānātprāṇādivyatiriktaṃ jīvaṃ bhoktāraṃ pratibodhayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10570: tathā parastādapi jīvaliṅgamavagamyate- 'tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhina bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prajñātmaitairātmabhirbhuṅkte
GSP33brssgo1u:10571: evamevaita ātmāna etamātmānaṃ bhuñjanti' (kau. brā. 4.20) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10575: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - parameśvara evāyameteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10578: iha hi bālākirajātaśatruṇā saha 'brahma te bravāṇi' iti saṃvaditumupacakrame /
GSP33brssgo1u:10580: tamajātaśatruḥ 'mṛṣā vai khalu mā saṃvadiṣṭā brahma te bravāṇi' ityamukhya brahmavāditayāpodya tatkartāramanyaṃ veditavyatayopacikṣepa /
GSP33brssgo1u:10583: kartṛtvaṃ caiteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na parameśvarādanyasya svātantryeṇāvakalpate
GSP33brssgo1u:10590: liṅgavacanavigānācca nāpi puruṣaviṣayasya karotyarthasya kriyāphalasya vāyaṃ nirdeśaḥ, kartṛśabdenaiva tayorapapāttatvāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10595: tathāpyasati viśeṣopādāne sādhāraṇenārthena saṃnidhānena saṃnihitavastumātrasyāyaṃ nirdeśa iti gamyate na viśiṣṭasya kasyacit /
GSP33brssgo1u:10597: pūrvatra ca jagadekadeśabhūtānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ viśeṣopādānadaviśeṣitaṃ jagadevehopādīyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10598: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ya eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ jagadekadeśabhūtānāṃ kartā,
GSP33brssgo1u:10599: kimanena viśeṣeṇa, yasya kṛtsnameva jagadaviśeṣitaṃ karmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10601: ye bālākinā brahmatvābhimatāḥ puruṣāḥ kīrtitāsteṣāmabrahmatvakhyāpanāya viśeṣopādānam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10602: evaṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakanyāyena sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāṃ jagataḥ kartā veditavyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10608: yatkāraṇaṃ yasmājjīvaṃ bodhayati tasmādasti suptotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10612: balākāyā apatyaṃ bālākirbrāhmaṇastaṃ prati rājovāca-yo vā iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10613: na kevalamādityādīnāṃ kartā kintu sarvasya jagata ityāha-yasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10618: iha tu vākyabhedāt 'brahma te bravāṇi'iti bālākivākyasthabrahmaśabdena prāṇādiśabdo brahmaparatvena netumāśakya iti pratyudāharaṇena
GSP33brssgo1u:10620: pūrvapakṣe vākyasya prāṇādyupāstiparatvādbrahmaṇi samanvayāsiddhiḥ siddhānte jñeye samanvayasiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10623: śrutaṃ puruṣakartṛtvaṃ prāṇasya kathamityata āha-ye caita iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10624: sūtrātmakaprāṇasya vikāraḥ sūryādaya ityatra mānamāha-kratama iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10625: yasya mahimānaḥ sarve devā iti pūrvavākye darśitaṃ, ataḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10630: yatkāraṇaṃ yasmājjīvaṃ bodhayati tasmādasti suptotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgamiti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10632: taṃ rājā he bṛhatpāṇḍaravāsaḥ somarājannityāmantrya saṃbodhya saṃbodhanānabhijñatvāt prāṇāderanātmatvamuktvā yaṣṭhyāghātenotthāpya jīvaṃ bodhitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10633: śroṣṭhī pradhānaḥ svairbhṛtyairjñātibhirupahṛtaṃ bhuṅkte svāḥ jñātayaśca
GSP33brssgo1u:10634: tamupajīvanti, evaṃ jīvo 'pi ādityādibhiḥ prakāśādinā bhogopakaraṇairbhuṅkte te ca havirgrahaṇādinā jīvamupajīvantītyuktaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10635: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo jīve kathamityata
GSP33brssgo1u:10638: sa ca bālākirbrahmatvabhrāntyā vyaṣṭiliṅgarūpānpuruṣānuktvā rājñā nirastastūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10639: tvaduktaṃ brahma mṛṣetyuktvā rājñocyamānaṃ brahmaiveti vaktavyamanyathārājño 'pi mṛṣāvāditvaprasaṅgādityāha-yadi so 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10646: atra prakaraṇopapadayorasattvātkasya grahaṇamiti saṃśaye puruṣakartṛpadasāṃnidhyāt kriyata iti yogājjagadgrahaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10649: nanu puruṣotpādakasya karturvyāpāraḥ karotyarthaṃ utpādanaṃ tasyaphalaṃ puruṣajanma tadanyataravācī karmaśabdo 'stvityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10653: prakaraṇādikaṃ hi sarvanāmnaḥ saṃkocakaṃ, tasminnasati sāmānyena buddhisthaṃ sarvameva gṛhyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10654: atra ca saṃkocakāsattvātsarvārthakena sarvanāmnā buddhisthasya kāryamātrasya karmaśabdo vācaka ityāha-tathāpīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10659: brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyāḥ parivrājakāścetyatra yathā brahmaṇaśabdaḥ parivrājakānyaviṣayaḥ tathātra
GSP33brssgo1u:10661: astu jagatkartā veditavyaḥ, parameśvarasya kimāyātamityata āha-parameśvareti //16//
GSP33brssgo1u:10665: ata yaduktaṃ vākyaśeṣagatājjīvaliṅgānmukhyaprāṇaliṅgācca tayorevānyatarasyeha grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ na parameśvarasyeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10669: trividhaṃ hyatropāsanamevaṃ sati prasajjyeta jīvopāsanaṃ mukhyaprāṇopāsanaṃ brahmopāsanaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10674: 'sarvānpāpmano 'pahṛtya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyamādhipatyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda' iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10679: prāṇaśabdo 'pi brahmaviṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssgo1u:10688: 'saṃbhavatyekavākyatve vākyabhedo hi neṣyate'ityuktaṃ cet punaruktiḥ syāditi śaṅkate-nanvevamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:10689: karmapadasya rūḍhyā pūrvapakṣaprāptau tannirāsārthamasyārambho yukta ityāha-netyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:10694: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke |
GSP33brssgo1u:10695: apica naivātra vivaditavyaṃ jīvapradhānaṃ vedaṃ vākyaṃ syādbrahmapradhānaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10699: praśnastāvatsuṣuptapuruṣapratibodhanena prāṇādivyatirikte jīve pratibodhite punarjīvavyatiriktaviṣayo dṛśyate- 'kvaiṣa etadbālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa kva vā etadabhūtkuta etadāgāt' (kau.brā. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10700: prativacanamapi 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityādi 'etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devā devebhyo lokāḥ' (kau.brā. 4.20) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10701: suṣuptikāle ca pareṇa brahmaṇā jīva ekatāṃ gacchati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10702: parasmācca brahmaṇaḥ prāṇādikaṃ jagajjāyata iti vedāntamaryādā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10703: tasmādyatrāsya jīvasya niḥsaṃbodhatāsvacchatārūpaḥ svāpa upādhijanitaviśeṣavijñānarahitaṃ svarūpaṃ, yatastaddhaṃśarūpamāgamanaṃ, so
GSP33brssgo1u:10705: apicaivameke śākhino vājasaneyino 'sminneva bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvāde spaṣṭaṃ vijñānamayaśabdena jīvamāmnāya tadvyatiriktaṃ paramātmānamāmananti- 'ya eṣa vijñānamayapuruṣaḥ kvaiṣa tadābhūtkuta
GSP33brssgo1u:10710: 'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti' iti copādhimatāmātmanāmanyato vyuccaraṇamāmanantaḥ paramātmānameva kāraṇatvenāmanantīti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10718: he bālāke, etacchayanaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathaiṣa puruṣaḥ kvāśayiṣṭa /
GSP33brssgo1u:10721: etadbhavanamekībhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā eṣa puruṣaḥ kvābhūtsuptaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10724: etadāgamanamaikyabhraṃśarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā puruṣaḥ kuta āgata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10727: uttare prāṇokteḥ praśno 'pi prāṇaviśaya ityata āha-suṣuptikāle ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10734: nanu tatrākāśaḥ suṣuptisthānamuktaṃ na brahmetyata āha-ākāśeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10736: evaṃ jīvanirāsārthakatvena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya prāṇanirāsaparatvenāpi vyācaṣṭe-prāṇeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10739: api caike śākhina evameva prāṇātiriktaṃ jīvātmānamāmanantaḥ prāṇasya vākyārthatvaṃ vārayantīti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10747: bṛhadāraṇyake maitreyībrāhmaṇe 'dhīyate- 'na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya'
GSP33brssgo1u:10748: ityupakramya 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyo maitreyyātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' /
GSP33brssgo1u:10749: (bṛ. 4.5.6) iti, tatraitadvicikitsyate- kiṃ vijñānātmaivāyaṃ draṣṭavyaśrotavyatvādirūpeṇopadiśyata āhosvitparamātmeti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10756: patijāyāputravittādikaṃ hi bhogyabhūtaṃ sarvaṃ jagadātmārthatayā priyaṃ bhavatīti priyasaṃsūcitaṃ bhoktāramātmānamukramyānantaramidamātmano darśanādyupadiśyamānaṃ kasyānyasyātmanaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10758: bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tānyevānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti' iti prakṛtasyaiva mahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena bruvanvijñānātmanaṃ evedaṃ draṣṭavyatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10759: tathā 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti kartṛvacanena śabdenopasaṃharanvijñānātmānamevehopadiṣṭaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10764: vākyaṃ hīdaṃ paurvāparyeṇāvekṣyamāṇaṃ paramātmānaṃprati anvitāvayavaṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10765: kathamiti, tadupapādyate- 'amṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena' iti yājñavalkyādupaśrutya 'yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tena kuryāṃ yadeva
GSP33brssgo1u:10766: bhagavānveda tadeva me brūhi' ityamṛtatvamāśāsānāya maitreyyā yājñavalkya
GSP33brssgo1u:10770: nacaitadaupacārikamāśrayituṃ śakyaṃ, yatkāraṇamātmavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāyānantareṇa granthena tadevopapādayati- 'brahma taṃ parādādyo 'nyatrātmano brahma veda' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo1u:10771: yo hi brahmakṣatrādikaṃ jagadātmanonyatra svātantryeṇa labdhasadbhāvaṃ paśyati taṃ mithyādarśinaṃ tadeva mithyādṛṣṭaṃ brahmakṣatrādikaṃ jagatparākarotīti bhedadṛṣṭimapodya 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' iti sarvasya vastujātasyātmāvyatirekamavatārayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10773: 'asya mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ' ( bṛ. 4.5.11) ityādinā ca prakṛtasyātmano nāmarūpakarmaprapañcakāraṇatāṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10775: tathaivaikāyanaprakriyāyāmapi (bṛ. 4.5.12) saviṣayasya sendriyasya sāntaḥkaraṇasya prapañcasyaikāyanamanantaramabāhyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ prajñānaghanaṃ vyācakṣāṇaḥ paramātmānamenaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:10787: ṛgvedādikaṃ nāma, iṣṭaṃ hutamiti karma, ayaṃ ca loka iti rūpam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10797: yathā 'brahma te bravāṇi'ityupakramabalādvākyasya brahmaparatvaṃ tathātra jīvopakramādasya vākyasya jīvaparatvamiti dṛṣṭāntena
GSP33brssgo1u:10799: pūrvapakṣe vākyasya jīvopāstiparatvaṃ, siddhānte jñeye pratyagbrahmaṇi
GSP33brssgo1u:10806: etebhyaḥkāryakāraṇātmanā jāyamānebhyo bhūtebhayaḥ sāmyenotthāya bhūtopādhikaṃ janmānubhūya tānyeva bhūtāni nīyamānānyanusṛtya vinaśyati
GSP33brssgo1u:10816: yathā dundubhiśaṅkhavīṇāśabdasāmānyagrahaṇenaiva gṛhyamāṇāstadavāntaraviśeṣāḥ śuktigrahaṇagrāhyarajatavat sāmānye kalpitāstato na bhidyante, evamātmabhānabhāsyaṃ sarvamātmamātramiti niścitamityāha-dundubhyāditi evamekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāyā mukhyatvādbrahmaniścayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10820: ayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca loka iti rūpam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10821: kiñca 'sa yathā sarvāsāmapāṃ samudra ekāyanam'iti kaṇḍikayā sarvaprapañcasya mukhyalayādhāratvamātmano
GSP33brssgo1u:10828: astyatra pratijñā 'ātmani vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' 'idaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10830: tasyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ siddhiṃ sūcayatyetalliṅgaṃ yatpriyasaṃsūcitasyātmano draṣṭavyatvādisaṃkīrtanam
GSP33brssgo1u:10831: yadi hi vijñānātmā paramātmano 'nyaḥ syāttataḥ paramātmavijñāne 'pi
GSP33brssgo1u:10832: vijñānātmā na vijñāta ityekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ yatpratijñātaṃ taddhīyeta /
GSP33brssgo1u:10839: śrutiścaivaṃ bhavati- 'eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' (chā. 8.12.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10840: kvacicca jīvāśrayamapi nāmarūpaṃ nadīnidarśanena jñāpayati- 'yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudre 'staṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya /
GSP33brssgo1u:10843: yathā loke nadyaḥ svāśrayameva nāmarūpaṃ vihāya samudramupayantyevaṃ jīvo 'pi svāśrayameva nāmarūpaṃ vihāya paraṃ puruṣamupaitīti hi tatrārthaḥ pratīyate dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayostulyatāyai FN: samutthānamutkrāntiḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10847: nanu saṃsārasyaupādhikatvāt sarvadaivābheda ityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntabalena saṃsārasya svābhāvikatvamityāha-kvacicceti
GSP33brssgo1u:10848: 'yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudrestaṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya'iti
GSP33brssgo1u:10858: mantravarṇaśca- 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste (tai.ā. 3.12.7) ityevañjātīyakāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10859: naca tejaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ sṛṣṭau jīvasya pṛthaksṛṣṭiḥ, śrutā, yena parasmādātmano 'nyastadvikāro jīvaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:10860: kāśakṛtsnasyācāryasyāvikṛtaḥ parameśvaro jīvo nānya iti matam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10861: āśmarathyasya tu yadyapi jīvasya parasmādananyatvamabhipretaṃ, tathāpi pratijñāsiddheriti sāpekṣatvābhidhānātkāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kiyānapyabhipreta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10862: auḍulomipakṣe punaḥ spaṣṭamevāvasthāntarāpekṣau bhedābhedau gamyete tatra kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ mataṃ śrutyanusārīti gamyate, pratipādayiṣitārthānusārāt
GSP33brssgo1u:10865: vikārātmakatve hi jīvasyābhyupagamyamāne vikārasya prakṛtisaṃbandhe pralayaprasaṅgānna tajjñānādamṛtamavakalpeta
GSP33brssgo1u:10866: ataśca svāśrayasya nāmarūpasyāsaṃbhavādupādhyāśrayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ jīva upacaryate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10867: ata evotpattirapi jīvasya kvacidagnivisphuliṅgodāharaṇena śrāvyamāṇopādhyāśrayaiva veditavyā
GSP33brssgo1u:10868: yadapyuktaṃ prakṛtasyaiva mahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena darśayanvijñānātmana evedaṃ draṣṭavyatvaṃ darśayatīti, tatrāpiyameva trisūtrī yojayitavyā 'pratijñāsiddherliṅgamāśmarathyaḥ' /
GSP33brssgo1u:10869: idamatra pratijñātam- 'ātmani vidite sarvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati' 'idaṃ sarvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:10872: tasyā eva pratijñāyāḥ siddhiṃ sūcatyetalliṅgaṃ yanmahato bhūtasya draṣṭavyasya bhūtebhyaḥ samutthānaṃ vijñānātmabhāvena kathitamityāśmarathya ācāryo manyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10873: abhede hi satyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñātamavakalpayata iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10883: 'atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanna pretya saṃjñāsti' iti paryanuyujya svayameva śrutyārthāntarasya darśitatvāt- 'na vā are 'haṃ mohaṃ bravīmyavināśī vā are 'yamātmānucchittidharmā mātrāsaṃsargastvasya
GSP33brssgo1u:10885: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kūṭasthanitya evāyaṃ vijñānaghana ātmā nāsyocchedaprasaṅgo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10887: saṃsargābhāve ca prakṛtasya viśeṣavijñānasyābhāvānna pretya saṃjñāstītyuktamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10888: yadapyuktam- 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti kartṛvacanena śabdenopasaṃhārādvijñānātmana evedaṃ draṣṭavyamiti, tadapi kāśakṛtsnīyenaiva darśanena parihapaṇīyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10889: apica 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 2.4.13)
GSP33brssgo1u:10890: ityārabhyāvidyāviṣaye tasyaiva darśanādilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣajñānaṃ prapañcya 'yatra tvasya sarvāmātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' ityādinā vidyāviṣaye tasyaiva darśanādilakṣaṇasya viśeṣavijñānasyābhāvamabhidadhāti punaśca viṣayābhāve 'pi ātmānaṃ vijānīyāt ityāśaṅkya 'vijñātāramare kena
GSP33brssgo1u:10892: tataśca viśeṣavijñānābhāvopapādānaparatvādvākyasya vijñānadhātureva kevalaḥ saṃnbhūtapūrvagatyā kartṛvacanena tṛcā nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:10894: ataśca vijñānātparamātmanoravidyāpratyupasthāpitanāmarūparacitadehādyupādhinim itto bhedo na pāramārthika ityeṣor'thaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10903: bhedadarśanāpavādācca 'anyo 'sāvanyo 'hamasmīti na sa veda yathā paśuḥ'
GSP33brssgo1u:10904: (bṛ. 1.4.10), 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ca iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
GSP33brssgo1u:10906: 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmājaro 'maro 'mṛto 'bhayo brahma' (bṛ. 4.425) iti cātmani sarvavikriyāpratiṣedhāt
GSP33brssgo1u:10911: 'tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' (īśā. 7) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:10913: sthite ca kṣetrajñaparamātmaikatvaviṣaya samyagdarśane kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti nāmamātrabhaidāt, kṣetrajño 'yaṃ paramātmano bhinnaḥ paramātmāyaṃ kṣetrajñādbhinna ityevañjātīyaka ātmabhaidaviṣayo nirbandho nirarthakaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10916: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyām' (tai. 2.1) iti kāñcidevaikāṃ guhāmadhikṛtyaitaduktam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10919: ye tu nirbandhaṃ kurvanti te vedāntārthaṃ bādhamānāḥ śreyodvāraṃ samyagdarśanameva bādhante
GSP33brssgo1u:10924: vicitya nirmāya teṣāṃ nāmāni kṛtvā tatrānupraviśyābhivadannabhivadanādi kurvan /
GSP33brssgo1u:10930: atyantābhedajñāpanārthaṃ jīvamupakramya draṣṭavyatvādayo brahmadharmā uktā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10936: jīvoddeśena brahmatvapratipādane bhedo 'pyāvaśyaka iti bhedābhedaśaṅkāprāptau kalpitabhedenoddeśyatvādikaṃ svato 'tyantābheda
GSP33brssgo1u:10938: jñāpane cātra liṅgamātmaśabdenopakrāntasya jīvasya dharmiṇo brahmaṇo dharmyantarasya grahaṇaṃ vinaiva brahmadharmakathanaṃ bhedābhede dharmidvayagrahaḥ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10940: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi kāryāṇi vicitya sṛṣṭvā teṣaṃ nāmāni ca kṛtvā teṣu buddhyādiṣu praviśyābhivadanādikaṃ kurvan yo vartate tadvidvānihaivāmṛto bhavatīti mantro 'pi jīvaparayoraikyaṃ darśayatītyāha-mantreti jīvasya brahmavikāratvānnaikyamityata āha-naca teja iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10949: kalpitasya bhedasya jñānānnivṛttiḥ saṃbhavati na satyasyetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:10952: utpattiśrutyā jīvasya brahmaṇā bhedābhedāvityata āha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10954: atra pūrvapakṣe bījatrayamuktaṃ jīvenopakramaḥ parasyaiva samutthānaśrutyā jīvābhedābhidhānaṃ vijñātṛśabdaśceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10962: mṛtasya saṃjñā nāstīti vākye 'traiva māṃ mohitavānasi jñānarūpasyātmano
GSP33brssgo1u:10963: jñānābhāve nāśaprasaṅgāditi maitreyyokto munirāha-na vā are iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10964: mohaṃ mohakaraṃ vākyam, avināśī nāśahetuśūnyaḥ, ata ucchittidharmā nāśavānna bhavatītyanucchittidharmetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10967: kāśakṛtsnasya mate tvatyantābhedādvijñānasya kārakābhāvātsa yukta iti śrutyanusāritvāttanmate manaḥkalpitaṃ vijñātṛtvaṃ mukte brahmātmani bhūtapūrvagatyoktamiti pariharaṇīyamityarthaḥ kiñca pūrvāparaparyālocanayā vākyasya muktātmaparatvāvagamādvijñātṛtvaṃ kalpitamevānūdyata iti na talliṅgena jīvaparatvamityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10972: hetūnāṃ bhedo na paramārthika iti pratijñayā saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10975: bhedasya satyatve tatpramayā bādhādahaṃ brahmeti nirvādhaṃ jñānaṃ na syādityāha-anyathāceti
GSP33brssgo1u:10981: ātyantikaikatve hi prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati na bhedābhedayoriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10986: kiñcāvidyātajjabuddhirūpāyāṃ guhāyāṃ sthito jīvo bhavati, tasyāmeva brahma nihitamiti śruteḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10990: nanvekasyāṃ guhāyāṃ dvau kiṃ na syātāmityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:10992: nanvatyantābhede jīvasya spaṣṭabhānādbrahmāpi spaṣṭaṃ syādataḥ spaṣṭatvāspaṣṭatvābhyāṃ tayorbheda iti cet /
GSP33brssgo1u:10994: darpaṇe pratibimbasya sphuṭatve 'pi bimbasyāsphuṭatvavat kalpitabhedena viruddhadharmavyavasthopapatteḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:10997: vedāntārthastadbodha eva niḥśreyasasādhanaṃ tasya bādho na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:10998: kiñca bhedābhadavādino jñānakarmabhyāṃ kṛtakaṃ mokṣaṃ kalpayanti,
GSP33brssgo1u:11000: yattu kṛtakamapi nityamiti, tacca 'yat kriyāsādhyaṃ tadanityam'iti
GSP33brssgo1u:11002: asmākaṃ tvanarthadhvaṃsasya jñānasādhyatvānnityamuktātmamātratvācca nānityatvadoṣa iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:11011: tacca lakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭarucakādīnāṃ mṛtsuvarṇādivatprakṛtitve kulālasuvarṇakārādivannimittatve ca samānamityato bhavati vimarśaḥ,
GSP33brssgo1u:11018: īkṣāpūrvakaṃ ca kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11020: sa ca nyāya ādikartaryapi yuktaḥ saṃkramayitum /
GSP33brssgo1u:11022: īśvarāṇāṃ hi rājavaivasvatādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇatvameva kevalaṃ pratīyate tadvatparameśvarasyāpi nimittakāraṇatvameva yuktaṃ pratipattum /
GSP33brssgo1u:11023: kāryaṃ cedaṃ jagatsāvayavamacetanamaśuddhaṃ ca dṛśyate, kāraṇenāpi tasya tādṛśenaiva bhavitavyaṃ, kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11024: brahma ca naivaṃlakṣaṇamavagamyate 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:11029: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ prakṛtiścopādānakāraṇaṃ ca brahmābhyupagantavyaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11034: pratijñā tāvat- 'uta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātam' (chā. 6.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11035: tatra caikena vijñātena sarvamandavijñātamapi vijñātaṃ bhavatīti pratīyate
GSP33brssgo1u:11037: nimittakāraṇāvyatirekāstu kāryasya nāsti, loke takṣṇaḥ prāsādavyatirekadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11038: dṛṣṭānto 'pi yathā 'somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam'
GSP33brssgo1u:11040: tathā 'ekena lohamaṇinā sarvaṃ lohamayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' 'ekena
GSP33brssgo1u:11041: nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' (chā. 6.1.4,5,6) iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11042: tathānyatrāpi 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati (muṇḍa. 1.1.2) iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11044: tathā 'ātmani kalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssgo1u:11045: 'sa yathā dundubherhanyamānasya na bāhyāñśabdāñśaknuyādgrahaṇāya dundubhestu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātasya vā śabdo gṛhītaḥ' (bṛ. 4.5.6,7)
GSP33brssgo1u:11047: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ prativedāntaṃ pratijñādṛṣṭāntau prakṛtitvasādhanau pratyetavyau /
GSP33brssgo1u:11048: yata itīyaṃ pañcamī 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityatra 'janikartuḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:11052: yathā hi loke mṛtsuvarṇādikamupādānakāraṇaṃ kulālasuvarṇakārādīnadhiṣṭhātṛnapekṣya pravartate naivaṃ brahmaṇa upādānakāraṇasya sato 'nyo 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣyo 'sti,
GSP33brssgo1u:11058: niṣkalaṃ niravayavam, niṣkriyamacalam, śāntamapariṇāmi, niravadyaṃ nirastasamastadoṣam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11061: dundubhyāghātasya janakasya janyatayā saṃbandhī vā śabdo viśeṣaśabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11064: tatra hi brahmaṇo buddhisthatvārthaṃ sāmānyato jagatkāraṇatvaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:11065: lakṣaṇamuktaṃ, tena buddhisthe brahmaṇi kṛtasnavedāntasamanvayaṃ pratipādya tatkāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ kartṛtvamātramuta prakṛtitvakartṛtvobhayarūpamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11068: yadyapi tadānantaryamasya yuktaṃ tathāpi niścitatātparyairvedāntaiḥ kartṛmātreśvaramatanirāsaḥ sukara iti samanvayānte idaṃ likhitam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11071: nirastaṃ, tadayuktaṃ, kartrupādanayorbhedena pratijñāyā gauṇatvādityākṣipati-tatra nimittetyādinā
GSP33brssgo1u:11073: īkṣaṇaśrutyā kartṛtvaṃ niścitaṃ, tathā ca brahma na prakṛtiḥ, kartṛtvāt,
GSP33brssgo1u:11074: yo yatkartā sa tatprakṛtirna, yathā ghaṭakartā kulāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11077: jaganna brahmaprakṛtikaṃ, tadvilakṣaṇatvāt, yaditthaṃ tattathā kulālavilakṣaṇaghaṭavadityāha-kāryaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11078: niṣkalaṃ niravayavaṃ, niṣkriyamacalaṃ, śāntamapariṇāmi, niravadyaṃ nirastasamastadoṣam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11086: kartṛjñānādapi sarvakāryajñānaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nimittakāraṇāvyatirekastviti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11093: ghaṭaḥ sphuratītyanugatasphuraṇaṃ prakṛtistadatirikeṇa vikārā na santīti so 'yamartho yathā sphuṭaḥ tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa ucyate /
GSP33brssgo1u:11094: hanyamānadundubhijanyācchabdasāmānyādbāhyān viśeṣaśabdān sāmānyagrahaṇātirikeṇa pṛthaggrahītuṃ śrotā na śaknuyāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11095: sāmānyasya tu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātajaśabdaviśeṣo gṛhīto bhavati,
GSP33brssgo1u:11096: tasya vā grahaṇena tadavāntaraviśeṣaśabdo gṛhīto bhavati /
GSP33brssgo1u:11097: ataḥ śabdasāmānyagrahaṇagrahyā viśeṣāḥ sāmānye kalpitāḥ tadvadātmabhānabhāsyā ghaṭādaya ātmani kalpitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11099: 'yato vā'ityatra śrutau yata iti pañcamī prakṛtau draṣṭavyetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11102: evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvaṃ prasādhya kartṛtvaṃ sādhayati-nimittatvamiti
GSP33brssgo1u:11110: abhidhyopadeśaścātmanaḥ kartṛtvaprakṛtitve gamayati 'so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' iti ca /
GSP33brssgo1u:11122: prabhavapralayāvāmnāyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante /
GSP33brssgo1u:11124: yaddhi yasmātprabhavati yasmiṃśca pralīyate tattasyopādānaṃ prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo1u:11135: svayamakuruta' (tai. 2.7) ityātmanaḥ karmatvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ta darśayati /
GSP33brssgo1u:11137: kathaṃ punaḥ pūrvasiddhasya sataḥ kartṛtvena vyavasthitasya kriyamāṇatvaṃ śakyaṃ saṃpādayitum
GSP33brssgo1u:11139: pūrvasiddho 'pi hi sannātmā viśeṣeṇa vikārātmanā pariṇamayāmāsātmānamiti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11143: tasyaiṣor'thaḥ - itaśca prakṛtirbrahma, yatkāraṇaṃ brahmaṇa eva
GSP33brssgo1u:11146: FN: sat pratyakṣaṃ bhūtatrayam, tyat parokṣaṃ bhūtadvayam, niruktaṃ vaktuṃ śakyaṃ ghaṭādi, aniruktaṃ vaktumaśakyaṃ kapotarūpādikam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11149: nanu kṛterāśrayaḥsiddhobhavati viṣayastu sādhya ityekasyobhayaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11150: yathā mṛdaḥ sādhyapariṇāmābhedena kṛtiviṣayatvaṃ tadvadātmana ityāha-pariṇāmāditi /
GSP33brssgo1u:11154: nanu brahmaṇa ātmānamiti dvitīyayā kāryātmanā sādhyatvaśrutyāstu prakṛtitvaṃ kartā tvanyo 'stvityata āha-svayamiti ceti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11155: brahmaṇaḥ kṛtikarmatvopapādanārthaṃ pariṇāmāditi padaṃ vyākhyāyānyathāpi vyācaṣṭe-pṛthaksūtramiti
GSP33brssgo1u:11156: mṛdghaṭa itivadbrahma sacca tyacceti pariṇāmasāmānādhikaraṇyaśruterbrahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo1u:11157: satpratyakṣaṃ bhūtatrayaṃ, tyaparokṣaṃ bhūtadvayaṃ, niruktaṃ vaktuṃ śakyaṃ ghaṭādi, aniruktaṃ vaktumaśakyaṃ kapotarūpādikaṃ ca brahmaivābhavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11163: itaśca prakṛtirbrahma yonirityapi paṭhyate vedānteṣu 'kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ
GSP33brssgo1u:11169: kacitsthānavacano 'pi yoniśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ - 'yoniṣṭa indra niṣade akāri'
GSP33brssgo1u:11171: vākyaśeṣāttvatra prakṛtivacanatā parigṛhyate 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7) ityevañjātīyakāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11173: yatpunaridamuktamīkṣāpūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu loke dṛṣṭaṃ nopādāneṣvityādi, tatpratyucyate- na lokavadiha bhavitavyam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11178: FN: kartāraṃ kriyāśaktimantam, īśaṃ niyantāram, puruṣaṃ pratyañcam, brahma
GSP33brssgo1u:11180: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ sthānaṃ mayā akāri kṛtam /
GSP33brssgo1u:11182: kartāraṃ kriyāśaktimantaṃ, īśaṃ niyantāraṃ, puruṣaṃ pratyañcaṃ, brahma
GSP33brssgo1u:11183: pūrṇaṃ, yoniṃ prakṛtiṃ, dhīrā dhyānena paśyantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11184: nanvanupādāne 'pi strīyonau yoniśabdo dṛṣṭa ityata āha-strīyoneriti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11188: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ, sthānaṃ mayā akāri
GSP33brssgo1u:11191: nanvanumānasya śrutyanapekṣatvānna tayā bādha ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11192: jagatkartā pakṣaḥ śrutyaiva siddhyati, yā kṛtiḥ sā śarīrajanyeti vyāptivirodhena nityakṛtimato 'numānāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brssgo1u:11193: ataḥ śrautamīśvaraṃ pakṣīkṛtyānupādānatvasādhane bhavatyevopajīvyayā prakṛtitvabodhakaśrutyā bādha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11196: ata ubhayarūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamiti siddhām //27//
GSP33brssgo1u:11203: tasya hi pakṣasyopodbalakāni kānicilliṅgābhāsāni vedānteṣvāpātena mandamatīnpratibhāntīti
GSP33brssgo1u:11205: devalaprabhṛtibhiśca kaiściddharmasūtrakāraiḥ svagrantheṣvāśritaḥ, tena tatpratiṣedhe yatno 'tīva kṛto nāṇvādikāraṇavādapratiṣedhe /
GSP33brssgo1u:11208: ataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati- etena pradhānakāraṇavādapratiṣedhanyāyakalāpena sarve 'ṇvādikāraṇavādā api pratiṣiddhatayā vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo1u:11216: tathā hi chāndogye jagatkāraṇatvajñāpanārthaṃ pitā putramuvāca, āsāṃ vaṭadhānānāṃ madhye ekāṃ bhindhīti /
GSP33brssgo1u:11218: punaḥ pitrā kimatra paśyasītyukte na kiñcana bhagava ityāha /
GSP33brssgo1u:11219: tatra pitrāṇimānaṃ na paśyasītyuktaṃ, tathā ca na
GSP33brssgo1u:11222: atrāṇvādivādāḥ śrautā na veti saṃśaye satyasadaṇvādiśabdabalācchrautā iti prāpte 'tidiśati-eteneti
GSP33brssgo1u:11227: tasminnaiva sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti siddham //28//
GSP33brssgo1u:11229: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 4 //
GSP33brssgo1u:11231: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya yaturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
